107b2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis sems can thams cad dang / bdag nyid kyang mi snang bar bya ste/ sgra ma 'gags par bsnams lA/ oM s+yA b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha hUM/ zhes brjod do// yuMk+ShuM suM hUM las
107b3(rgyud 'grel): rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor bas ma la/ k+ShuM las 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho/ suM las ri rab bsam pa'i steng du rdo rje buM gi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis bgegs thams cad bsregs nas/ 'od zer de rnams yongasu
107b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las// rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bsams par bya ste/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// rdo rje'i ka bas brgyan por yang // sna tshogs mtshan mar
107b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dgod// dril bu dra ba'i phreng ba dang // dra ba dra phyed bskor ba la// zur bzhi dag tu rdo rje dang // rin chen zla ba phyed pas brgyan// sgo rnams su ni bum pa la// gnas pa'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bya// shar
107b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgor ni pad+ma la// seng ges mtshan ma bsgreng bya ste// byang sgor pad+ma rma bya yis// mtshan ma dag ni bsgreng bar bya// pad+ma dang pos mtshan pa yi// rgyal mtshan nub tu bzhag par bya// pad+ma chu srin gyis mtshan
108a1(rgyud 'grel): ba// de bzhin ts+tsha yi phyogs su ba zhag/ dang po'i dkyil 'khor phyogs kyi mdog/ gnyis pa khrag ltar dmar ba'o// gsum pa mkha' ltar sngo bsangs te// snum bu gser gyi mdog can no//
108a2(rgyud 'grel): rnalnga 'byor dbang phyug che rnams kyang // rtag tu chu lo ni 'dri bzhin rtag/ dbus su seng ge yi ni gdan// shar du glang po che'i gdan// byang phyogs su ni rma bya'i gdon// nub du na mkha'i lding gi bdan// lho ru ci bgyi zhes
108a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'i god na// dbang ldan phyogs su steng ge'i gdan// me phyogs rdo rje gdong gi gradan// bden bral phyogasu ma he'i gdan// rlung gi phyogs su lce spyang gad nau// sgo bzhi dag tu ro yi gdan// gnyis pa'i 'khor lo zlum
108a4(rgyud 'grel): bau la// pad+ma dang ni zla ba'i gdan// rim pa gsum pa nyid la ni// 'jig rten pa yi rab grags gdon// de ltar gad na yongs su brtags nas de bsrung bar bya'i phyir// rdo rje ra ba la sogs pa dang // dra ba dang phur bu la
108a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa byos la/ gtso bo'i gdanA pad+ma dkar po la A l-i yongasu gyur pa las// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du kA li yongasu gyur pa las// nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor te/ gnyis pa de'i steng du yi ge hU~M la phyogs
108a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi mngab mo la gnas pa'i lha mo bzhis bskul bar bsam par byi ste/ dza dza dza dza badz+ri satwa ba tra na ra sid+d+hi/ ma hA ma hA he hi ha ha hUM ka ri nA tha/ sa ma yo haM na ma ta mi te/ ba ba ba ba badz+ra s+pho Ta gu h+yang+ga te de ha d+harmA/ oM a a
108b1(rgyud 'grel): a A ho to ShaT/ badz+ra li me ka shu lo yA na hUM/ bzhi po des de ltar bskul nas/ yi ge hUM der thim par gyur par bsams la/ de'i 'od zer mo su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pA bsam par bya ste/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so//
108b2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra shud+d+ha d+hU sarba d+har+m+mA badz+rAM shwad+d+ho hi/ zhes brjod la/ lte ba'i hUM gi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis sems can thams cad yongs su sbyangs nas/ bye ba sgrub pA li ro gcig par gyur po dang / seng ge'i gdun gyi steng du rang gyi
108b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas su sbyong zhing / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang bsums la/ gdugs dkar pos brgyan te/ de nas zhal gsum pa dang / phyag drug pa sems dpo'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ sku ni grol zhing rnam par 'phro//
108b4(rgyud 'grel): thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par bcings// rdo rje brgyan pa'i rtse bran yang // sangs rgyasnga ni rnam par brgyan// sku mdog sngo zhing shas tshor bregs// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// khro bo sgeg pa rnam par bzhad// zhal
108b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum sbyin ni rnam pa gsum// gad rgyangasu hU~M has zhal dregangs pa// na bza' dri mer pos nye bar mdzes// kha T+wAM ga ni gyen du bsgreng // gnyis pa la ni dgra ste nyid// gsum po rtag tu rdo rje can// g.yon gyi dril bu nges
108b6(rgyud 'grel): dkrol zhing // gnyis pas rnal 'byor pa yi snod// de bzhin gsum pas ral gri bsnams// 'od zer dpag med ldan par ni// mkhas pas dbus su bsgom par bya// sku mdog dkar zhing rab mdzes pa'i// phyag gnyis
109a1(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par 'khyud nas su// ma mchu tshems kyis 'debs par mdzad// zhabs kyi tshogs kyis dkris nas su// rdo rje pad+mar thim par mdzad// yan lag rgyan kun gyis brgyan cing // shin tu mdzes
109a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gros gsol nas// shes rab dang ni 'dus nas bzhugs// de nas ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas yi ge brgyad dgod par bya ste/ k+ShuM ni spyi bor rnam par bsam// yi ge hUM ni mig gnyis su// yu~M ni rna ba sna gnyis su//
109a3(rgyud 'grel): sum ni lce la yang dga' bar// lkog mar smai bsam par bya// nang 'tshong de bzhin hU~M bas mo// snying ga'i phyogs su y+m+R+YuM ngo // lte bor k+ShaM dgod par bya// de ltar bsams nas lcags dkar pos ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma bkug
109a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan cing / rlu mchod yon dang / zhal bsil dang chu gdan bstabs la yong dag par rI mchod do// b+h+rU~M/ oM badz+ro aM ku sha dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya bas rnal 'byor nu mkha'i thugs
109a5(rgyud 'grel): kar/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bcug la/ bcings te dbang du byas nas mnyes par bya'o// oM hUM A swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis// nyi ma'i lug pas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbang bskor bya brtag por bya'o// sngags
109a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dis rgyan gyi phyag rgya dngul bar bya'o// bshad ma thag pa'i rim pos gsang sngags kyis bskyed pa'i lha'i sku la mngon por zhen pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir sngags 'dis brjod par bya ste/ oM yo ga shud+d+hoHsarba d+harmA yo
109b1(rgyud 'grel): do shud+d+ho ha~M/ de nas thabs dang shes rab shin tu thim zhing // sgyu ma lta bur lhag par mos pas/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor dbyung bar bya ste/ sum bzlas pa las yang dag 'byung //
109b2(rgyud 'grel): dung dang kun da zla 'od bcas// phyag gnyis sgra ni rnam par grol// sangs rgyas phreng bas rnam par brgyan// yan lag brgyan rnams rnam par brgyan// rigs gsum khro bo hU~M mdzad pa// kha T+wAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod//
109b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dpag ba du med pa 'bar// sham thabs glang po'i pags pa ste// na ro'i bges pa gos su man pos// me yi dkyil 'khor 'od 'khor lo// glong chen rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs// rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas
109b4(rgyud 'grel): ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma shar du// oM AHswA hA// sa yi dbugs phyin las byung ba// A skyes mi bzad mkha' 'gro ma// sku mdog ser mo shin tu mdzes// rnam par gtsigs pa ha har bzhad// dbu skra gyen
109b5(rgyud 'grel): du rnam par 'bar// sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can// rme bya'i gdan ni rnam mnan nas// skyil krung dge ni phyed pas bzhugs// rgyan rnams kun gyis sku la brgya ni// phyag gnyis rnam par mdzes pas na// kha T+wAM rnal 'byor
109b6(rgyud 'grel): snod dag bsnams// me yi dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pos// sham thabs glang po'i pogs pa ste// na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs// lha mo de ltar bsgom bya bo// rtag tu byang gi phyogasu bzhugs// oM A swA hA/
110a1(rgyud 'grel): A skyes me yi dbugs las byung // ro langs ma ni nub tu dgod// mkha' lding gdan la bzhugs nas ni// tsug pu'i 'dug stangs dag gis bzhugs// kha dog dmar zhing shin tu mdzes// phyuganyis
110a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i hUM mdzad pa// ske ni 'bar zhing rnam par dgyes// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// kha T+wAM rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// sham thabs glang po'i brags pa ste//
110a3(rgyud 'grel): na ri'i pags pa gos su mnabs// mi gA yo 'tshe ba med pa yi// bsam pas kun nas bsgom par bya// oM I swA hA/ A skyes rlung gis dbugs 'byin 'byung // gtum mo lha yi dbang phyug ma// mdog sngon mi zad chen mo ste/
110a4(rgyud 'grel): ha hA'i gang rgyungs 'jigs pa sgrogs// ci bgyi'i gdan la gnas nas ni// pus mo'i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs// dbu sgo dmar po rnam par 'thor// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyag gnyis rnal 'byor snong
110a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// kha T+wAM ga ni rab tu bsnams// sku la rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// sham thabs glang po'i pags pa ste// na ra'i bgos pa gos su mnabs// lho ru rtag tu bsgom par bya// oM oM a oM swA hA/ ri yi sa bon las
110a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba// lha mo'i ming ni seng gi can// seng ge'i gdan la rnam par bzhugs// rol pa'i stangs stabs dag dang ldan// dkar dang ser la sogs mdog can// 'bar ba'i 'od dang 'dra ba'i 'od// phyag gnyis ni bza' dmar po bsnam
110b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lag pa gyen gdengs ral gri dang // g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa'o// bdud rnams thams cad skrag byed pa// dbang ldan phyogs su rnam par dgod// oM ra~M swA hA/ rI yi sa
110b2(rgyud 'grel): sa bon las byung ba// rdo rje mchu can zla bas brgyan// dkar dang gnag la sogs mdog ldan// dkyil 'khor tsham ngam gnas pas bzhugs// phyag gnyis khro bo'i bzhad par ldan// na bza' dmar pos rnam par brgyan//
110b3(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub ldan// stagr-i mo me yi phyogasu bkod// oM r-I swA hA/ li yi sa bon las byung ba// wa mo nag mo rnam pre ra mAdzes// ma he'i gdan la rnam gnas shing // skyil krung phyed par yang dag ldan/
110b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis dgra sta zhags pa bsnams// me yi dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan// mche ba'i gzugs ni gtsigs pa dang // hA ha bzhad cing shin tu 'jigs// na bza' dag ni dmar po mnabos// bden bral phyogs kyi lha mo
110b5(rgyud 'grel): yin// oM li swA hA/ lI yi sa bon las byung ba'i// lha mo 'ug pa mo ni dbyung // sku mdog dmar dang ser bar snang // lce spyang gi ni gdan la bzhugs// cog pu'i 'dug stangs yang dag ldan// gaM phyag gnyis dbyig pa
110b6(rgyud 'grel): sgobasnams shing // rgyan rnams kun gyi rnam par brgyan// na bza' dag ni dmar po gsil// 'bar ba'i me dang mnyam pa'i 'od// lha mo de ltar bsgom bya ba// shin pa rlung gis phyogs su gnas// oM l-I swA hA/ nong gi
111a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sgo rnams su// sgo srungs rnam pa bzhi dag ni// lha 'gugs la sogs rnam par 'brel// bsgom pa de nyid bdag gis bsgom// rang sngags las byung mkha' 'gro ma// rgyal ba'i
111a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang mo zhes bya ba// mdog dkar phyag ni gnyis dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis skul brgyan// gtum mo skra ni rnam par 'thor// de yi zhal du phyag mdzad cing // ha ha zhes bshad rab 'jigs ma// yi dgos kyi
111a3(rgyud 'grel): ni gdan la bzhugs// 'gugs pa la ni rab brtson pa'i// lha mo shar gyi sgo ru dgod// oM iM swA hA/ rang sngags las byung lha mo ni// glang po'i dbang mo zhes bya ba// drag po chen mo sku mdogs ser// yi
111a4(rgyud 'grel): dgas gdan la rnam par bzhugs// phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba dang // dbu skra gyen du me ltar 'bar// mi bzang gzugs kyis bzhad bya zhing // shin tu mdzes pa'i 'od kyis brgya ni// 'od zer 'ber bas 'khrugs shing
111a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal// byang gi phyogs su rnam par dgod// oM aM s+t+wa~M hA/ rang sngags las byung 'dzab ma ni// rgyal ba'i dbang mo zhes bya ba// mdog dmar 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa// yi dgas kyi ni gdan la bzhugs//
111a6(rgyud 'grel): rab mdzes gau ni rnam par mnabs// phyag mthil gnyis ni s+yAd bu dmar// thal mo khyer bas khrag gsol ba// me 'bar ba yi 'od mnga' ba// drag po 'ching bar byed pa yi// 'jib ma nub tu bsgom par bya// oM hrI
111b1(rgyud 'grel): ha~M swA hA/ rang sngags las byung lha mo ni// kaM bu dzI nI zhes bya ba// mdog gnag ro yi gdan la bzhugs// phyag gnyis sku ni rnam par 'thor// rab mdzes na bza' dmar po mnabs// sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam par
111b2(rgyud 'grel): brgya ni// phyag nA tho ba sdigs mdzub ldan// 'gro ba'i sems ni rmongs par byed// drag cing me 'bar 'dra ba'i 'odra// lho phyogs su ni bsgom par bya// oM pri swA hA/ rim pa dag ni gnyis po la// rnal 'byor ma rnams
111b3(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pos dgod// spos byed 'dzub byed gtum mo// shar gyi phyogs kyi lha mo yin// bdud rtsis gang ba'i thod pa lo// sgeg pa'i phyag nr-i rnam par mdzes// drag mo khrag 'thung shra za ma// byang go phyogs kyi/
111b4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo yin// lcags kyu la sogs lnga rnams kyis// bkang bA'i tha~Md pa phyag na bsnams// gtumAM 'bar 'jigs su rung ba ni// nub kyi phyogs kyi lha mo yin// lug pa gnyis kyis kyi pad+ma'i snod// thogs po ru ni
111b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dgod// thod can rdo rje can gun dr-i// lho yi phyogs kyi lha mu yin// thod pa bza' btung gis khengs dang // rdo rje dag ni phyag nau bsnams// skyeg mo dri ni dbang ldan du// pi waM me to gi me yi phyogs// glu ma
111b6(rgyud 'grel): bdug spos 'din bral du// ger ma merare me rlung gi phyogaso// sdug pa'i lha mo nyi shu yang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// 'di dag rgyun sogs phyogs dang mtshungs// pad+ma zla ba'i steng na gnas// gsum po
112a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi gdan la ni// shar sgor khyab 'jug gsol bka'i tshul// tshangs pa lag na rnga yab bsnams// byang gi sgor ni rnam par gnas// drag po la sogs bstod sgrar ldan// nu
112a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgor ni gzhag par bya// brgya byin rin chen gdugs thogs la// lho yi phyogs su bzhag par bya// rnga dag brdungs zhing rnga yib thogaso// gar dang glu yis brgyan pa dang // sder bcas chung mar bcas pa yi//
112a3(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin byang shar mtshams su gauzhag/ lag na r-i na chen myu gu thogs// mr-i tig de shal dag gis brgyan// sde dang bcas shing chung mar bcas// ku be ra ni shar lhor bzhag/ rgyal mtshan gdugs dang bla
112a4(rgyud 'grel): brer bau casau// sde dang bcas shing chung mar bcas// 'byung po'i tshogs kyi rgyal dbang po// lho nub phyogs su bzhag par bya// pi wang gling bu du ma yis// glu dang gar la sogs pa mkhas// chung mar bcas pa'i klu/
112a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang ni// nub byang mtshams su bzhag par bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i 'khor lo'i gnas rje lto ba bzhin du bzhag la// yang lcags kyu dkar pos ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
112a6(rgyud 'grel): la bzhag ste// sngar bshad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan la/ rang gi gzugs rnams la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya'o// de rnams kyi thugs kar sngags kyis phreng ba rab tu
112b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o// spro ba dang bsdu ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o// de ltar phyag rgya bzhi dang sbyar nas thams cad kyi cod pan la rnal 'byor na mkhwa'i dbang bskur ba nyid du byasam par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya bstan par
112b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir gsungasau pa/ de rnams ming gi gisang sngags ni// oM dang bsreg po'i mtha' ma'o// dri mA gsum gyi tshigs gsum la// ro tsA na ni lcags kyu re sbyar// oM A kaR+Sha no hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten pa la
112b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dgug pa'i sdug dang phyag rgya'o// khu tshuru gnyis sbyar brtan bcings nas// dri ma gsum gyis bdug spos gtang // gnyis po reg pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mdung thung bstan par bya// oM tiSh+Tha A sA na
112b4(rgyud 'grel): swAt+tha/ gdan gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// pAd+mA saM shes dkris pa yis// sa yI gdugs dang rnam shes mnan// gnyis po lcags sgrog dkris nu sa ni// lhag ma ba dan gsum par bsgreng // dri ma gsum ni
112b5(rgyud 'grel): bdug spos reg/ rdo rje rtse ni lnga pa sin// oM hUM haHswA hA// rnal 'byor na mkha'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// khu tshur gnyis ni brtan bcings la// gung mo gnyis ni brkyang bar bya// mdzub mo bdun du khe sprad la// ye
112b6(rgyud 'grel): shes lha mo dag la bstan// oM oM a swA hA// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag pa dang ni lag par sbyar// mthe bong dbus su gzhug par bya// yang dong yang du bskyod byas laM/ shar gyi
113a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can la bstan// oM s+yAM sa swA hA// rdo rje can ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// khu tshur mnyam par brtan bcings la// mthe bong gnyis ni rnam par brkyang // drag mo la ni phyag rgya bstan
113a2(rgyud 'grel): byang gi phyogs su brtsam par bya// oM k+ShuM k+ShA swA hA// drag me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// 'di yi phyag rgya brtan bcings laM// gung mo gnyis ni rnam par brkyang // nub kyi phyogs su ro longs ma// phyag rgya de nyid lo sbyar
113a3(rgyud 'grel): bor bya// oM yu yA swA hA// ro langs mau'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid brtan bcingaso la// mthe'u chung gnyis ni rnam par brkyang // lho yau phyogs su gtum mo l-I// phyag+sa d+he ni rnam por bAr+g+gad // oM hUM
113a4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA// gtum+ba mAM'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyag rgyu kun gyi dang po // pad+ma'i skor ba sngon du bya// rdo rje bsdoms pa gnyis byas lnga// ro rtsan dkar po'i lcags sgrogs yin// oM s+m+R+YuM swA hA// se ma'i sngags
113a5(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya'o// de yi phyage rgyu brtan po cings la// dri ma go sum+b+ha dang dadagra spos btang // oM hUM swA hUM// sgrog mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de yi phyag rgyu bstan bcings la// s+ye yi gdugs dang bde lcag slob/ oM s+m+R+YuM
113a6(rgyud 'grel): hU~M// wa mo'i sngags dong phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa gnyis las no// phan tshun du ni mngon par bskyod// oM phaT hU~M swA hA// 'gro ba mo'i sdigs dang phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ka khar bcug ste// rgod hU~M
113b1(rgyud 'grel): pra bla na med pa byang // oM hUM hU swA hA// mkha' 'gro rgyal po'i dbang mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas bzhag/ oM phaT hUM swA hA// sgron mu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// yi dgas thul mo khur bcug nas// hUM
113b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba rab tu sgrogs// oM pa~M hU~M swA hA// 'jib ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba'i khu tshur bar+d+han btsongs la// rna ba'i rna rtswa ru sbyar bar bya// oM hrI hU~M swA hUM/ kaM pro dza'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dkyil 'khor nang gri
113b3(rgyud 'grel): mo bcu gsum gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba'i lag pa brkyang gnas su// rnam shes dag ni dgug par byA// mdun gyi gi sa ni sbyor bar bya// bdud rtsi'i chu ni sngon 'phro ba'i// oM hai ho hrIHswA hA/ shar gyi phyi
113b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnal 'byor ma gsum gyi sngaglos dang phyag rgya'o// nyi ma zla ba sbyor nasA ni// nyi ma'i steng du sbyar bar bya// oM g+h+r-i b+hU swA hA// byang gi phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma gsum gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo brtanA bcings
113b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// nyi ma da ni zla ba spro// oM ku ru ku ru ku ru swA hA// nub kyi phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma gsum gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba nyo ma gnyis brkyang nas// rgyab kyi rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// sor mo'i rtse mo'i sprad pa ni// lho'i
113b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma sa mi r+g+ha / oM banI l-I Sh+T+r-i swA hU~M/ rdo rje khu tshure gnyis brtsis la// rnyeng pa gnyis kyi mtshams so bzhig/ oM hU~M ts+yai swAt+ma// skyeg mo'i sdug so dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba'i khu tshur brkyang nas su// mthe bong bsku
114a1(rgyud 'grel): bar shes byas la// bzung nas nyi ma'i lag pa ni// dung ltar sbyar ba dri yi rgya// oM s+yA pA~M ya gan+d+he d+h+waM swAhA/ dI'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bI waM 'dra ba'i pi waM gis// oM dz+dza ho swA hA/ bi wa
114a2(rgyud 'grel): gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// thal mo gnyis klu sbyar nas ni// spyi bor bskor nas dbye bar bya// oM shAM swA hA// me tog gi stegs dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// dUkar bo bteg nas mdun du sbyar/
114a3(rgyud 'grel): glu len pa ltar bya bA ni// glu yi phyag rgya yin par bshad// oM hUM aM swA hA// glu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu brtan cings te// zla bas mtshun ni gzung bar bya// oM i swA hA// bdug pa'i sngags dang
114a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o// zla ba'i lag pa g.yas pa yI// phrag pa dag tu rnam par bzhag/ oM su~M nr-i t+yai swA hA// gar gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// thal mo bcings nas spyi bor bzhag/ A~M k+ShuM swA hA// mer me'i sngags dang phyag
114a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyo'o// rim pa gnyis pa'i lha mo nyi shu'i sngags dang phyug rgya bshad zin to// nyi mi'i khu tshuri bcings nas su// gyen du rnam par grol bar bya// oM k+ShuM swA hU~M// khyab 'jug gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur
114a6(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas ni// snying dag tu ni rnam par bskyed// oM sa swA hUM// tshangs pa'i sngags deng phyag rgyu'o// ba dan gsum po gyen du 'greng // oM hUM swAhA/ drag po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba'i khu tshur brtan bci
114b1(rgyud 'grel): la// de nas nyi ma'i lag pa brkyang // ro tsa na ni gzhug par bya// oM maM mu hUM swA hA// brgya byin gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// nyi ma khu tshur brtan bcings la// dkar po dud pa bsgreng bar bya// dpral ba'i steng gi thad sor byug
114b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang po yi ni dam tshig 'dod// oM mU mu swAhA/ dbang po'i sngogs dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur brtan bcings lo// ri tsa na ni dkar po brgyud// sngon ma gnyis ni kha spyad la// rin chen lta bur sbyar bar bya// oM d+h+yA n+ta
114b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA// ku be ra'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// khu tshur byas nas dkar po bskyong // oM g+hA ta ni hU~M phaT swA hA// 'byung po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// khu tshur byas nas dkar po bsgreng // oM b+hur b+hu ba swA hA// klu'i bdag po'i sngaT
114b4(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa rgyab bstan cing // lag pa g.yas pa mdun bstan la// dbang ldan gyis ni phyogs dag tu// lan gsum bar du bskyed por bya// oM badz+ra prA kA ra hUM phaT/ rdo rje re ba'i sngags dang phyag
114b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su// rtse mo dag tu reg par bya// oM dzuM swA hA// rdo rje ra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag g.yon khu tshur byas ni// mthe bong brkyang nas smad par bya// oM bruM swA hA/
114b6(rgyud 'grel): phur pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// nyi ma'i lag pa brkyang nas ni// rnal 'byor ma rnams kun la bstan i pra tIts+tsha suM gan+d+haM hUM swA hA/ dri'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nyid legs par bcings nas ni// rked pa'i
115a1(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu sbyar bAr bya// oM puSh+pe swA hA// me tog gi'o// de nyid bcings la bdug spos dbul// oM d+hU pe ma l-i ni hUM swA hA/ bdug pa'i 'o// nyi ma'i khu tshur mthe bong brkyang // oM dI tIk+Sh+Na
115a2(rgyud 'grel): dA be hUM swA hA// mar me'i'o// lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas kyang // dbus su mthe bong bskyod par bya// oM kU ru ku ru mahA bar+m+ma bi bid+d+hi swAhUM/ lnga bar nas kyi'o// de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mchod pa rnam pa
115a3(rgyud 'grel): shu hUM dang sbyar bas// lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing bstod bzhin pa'i bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o// de nas bdag dang gzhan mchod par bya ba'i phyir// bdud rtsis bkang ba'i dung
115a4(rgyud 'grel): chos blangaso la// rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mdun du// sngags 'dris se gol gsum gtog par bya'o// oM hA na ho hrI swA hA// bdud rtsi lha sbyin pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// sngar bshad pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje
115a5(rgyud 'grel): drang dril bud+d+ha sa la// yi ge hUM gi byangs dang btsos pa'i sngags 'dri gdon par bya'o// oM ts+tshits+tsha// A~M pradz+nyA trA~M hU~MhrI.oM pa~M k+Sh+mI/ oMb+h+rU~M/ ma~M Sh+T+ri/ oM b+h+yo g+h+nAM b+h+rU~M hU~M swAt+ma// mnyes bya chen por bya ba'i sngags so//
115a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje dril bu dkrol// 'bad pa yis ni gsang sngags gdon// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings lo// rgyab kyi rgyab tu sbyor bar bya// sa gdugs pad+ma bcings pa dang // oM bidz+ra g+hAt+ta ho// oM badz+ra g+haN+Ta ro Ni tA pU ra Ni ta/
115b1(rgyud 'grel): sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra prats+tsha la~M te/ badz+nyA ba ra mi na tA nA da swa b+hA be badz+nyA d+harmA hr-i da ya saM to Sha ni hUM hUM hUM swAH/ rdo rje dril bu'i sngags s+ho// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rked pa'i mtshamasu bzhag par bya// khro ba'i sgeg drang gzhung
115b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // lus na dgug gsum ltar bzhag s+t+wa~M// sgeg mo'i tshul gyis sgeg pa dang // pi wi tshul gyis bi wa~M dang // gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang / sil snyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang // brdeb pa'i tshul gyis brdebs
115b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // gar gyis tshul gyis yan lag bskyod// rlung yab tshul gyis g.yob pa dang // rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang // bla de'i tshul gyi bre ba dang // ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang // gdugs kyi tshul gyis dgab
115b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // cang te'u tshul gyis brdeg pa dang // rnga yi tshul gyis brdung ba dang // bzhad pa'i tshul du 'dzus pa dang // grar gyis tshul gyis gar byed pa// khro bo'i tshul gyis khro ba dang // sgeg pa'i tshul gyis sgeg pa
115b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // 'gying ba'i tshul gyis bsgyings pa dang // mda' 'dren nu ma 'khyud pa dang // rdo rje gsor zhing phyag 'tshal bya'i tshul gyis 'dud par byed pa ste// mchod pa nyi shu de nyid kyis// hUM gis glu dang sbyar bar bya// de nas
115b6(rgyud 'grel): bstod pas mchod bya ste// sems dpa' chen po dang po'i mchog/ dgyes chen rnams kyi dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun gzigs pa'o// rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag/ thugs kyi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin mchog/
116a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chen po stangs pa na// kun tu bzang ba spyod pa'i mchog/ snying por gyur cing bdud 'joms pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chung rje// sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs pa'i mchog/ hUM mdzad hU~M 'jig rten
116a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi// bdag po thugs kyi gtso bo nyid// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'dod dang thar pa'i nor che ba// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste// 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa// maM rgyu bo na mchog tu gsal//
116a3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu phra dang sgom pa'i tshogs// rgyu ba rnams kyi rab mchog brnyes// srid pa'i 'khor lo sbyong mdzad pa// thog mtha' med cing gsal ba min// sngon du sdug pa rnam par gnas// thugs kyi phyag rgya sbyor ba che// dam tshig de nyid
116a4(rgyud 'grel): blo gros tshe// rdo rje khro bo khro bo che// 'drar zhing 'jigs pa 'dul ba po// gdug pa mchog ni bdug pa che// drag cing khro la 'jig par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che// mchog go las can las chen po// dam
116a5(rgyud 'grel): chotshig las ni bzang po'i lam// byang chub sems ni rtogs mdzad pa// thams cad dag byas pad+ma che// shes rab thabs kyi nor che ba// 'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ sna tshogs chags pa'i dbang phyug che// na mkha'
116a6(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas rtag pa'i don// sems can kun gyi gnas chen po// dpal gyi 'byor pa 'byor pa'i rgyal// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// phyag 'tshal bdud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud// dad pas khyod la 'jug bgyid pas//
116b1(rgyud 'grel): bdun du na sems zla d+hU/ nas s+hod na// nga da byung \u0f7f// don su r+b+hasprul gas pa rgyu ba d+d+hab+h+ya/ !nAn+tu/ shAn+d+ha swA/ dudun d+ha ng+tha/ dzas ng+yas/ b+h+yat+mad+hA d+hA
116b2(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yAM/ d+h+ye/ b+h+yaHd+h+maD+hi/ mr-i so sudz+dzidzin/ krA tI mA r-i ho// budz+nyAM na thaMt+taM/ d+hen+yAd+h+r-id+hI/ nA te/ oM maH/ oM na gag+d+ha/ said+d+hi/ b+h+r-in+mat+taM/ sun+ti baM s+yAm+b+ha/ nAM sa nA sa rA/ b+hId+hAb+h+yAM/ tinAn+nam+b+ha
116b3(rgyud 'grel): hU~M te twe hUM mAM ra ba ban+d+ha bahUM ba haM de hUM// su ne san+na re kadz+dzA tu hUM ha'u dz+nyA nA pe te te nA nad+d+haM/ de nas phyi rol gyi rnal 'byor ma dpag tu med pas kyang / ba bu na gon+da maM hUM li ni Shan+t+ra ma/ d+ha paM la saM sa ga/ ka ma ni ta ni me/ a mi ta
116b4(rgyud 'grel): bi shud+d+ha si hi d+hA n+yA kan+nA kany+dza/ na bAr+yA ti d+hA t+saM kar+N+Na tI mi d+h+r-i/ I tau ba sa g+ho rI maN ru T+Ti nA yau/ sAdz+dza kau ba le so ni tAk+Sha khaM/ dzA ya dzA yaM/ ut+tA rI te b+ha dA d+h+waM/ mU ya ra ya/ so suM hi hUM/ kin+du ba ra b+hi sa na g+ho ru dat+ta/ sa dzu ba ka laM/
116b5(rgyud 'grel): ba s+ya mau te bA na mi pA b+h+yAM/ so hi li lu ti tshwa bidz+rI lu// ha ri ha ra mu twA tri pa da ba hUM/ mA ra bi d+ha ra na ko tA yo na me hA ma hI hUM/ rdza yI ni bi hUM// rdo rje glu ni de nyid dang // rdo rje dril bur rab mchod cing // pany+tsa ma dang ko shi ki/
116b6(rgyud 'grel): bsros pa'i mtshan nyid bzang pos blang // de nas rim pa gsum pa 'jig rten pa la sogs pa bstod par byed pa// dpal ldan de nyid rgyal po'i dbang phyug dam pa cod pan mdzes// gsang ba'i gdan la sku mchog 'od 'bar
117a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan zhing // dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu bskyod sgras rnal 'byor mnyes// dpal gyi ye shes dam pa'i dbang phyug longs spyod rnams la spyod// de la sogs pa'i stong pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas
117a2(rgyud 'grel): stong par bya'o// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas ni// snying ga'i phyogs su gzhag par bya// oM shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma hUM/ a a oM a swA hA// de ltar mnyes par byis nas// ji skad bshad pa'i lha'i 'khor lo thun bzhi'i ro ma byas/
117a3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom por bya'o// bsgom pas skyo na gsang sngag zlas bya ste// ha cang myur mini ngal ba min// gsal ba me yin sa gsang sngags ni// ma tshangs pa yang ma yin pa// kun rtog thams cad spangs te bzla//
117a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas kyang ni skyo gyur na// bstod de rdo rje gzung nas ni// rdo rje dril bus rab bskul la// 'khor lo can rnams glu yis bstod// gus pas legs par mchod nas ni// dge ba rnams ni yongs su bsngo// mnyes par byas
117a5(rgyud 'grel): nas gshegs su gsol// slar yang gshegs pa mdzad par gsol// gshegs su gsol ba'i sbyor ba yau// rdo rje thal mo snying gar bsnam// oM na ma ste hUM/ nu ma mi hUM/ na mo na ma swA hA/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings
117a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ snying ga ru ni tsA ba bsdam so// nyi ma sa la bzhag nas ni// gsang sngags 'bad de brjid par bya// oM gats+tsha gats+tsha swa b+ha ba na hU~M swAhA/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi lha rnams go'i shegs su gsol ba'o//
117b1(rgyud 'grel): oM grats+tsha gats+tsha pu nA rA ga ma na ya hUM phan+d+ha swA hA// se grol lan+da gsum brdab pa drang bcas pa ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams gtang ba'i sngags so// de ltar dkyil 'khor ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
117b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs suM ge sa~M le nAs/ dam tshig gi lha rnams snying ga'i pad+ma dkar po la thim par gyur par busams la/ go rgya chen po dang / dang ba'i gshog pa la sogs pa byas la/ yi ge brgya pas brtun pa nyid du bya'o//
117b3(rgyud 'grel): de la yi ge brgya pa ni 'dri yin te/ oM dz+nyA na DA ki nI sa ma ya/ mi nu bA la ya/ dz+nyA nA DA ki nI tre no pa tiSh+Ta/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+hu ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su bo Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pA yats+tsha/
117b4(rgyud 'grel): sarba karma su tse me/ tsid+d+haM shr-i ye d+hAkA rI Sh+TAM/ ha ha ha ha hU~M/ b+hA ga~M ba tI dz+nyA na nASh+TI/ mA me muny+tsa badz+ri b+hA ba me hA sa ma ya satwa AHzhes pas phyug rgya chen por dbang bskor la/ bArga btso ni au D+haM zhes byung
117b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / sngar bshad pa nyid kyi phyag rgya nyid kyi go cha bcings nas phyogs bcu na zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bde ba'i mdzod cig/ ces gsol ba btab ste ldang bar bya'o// ri moM pa 'dis
117b6(rgyud 'grel): lha'i yid la bya ba nyid kyis// ji srid mchog dam pa ma thob pa'i bar du rtag tu gnas par bya'o// de rab rgyud las gsungs pa yi// sgrub pa'i cho ga'i man ngag gis// nges par bdag gis bsgrub par bya// oM hUM hUM g+hi/
118a1(rgyud 'grel): d+hI mA n+na d+d+ha/ nAHhU~M/ dam tshig bcu pa'i sa bon ni de dbyug/ sgrung zhing rtogs dang de bzhin sngar// mi rtogs pa yi sems kyis ni// dga' ba'i sems dang bza'
118a2(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs ku ni tshim par bya// dpal la gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon rje btsun Ar+ya de ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa
118a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ma la gub+ta
118a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / bu chen gyi ma che ba dge slong rin chen yang pos bsgyur cing thus te gtan la lab pa'o//
119a1(rgyud 'grel): dal dang gdan sha'i spu thabs 'asug so//
119b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra tsa tuR+Ye b+hi s+yA d+ha naM nA maHbod skad du/ dpal rdo rje gdan bzhi'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bla ma dang rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor
119b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' mgon de nyid/ rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyi gtso// de yi sgrub thabs chen po brjod// chung dang bar ma la sogs dbye// yid dang rjes su mthun phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'khong nas ni// sngags pa rnam
119b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor la gzhol bas// lag pa dog pa la sogs bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// snying gar hUM yig bsgoms nas ni// rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje mchog/ mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya// zhes pas sems
119b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyong bar bya'o// mgrin par hrIHyig las skyes po'i// bang 'dab rtse mor zla dkyil 'khor// de yi dbus su hU~M yig ste// de la rdo rje bsgom par bya// oM AHdzaM hra saM bar+t+ta ni hUM phaT ces bso lce sbyang bar bya'o// g.yas
119b5(rgyud 'grel): po a yig las skyes pa'i nyi mar rdo rje gzugs brnyan te// g.yon pa sa ma yig las skyes pa'i// zla ba pad+ma rnam par bsgom// dkar po du bdung pad+me// nyi ma'i lag pa'i khro bo sogs// gi wang dri gsum 'jigs pa
119b6(rgyud 'grel): dang // sa gdug so zla ba'i lag pa la// nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka'ang // mthe bong ye shes rnam shes so// de la suM yig la sogs pa'i// sa bon bcu rnams dgod par bya// de la yid kyis sa bon bcu po rnams ni// suM k+ShuM yu~M
120a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM a smai hU~M smr-i k+Shu~M saHzhes pasA lag pa sbyang bar bya'o// pad+ma ye shes kyis ni myan na// sor mo lcug ma rtse gsum ste// 'dri yis yan lag brgyad phyogs su// ji bzhin rim par bsrung
120a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// sngon du lce la dgod pa rgyun+du r+m+ma ni// 'di yI yi ge sum yig go/ spyi bor k+ShuM yig dgod par bya// yu~M yig rna ba sna dag laM// mig gnyis la ni hUM yig go// mgrin par chu smai ni brtsegs po'o//
120a3(rgyud 'grel): dpung pa gnyis la dgod pa na// shin tu mdzes pa'i sa bon brtsegs// rlung hUM gi yi gre brtsegs pa yi// so bon snying ga'i gnas su dgod// me y+m+R+YuM yi skr-i brtsegs pa yi// sa bon lte chu ba'i phyogs su
120a4(rgyud 'grel): dgod// zhes pas+yA yan+d+ra lag brgyad bsrung bar bya'o// rnal 'byor pa yis rI ji bzhin rim// de nas sems ni byin gyis brlab// mnyam par rlu gzhag pas sngags rnams kyis/ ngag dang lus kyang byin
120a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab// oM badz+ra tsit+ta hUM oM badz+ra wa~M ka AHoM badz+ra kA ya ho// zhe sa pas lus gsum byin gyis brlab par bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// dkar po dang ni gri wang sbyar// dung dang
120a6(rgyud 'grel): nya phyis sogs snod du// gsang gtor ched du byin gyis brlab// m+b+hi sar+b+ba si sho d+ha ni hU~M phaT/ rdo rje bcing bar brtan byas nas dri gsum du bsgreng bar bya// sems la rdo rje phyag rgya yis// mchod yon dung
120b1(rgyud 'grel): chos byin gyis rlab// oM pra tIts+tsha anaM hUM/ nyi ma'i ldag pa brkyang nas ni// dkar po dang ni ye shes sbyar// sngags pas gsang sngags dang ldan pas// zhal bsil dung ni byin gyis brlab// oM pra wa
120b2(rgyud 'grel): rA s+yAt+kA ra bA d+yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM swA hA/ zhe sa~M bas+t+ra du chos rnams byin gyis brlab par bya'o// rang rung sngags rnams kho na dang // phyag rgya rnams kyis de bzhin dubyung // dri la stsogs pa de bzhin rim+ba// sngags pas
120b3(rgyud 'grel): byini gyis baR+Sha bai d+yai// 'dir byin gyis brlob pa'i sngags rnams ni// oM hUM swA hA/ d+hi'i'i oM shr-i swAhA/ me tog gi'o// oM k+ShaM swA hA// bdug spos kyi'o// oM k+ShuM swAhA// mar me'i 'o// oM I swA hA/
120b4(rgyud 'grel): lho ba shos kyi'o// oM gung swA hA/ gtor ma'i nyer spyod kyi'o// oM sarba bi ma la si sho d+ha ni hUM phaT/ mchod pa'i yan lag bsang gtong byi ba'i sngagaso// zla ba nyi ma brkyang nas ni// mthe bong gnyis nI dkri
120b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// 'dra ba chags gshog pa'i rnam pa ltar// byas nas snying glu'i gnas su dgyed// oM badz+ra ka wa tsa hUM phaT/ bdag bsrung ba'o// sems la rdo rje brtan byas nas/ phyogs rnams kun ni bskor bar
120b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ ra ba dang ni phur bu yang // sngags pas ji bzhin ri mo par bya// oM hUM swA hA/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas nas// sa gdugs pad+ma sbrel bar bya// dkar po gi waM gyon du bsgreng // steng du bskor te gtsug tor
121a1(rgyud 'grel): bcing // oM hU~M swA hA// rdo rje bcings pa brtan bcings nas// dri gsum du ba gyen du bsgreng // dkar po'i gri wa~M gyen bsgreng ste/ rdo rje'i rnam par sbyang bar bya// spyi bo dpral ba rU ba dang //
121a2(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa rna ba g.yon par ni// rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// gnas 'di rnams su bsgom par bya// 'dir ni rnam snang la sogs pa'i// rang rang sa bon sngags rnams ni// oM hU~M AM swA hA// rdo rje khu
121a3(rgyud 'grel): tshur+ya gnyis bcings nas// sdigs mdzub gnyis ni gyen du sbyar// snying rgyang spyi bo ji bzhin ri mi// rnam pa gsum po bsgom par byi// oM Da Tu hUM swA hA/ dar dbyangs bcing ba byas nas ni// lag mthi lnga mnyam bas
121a4(rgyud 'grel): menye bar byas// badz+ra tu Sh+ya sngags kyis ni// mthar ni ho yi ge sbyor b.rar+yabya// zhes po bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'o// de nas sngags pas mnyam bzhag ste// sems dpa'i skyil krung du gnas pas// snying ga'i rang gis
121a5(rgyud 'grel): bon gnas// dbang po'i gzugs bzhin 'od zer lngas// khams gsum po ni ma lus pa// 'od zer rnams kyis gang bar bsam// de yis nges par bcom ldan 'ongs// rdo rje lcags kyi'i phyag rgya yos//
121a6(rgyud 'grel): bkug ste na mkhar bzhugs pa la// blo dang ldan pas bsang gtor dbul// rdo rje'i zhags pa'i phyag/ rgya yis// lha rnams kun nas gzhug par bya// rdo rje lcags sgrogs phyag rgya yis// de rnams nges par
121b1(rgyud 'grel): brjingas+ya paR+Sha bya// rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyu yis// blo dang ldan pas mnyes par bya// oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHspyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// oM smr-i swA hU~M/ bsau gtor r-i// oM badz+ra bA sha hU~M gzhug/
121b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i'o// oM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ bcing po'i 'o// oM badz+ra a br-i sha hoHmnyes pa'i'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// so gdugs dkar po sbrel bair bya// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di/
121b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog/ nyi ma'i khu tshur brtan bcings nas// dkar po ye shes sbyar bar bya// ku sha'i rtse mos mchu mthong ba// gsang gter gyi ni phyag rgyar bshad// phyag rgya de nyid brtan bcings la//
121b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang ni 'gi wang sbrel// zhagasra pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya yis// lha rnams kun nas nas gzhug par bya// khu tshur gnyis ni dam bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// gsang pa gsadra ba'i lcags
121b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs gris// lha rnams kun+da nas bcings par bya// khro tshur gnyis ni dam bcings nas// rgyu ba dang rgyud tu sbyar bar bya// sa gdugs dang ni pad+ma sbrel// lha rnams ku ni nas monyes par bya// nyi ma'i khu tshur
121b6(rgyud 'grel): brtan bcings nas// dkare po dang ni ye shes sbyor// yongs skor lhag ma gyen du sgreng // zhabs bsil du ni yongs su grags// oM pra wa ra~M sat+kA raM pAM dr-i pra tits+tsha swA hA// zhabs bsol ba'i chu dbul
122a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// sems ma rdo rje brtan bcings nas// dkar po dang ni 'gi bang bskum// ye shes rnam shes dang ni sbyar// mchod yon phyag rgyar rab tu grags// oM pra tits+tsha am+b+ha
122a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA// des mchod yon gyi chu dbul por bya'o// de nas rnal 'byor nam mkha' 'di// mgon po 'khor dang yang dag ldan// dri la sogs pa nyer spyod kyis// mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya// sgeg mo bi hring
122a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin glu// gar ma phyag rgya bzhi rnams dang // dri dang me tog de bzhin spos// mar me dang ni zhal zas mchog/ zla ba nyi ma'i khu tshur gnyis// rked pa'i ngos su bzung nas ni// yan log g.yon du 'gying
122a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// sgeg mo'i phyag rgya'i rnam pa'o// oM hUM swA hA// g.yon bA gri gug ltar byas nas// pi wang gyen du rnam par bzhag/ nyi ma'i lag pas cung zad gsor// bi waM phyag rgya'i rnam pa'o// oM hUM ho swA hA/
122a5(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'o khu tshur gyen du bo zhag/ hUM gI yi ge sgrogs byed cing // kha yi rtse mor+yA dkaR+Sho po g.yo// glu ma'i phyag rgyar rab tu grags// oM hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ grayas pa'i rked pa'i phyogs su ni// lag pa gA yon pa 'phang
122a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// nyi ma'i lag pa gyen du ni// gar me'i rnam par bzung bar bya// oM su nI te swA hA/ lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas ni// 'jigs dang ni rnam shes sbyar// nyi ma'i log pas bzung nas ni// dri yi phyag rgyas
122b1(rgyud 'grel): byug par bya// oM hUM swA hA// nyi mu'i khu tshur brtan bcings nas// dkar po dang ni ye shes sbyar// sor mo lhag ma g+hen du brkyang // me tog phyag rgya'i rnam par bya// oM shri swA hA/ me tog phrag de nyid kyi//
122b2(rgyud 'grel): dung dag bskum par bya// bdag nyid chen po mchod pa'i dus// bdug smos phyag rgya'i rnam par bya// oM aHswA hA/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur brtan bcings nas// de yi mthe bong gyen du bsgreng // mar me'i phyag rgyar shes
122b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ste// ye shes sgron me rab tu bzung // oM k+ShuM swA hA/ thal mo gyen du byas nas ni// mthe bong gnyis no dbus su bsten// tshigs bcad med pa'i phyag rgya yis// zhal zas dkyil 'khor modun du'o//
122b4(rgyud 'grel): oM oM swA hA// de nyid mthe bong ngos su bzhag/ gau ti ri me yi ni phyag rgyar 'gyur// oM gu swA hA// oM hUM swA hA/ rdo rje gzung ba'i sngags so// oM ho swA hA// dril bu 'dzin pa'i sngags so// nyi mas rdo rje cung zad gson
122b5(rgyud 'grel): zla bas drilnga bu bzung bar bya// pad kor sngon du byas nas ni// blo ldan tshigs bcad 'di brjod bya// rdo rje gser bre mdzes pa yis// sems can rnam 'grol bya ba ste// snying po'i rdo rje bzung bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur
122b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bcings nas// rgyob dang rgyab tu sbyar por bya// sa gdugs pad+ma dkris nas ni// dkar po dang ni 'gi bang sgreng // hUM yig gis ni g.yo bar bye// oM badz+ra g+hat+ne ra Ni ta pra ra Ni ta/ saum+bA ra ni ta sarba bud+d+ha
123a1(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyAnaHsa ta/ bAdz+raT+TA mr-i tA nA s+yAt+mAH bdUd+hA ra mu shA d+had+ha na d+hun+d+han+d+ha hAHAr+d+haswAhA/ rdo rje la bu 'dzin pa'i sngags so// panas br-i bu g+h+ra khyA sh+mash+tsa// nAm
123a2(rgyud 'grel): ma la bdag sems can sgrol mdzad byig 'tshal bskyob// thams cad dag skyes gcig gi ngo bor phyag 'tshalo bstod// 'khor ba'i rmyi mtsho'i rmongs pa gcad la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nyid gcig bur rtag tu
123a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'dung phyag 'tshal rje stod// b+h+yo gi yi ge lha yi mchog/ hUM gi yi ge spro ba'i gnas// hUM gau yi ge stong pa'i dngos// hUM gri smr-i ger phyag 'tshal bstod// mnyam par bzhag par byasanA m+bi/ yan lag lnga
123a4(rgyud 'grel): bya bya'o// oM namaHten+te/ nam+b+ha mAd+h+waM/ naM mo na mats+tsha/ oM ban+d+haD+haM kA nI bA dza u bas+thA nI s+yA/ At+mA na/ nin tA A mr-i au A ts+tshor+yApU dza u byAs+t+rA nAsa?/ Ad+hA naM/ nI ra ya tau sA mi au saM ka l+yA saH
123a5(rgyud 'grel): rotwot+taya At+mA na~M/ nIR+ShA t+tha nA~Mr+m+mas ma yU stA/ sa mA ya ha~M sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag par skyabs su mchi bar gyi/ theg pa gsum po thams cad byung // rnal 'byor gas
123a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs mkha' 'bri mi// dpa'i bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid tsho// khyad par du ni slob dpon la// rtag por skyangs su mchi bar bgyi// rnam par ma snang mdzad mi bskyod pa// rin chen
123b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang 'jig rten dbang // de na yod grub pa la sogs pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// dus 'di nas ni bzung
123b2(rgyud 'grel): nas su// byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par gyi// tshul khrims
123b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum bslab pa ni// dge bya'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims kyang // so sor brtan por bdag gis bzung // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla med dkon mchog gsum
123b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i// sdom pa dring nas brtan par bzung // rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la 'dra// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgyu yang // de kho na nyid kyis so so bzung // slob dpon dag
123b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang bzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin dang nyin la dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtog tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs chen
123b6(rgyud 'grel): dag pa la// phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam chos so sor bzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom po thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las
124a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang ci nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni bla med mchog/ dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// sdom pa ma lus bzung bar bgyi// ma bsgral ba
124a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsgral bar bgyi// ma grol ba rnams bdog gis dgol// dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// de nas rang gi snying gar ni// hUM yig 'od ni 'bar ba pos ma//
124a3(rgyud 'grel): khrims gsum+b+ha ba yi lus rnams ni// me yis bsregs par rnam par bsgom// oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+maHswa b+hA wa shud+d+ho hAM/ blo dang ldan pas sngags tshig 'di'i// sngags kyi don la'ang rnam par dpyad// chos
124a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sku yi ngo bo nyid// stong pa nyid du zhu ba ste// longs spyod rdzogs bya'i sku bskyed la// drag dang yid kyis bsam par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi ji bzhin rim// glu rnams kyis ni bskul bar bya// dzaHdzaHdzaHrdo rje sems
124a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' badrag la nges par 'jug pa grub par mdzod// ha hau ha hi/ hUM gi yi ge sgrogs pa'i dam tshig las byung bdag gi mgon// bo ba bya ba rdo rje gsal bar gsong ba lAs ni byung ba'i sku 'dzin pa// a a a a
124a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshar shin tu mnyes pa'i a li gcig tu thim pa'i hU~M/ de nas glu ni 'gags rjes su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// ka sogs las ni byung ba yi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o// mtshan nyid thams
124b1(rgyud 'grel): cad yongs su rdzogs// dpe med g.yo ba med par brjod// ye shes nga rgyal brjod pa yi// byang chub sems kyang bsgom par bya// dz+nyA no haM/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// hUM yig las byung rdo rje ste// dwe yi
124b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su'ang hUM yig ni// bsams nas sku yi nga rgyal bya// oM badz+ra shud+d+ha sarba d+har+m+ma badz+ra shud+d+ho ha~M/ de ltar rdo rje de nyid kyi// hU~M yig 'od zer 'phos pa las// sems can khams kyang yang dag sbyangs// slar yang de nyid
124b3(rgyud 'grel): du ni bsdu// sdigs pas bsdus pa'i dri ma theg/ sdigs 'di nyid ni brjod par bya// oM birta me no haM hoHde nas rnal 'byor nA mkha'i mgon// blo ldan yid kyis bsgom par ba// g.yon da g.yas dang rtsa ba'i zhal//
124b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sprin 'khrigs pa yi 'od dang mtshungs// spyan gsum bzhad dang khro ba dang / sgeg pa yi ni nyams kyis spras// sems dpa'i skyil krung gdan la ni// shes rab yan lag 'khyud
124b5(rgyud 'grel): cing 'grogs// meda'o ni gyen du dkod pA ste/ gnyis pa yi ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa yis ni rdo rjer bcas// g.yon gyi gyen du gzhu 'dzin cing // gnyis pa na ni thod pa ste// gsum pa yis nA dril bu dka'o//
124b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyun rnams kun nas yang dag rdzogs// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas brgyan// ral pa dar gyis dkris pa ste// thod pa'i cod pan shin brtsegs// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// shes rab bdag nyid rnam par
125a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// phyag gnyis kyis ni mgrin pa 'khyud// ma mchu tshems kyi 'debs par mdzad// zhabs kyis tshogs kyis dkris nas ni// rdo rje pad+mar tshim par mdzad// mdor bsdus cig tu
125a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom nasA ni// sngags 'di nyid ni brjod par bya// oM ud+d+ha bo hi/ oM yau ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harma yo pa shud+d+ho haM/ oM dz+nyA nA krA yo haMHba dran gsum+ba pa'i phyag rgya yis// mkhas pas yan lag brgyad bsrung bya//
125a3(rgyud 'grel): lce la chu yi sa bon te// spyi bor me ni bzhag par bya// rna bai snA la de bzhin rlung // mig dag la ni sa ni sbyar// chu skyes sa bon yi ge nI// mgrin pa la ni nges por dgod// brtsegs pa'i sa bon shin tu mdzes// dpu
125a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis la yang dag gnas// snying gar rlung ni brtsigs pa ste// mkhas pas rtag tu dgod par bya// bsdus te mo brtsegs sa bon ni// lte ba'i phyogs su rnam par gnas// lus gsum byin gyis brlab pa yi//
125a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di nyid ni brjod par bya// oM badz+ra kA ya swa b+hA wa At+ma ko ha~M/ oM badz+ra kA yai hiHoM badz+ra wI ka aHoM badz+ra tsit+ta hUM/ pad+ma dang ni ye shes sbyar// sa gdugs dang ni rnam shes sbyar// gnyis po
125a6(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog ltar byas te// lhag ma ba dan gsum brkyang nas// dri ma gsum dang dud pa sbyar// rdo rje rtse lnga zhes bya bas// lus kyi gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab// snying ga mdzod spu dag dang ni// mgrin
125b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs dpa las// sa ma ya N+Dots+tshat+s+ya d+h+waM/ sam+b+ha sastAM/ ad+hItISh+Thasa? s+yA m+b+ha snu ma rgyas dang lus dang byAg+har+N+Na ne// bdag nyid mngon par dU t+yA s+yA s+yA// b+hin+tas sgeg mo sogs kyis mchod//
125b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid mchod pas mchod par bya// gtor maM u li'ang dbul bar bya// me tog bdug spyos la sogs rim// g.yas pas rdo rje cung zad glasor// g.yon pas dril bu dkrol bar bya// yang dag phun sum tshe
125b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i// mnyam par bzhag pos tshig 'dis bstod// 'phrog byed gtsug gi cod pan gyi nor bus zhabs gnyis snang bar mdzad// sku la shAn tu n+da dam du 'khyud pa'i dril bu las byung sku 'dzin pa// g.yo zhing spos
125b4(rgyud 'grel): bas bskyod pa'i gsang ba las byung pad+ma ldan// de 'di rdo rje sems dpa' mtshig gi dbang phyug gi gnas/ zhes pa dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sngags pas stong pa nyid bsgoms nas// 'byung ba bzhi
125b5(rgyud 'grel): yits+tshakyil 'khor ni// yu~Mk+Shu~M su~M hU~M las byung ba// steng nas steng du yang dag gnas// gzhung zur gsum zlum po dang // de bzhin gru bon nyid dang ni// na mkha' me dang kun da'i mdog gser gyi kha dog ji bzhin rom/
125b6(rgyud 'grel): de yau sa su spyan pa ste// sa sngon tu hUM sgrings d+h+ya// rgya rjes rin chen kun rang bzhin/ l+le gi brgyad kyi mi na shin tu mdzes// mig pa g.yas pa 'byung ba ni// sbyin pa'i snying du yang dag gnas// oM hUM na
126a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis// ldan lngar byin gyis brlab par bya// de las khang brtsegs bsam pa ni// rin pa che ni kun gyis brgyan// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// d+hU babasdu bzhi yis
126a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa ste// dru ba dra phyed sogs kyis mtshan// dril chung gi ni dri bas brgyan// ske dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su rdo rje zla ba la gnas pa'o// steng nas seng ge rmya bya dang // dang ba'i rgyal po chu srin te// rgyal
126a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshon brgyad rnams kyis ni spras// dar gyi phreng ba'i lda ldis brgyan// blo dang ldan pas gru bzhi ru// tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab par bya// zur gyi thig ni gdab bya zhing // de las gzhan sa yang sgo thag gdab/
126a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhug nus// rtsa ba'i thig rnams gdab par bya// 'khor lo'i drug tsho rnams kyis ni// sgo ni mdzes par 'gyur ba'o// skye yi lnga ma rnams kyis ni// rdul tshon sa ni rab tu brtags// de yi tshad
126a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang mnyam par 'gyur// de yi nyis 'gyur stegs bur bya// bzhi po stegs bu'i phyed kyis ni// rin chen snam bu'i thig tu 'gyur// lnga pa stegs bu dang ni mtshungs// drug pa bdun pa de yi phyed// sgo yi thig
126a6(rgyud 'grel): las phyi rol tu// g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos kyi tshe ro// tshad ni re ras dor nas ni// snam bu drug gi thig rnams gang ba// bdun pa'i thig las phyi rol tu// tshad ni bcu drug dor bar bya// khor yug zlum po
126b1(rgyud 'grel): i ni thig/ lte ba'i don ni mdor bsdus pa'o// de nas tshad ni gsum dor nas// pad+ma'i thig gis bskor bur bya// de nas tshad gnyis dor nas nI// rdo rje phreng bas bskor bar bya// de nas tshang bzhi dor nas ni// 'ab
126b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phreng bas bskor bar bya// de yi phyi rol tshad lnga yis// dkar min yan lag la sogs pa// de yi phyi rol de tshad kyis// dur khrod kyi ni sa bzhir 'dod// de yi phyi rol thod phrengs// tshad ni gsum du 'gyur
126b3(rgyud 'grel): 'o// phyi rol dkyil 'khor tshad rnams kyis// brgyad rnams snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro// blo dang ldan pos gru bzhi ru// rtsa ba'i thig rnams gdab par bya// de yi cho lnga rnams kyi sa// sgo yi thig tu 'gyur
126b4(rgyud 'grel): dA'o// yod na sgo ni drug cha ru// de yI tshad du mngon par brjod// rtswa ba'i thig las phyi rol tu// tshad gcig yongs su dor bu nI// re khA lnga yi sA ru bshad// mkhas pa yis ni thig gdab bya// dwe yi
126b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol tshad gnyis dor// stegs bu'i thig ni gdab par bya// de yi phyi rol tshad cig ni// dor bar rin chen snam bu'i theg/ de yi phyi rol stegs bu'i tshod// do shal snam bu'i tshad du 'gyur// de yi phyi rol
126b6(rgyud 'grel): tshod gcig dang // tshad gcig dor bas mda' yab gnyis// pu shud yi ni rnam du'o// sgo yi thig las phyi rol cha ri// tshad gcig nas bzung gcig gi mthar// blo dang ldan pas ngos gnyis su// snam bu'i thig
127a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams gdab par bya// de nas gzhan yang brjod par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi thig rnams ni// rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du yang // zlum po'i thig gis bskor bar bya// tshad gsum yongs
127a2(rgyud 'grel): dor nas ni// rtsa ba'i thig ni bskor bar bya// de nos tshad gsum dor nas ni// zlum po'i thig ni bskor bar bya// khor yug gsum gyi thig rnams ni// nang du kun nas gsum rnams te/ rdo rje phreng ba'i tshon gyi sra//
127a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes bskor te brgyan par bya// khang po brtsegs pa'i dbus su ni// seng ge'i gdan gyi rnam par spras// shar dang byang sogs re mig la// glang po la sogs gdan rnams dgod// dbang ldan me sogs re mig
127a4(rgyud 'grel): la// seng ge la sogs gaud na rnams dgod// glang po rma bya mkha' lding dang // mngag gzhug pa'ang ji bzhin rim// seng gau phag dang ma he dang // ce spyang gi ni gdan rnams dgod// lha mo bzhi po rnams kyi ni// ro gdan
127a5(rgyud 'grel): du ni brtag par bya// rdo rje ru ba'i phyi rol du// dkyil 'khor khrag ltar dmar ba la// pad+ma zla ba nyi shu rnams// de yi gdan du bsam par bya// de yi phyi rol zlum po ste// khor yug gser mdog kun nas 'bar//
127a6(rgyud 'grel): ke rus 'jigaso byed la sogs rnams// bang zla nyi shu rnams la'o// phyi rol sgo dang zur rnams su// dbugs las phyung ba rnam par bsgom// mkho' lding de bzhin dang pa dang // khyu mchog glang po ji bzhin rim//
127b1(rgyud 'grel): sna sbyangs bu dang m+b+hi dang rgyu// chu srin nyid kyang bsgom+b+ha par bya// sa b+h+yon mtshan ma las byung ba'i// dbus su rnal 'byor na mkha' gtso// dngos po thams cad bsgom par bya// sbyar gyi mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa'i//
127b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid bya// rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo'i gtso// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mnyam par bzhag pas thugs gar bsam// rang rang sna bon ji bzhin rim// dkyil 'khor rnam
127b3(rgyud 'grel): ni spro bar bya// rdo rje drag mo ro longs ma// gtum mo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyang // de rnams dbugs las phyung nas ni// 'gro don byas nas bzhag par bya// ye shes gzigs pa rab sbyin pa'i// byang chub sem
127b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bya// kun mkhyen lam gyi yan lag brgyad// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// mdun dang g.yon pa nyid dang ni// rga ba dang de bzhin g.ya sr-i ste// dkar dang ser dang dmar bo dang // nag po'i phyags
127b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dag tr-i shu lnga gzugs// rol pa skyil krung phyed pa dang // tsog puM pus mo gdon la'o// skra ni sil bur grol ba ste// rang rig mnyam pa 'khyud cing gnas// g.yas pas pad+ma'i snod bsnams te// gauyon
127b6(rgyud 'grel): pas kha T+wAM ga ni 'dzin// mi yi pagaspa bstod g.yo Da te// glang po'i baDa bas shaM thabs can// sku la rgyan rnams tham cad// spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras// dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ma// chu brtsegs li ni rnam par sprul// kha dog
128a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar dang ser ba ste// rol pa yi ni stabs kyis gnas// zhal ni mche ba gtsigs pa ste// spyan gsum khros pa'i gzugs can no// g.yas pas ral gri gyon du ste// g.yon
128a2(rgyud 'grel): pas sdig mjug zhags pa'o// na bza' dmar po legs par mnabs// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni brgyan// 'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs 'od kyis// bdud rnams thams cad seg par byed// mer ni lha mo stag mo ni//
128a3(rgyud 'grel): su brtsegs la ni yang dag byung // kha dog dkar zhing sngo ba ste// zlum po'i stabs kyis yang dag gnas// phyag gnyis drag tu bzhad pa ste// spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan// ljags kyu sdigs mdzub zhags pa
128a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ na bza' dmar po yis ni brgyan// bden bal lha mo ce spyang ma// rlung brtsegs la ni yang dag byung // kha dog sngo zhing dmyur ba ste// spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras// g.yas na dag sta yang dag ldan// g.yon
128a5(rgyud 'grel): bas sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// skyil krung phyed pas yang dog bzhugs// na bza' dmar po yis ni brgyan// rlung gi mtshams suM 'ug pa ma// me brtsegs la ni yang dag byung // kha dog dmar zhing ser ba
128a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ tsog pu'i gdan la yang dag gnas// dbyug pa sdig mdzub zhags pa dang // spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan// sku la'ang brgyan rnams thams cad dang // na bza' dmar po yis ni brgyan// shar
128b1(rgyud 'grel): byi sgor ni mkha' 'gro ma// phum yig sa don las byung ba// kha dog dkar po 'bar ba che// dbu skra sril bu yis ni brgyan// phyag gnyis kha ru bcug pa ste// spyan gsum gyis ni legs par brgyan// na bza' dmar
128b2(rgyud 'grel): po legs par ma drabs// sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag gnas// byang du lha mo mar me mA// sems dpa'i skyil krung ya nga ya drag gnas// kha dog sti mo 'bar ba che// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni brgyan//
128b3(rgyud 'grel): nA bza' dmar po legs par mnabs/ phyo yAMg sa bon las 'khrungs ma// thal sbyar spyi bor bzhag pa'o// nub kyi sgor ni 'jigs byed ma// kha dog dmar mo 'bar ba che// snyim pas khrag ni 'thung ba ste/
128b4(rgyud 'grel): phreM yig las ni rnam par sprul// lho yi sgor ni 'phro byed ma// khaM dog nag mo 'bar ba tshe// phyag gnyis kyis ni gtun shing 'dzin// phreM yig las ni rnam par sprul// rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol du// se bon haMH
128b5(rgyud 'grel): hUMdz+dzalas sprul// spros mi 'ju byed gtum mo ni// shar gyi phyogs su bsgom par bya// dka r-i dang sgro dang gser gyi mdog/ spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spros// phyag gnyis thod por gnas pa yI// bdud
128b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i btung ba'i 'dzin pa'o// drag mo khrag 'thung sha gsol ma// byang gi phyogs su gnas pa ste/ kha dag ser dang dkar dang dmar// g+ha~M g+hAHsa bon las byung ba// lcags kyu lnga yis gang ba yi// pad+ma'i snod ni mchog
129a1(rgyud 'grel): tu 'dzin// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi gdan// spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras// nub kyi phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma// drag shul 'bar ma mi sdug ma// phyag na 'jigs rung gtor ma'i
129a2(rgyud 'grel): snod// ku ru'i sa bon las byung ba// dmar dang ser dang na mkhri'i mdog/ thod pa'i cod pan dag dang ldan// sems dpa'i skya laM krung gi ni gadran// spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras// thong ma rdo rje bum pa ma// lho yi
129a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su kun nas gnas// bad+d+he lci gsum las byung ba// thod par bza' dang btung ba bsnams// sde dang dA mar dang dkaro po'i 'ong // sems dpe'i skyil mo krung gi gdan// dbang ldan du ni sgeg mo bzhag/ hUM yig
129a4(rgyud 'grel): so bon les byung ba// kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes// dku gnyis la ni yang dag brten// de yi g.yon nas dri chab ma// dri yi dung dang yang dag ldan// khwa dog dmar mo shin tu mdzes// hU~M yaM gaM sa bon lus byung
129a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// me ru gnas pa'i bi waM ma// pi wa~M de ni sgra yi mchog/ hUM hoH'i sa bon las byung ba// kha dog dkar mo yid 'ong ma// de yi g.yon gnas me tog ma// thal mor me tog shin tu mdzes// shr-i yige
129a6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon las ni 'khrungs// kha dog sngon mo kun nas 'bar// bdeni bral gnas pa'i klu ma ni// kha dog sngon mo kun nas 'bar// hUM hUM yi ge las byung ma// dkar po bskyod de glu len byed// de yi g.yon gnas
129b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dug spos ma// kha dog dmar mo yid 'ong ma// i yig sa bon las ni byung // phyag gis bdug spos snod ni 'dzin// rlung du gnas pa'i gar ma ni// kha dog dmar mo yid 'ong ma// hUM yig sa bon las byung ba//
129b2(rgyud 'grel): lag gnyis gar ni byed bzhin ma// de yi g.yon gnas mar me mra// kha dog ser mo kun tu 'bar// k+ShuM yis sa bon las 'khrungs ma// mar me'i mchod sdong dang ni ldan// phyi rol zlum po'i gdan rnams la//
129b3(rgyud 'grel): rus la sogs dogod par bya// rang rang sa bon las byung ba/ sems dpa'i skyil krung gis ni gnas// dpa' bo thams cad phog bzhi pa// thod pa yis na thong du byas// dbu ska se ro po byin du ldan// spyan
129b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis ni rnam par spras// g.yas pa'i phyag na thod pa ste// g.yon pa yis ni lha mor 'khyud// phyag/ g.yas na ni kha T+wAM go/ g.yon pas rtse gsum gyen du 'dzin// lha mo thams cad phyag gnyis ma// kha
129b5(rgyud 'grel): drog sa bon 'od rnams mtshungs// g.yas pa dpa' bo la 'khyud cing // lag pa g.yon na thod pa'o// shar du kaM yig las skyes pa// dkar min keng rus 'jigs byed de// kaM gi yi ge laso byung ba// yum ni pad+ma'i
129b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings can no// gnyis pa g.yas su pad dkar ma// kha T+wAM gau ya srin po ni// sa bon khaM yig las skyesa'o// de yi 'ango par sen rnon ma// khe yaug sa bon las byung ba'o// gsum pa g.yon gyis pad+ma li//
130a1(rgyud 'grel): gaM skyes sgra ni zad pa'o// de yi g.yon gyi pang gnas pa// khwa dog dkur mo sgra zab ma// byang du dril bu'i bya ba can// gaM yig sa bon las skyes pa'o// de yi brla yi steng gnas pa// ser
130a2(rgyud 'grel): mo g+haM skyes dril sgyu ma// gnyis pa g.yos su dgod pa ni// tsam skyes gtum pa'i dbang phyug ser// de la 'khyud pa'i lha mo yang // tsaM skyes pad+ma'i gdong ba ma// gsum pa g.yon gyi pad+ma la// ts+tsha yig las ni ser
130a3(rgyud 'grel): ka'i gdong // de yi pang gnas ser mo ni// tsI skyeswa so yis 'drol ba mo// nub tra kha dog dmar po ni// ming ni mngal skyes la dga' bo// dzi yig sa bon skyes pa// dre yi pang gnas dbyi mtho ma// gnyis pa g.yas kyi
130a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la// dz+haiM skyes dz+haiM yIg 'jigs par byed// do yI pang gnas dmar mo ste// mAng ni dz+nyA byed dga' ba mo// gsum po g.yon gyi pad+ma la// sa bon Ti las chu skyar za// de yi 'phang gnas dmar mo ste// sa bon TaM las
130a5(rgyud 'grel): zor cog brgyan// lha yi dbus kyi pad+ma l-I// sa bon thi las bsgregs pa can// de yI pang gonas sngon mo ste// sa bin thams cad las dor stabs dga'// gnyis pa gra yas kyi pad+ma la// sa bon DaM las cad te 'dul//
130a6(rgyud 'grel): de yi 'phang gnas yan lag sngo// rnga yi sgra la dga' bam// gsum pa g.yon gyi pad+ma la// D+ha skyes rnga chen ltad mo can// de yi 'phang gnas yan lag sngo// rnga bo che yi rol byed ma// dbang ldan g.yas kyi
130b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la// taM skyes rjod lnga dga' ba dgod// de yi pang gnang granas ser mo ste// byin phra ma ste taM las byung // de yi g.yon gyi pad+ma la// sa bon tho las lag rings te// de yi pad du gnas pa ni// kha dog dkar mo
130b2(rgyud 'grel): gamo sgrogs mo// me yis g.yas kyi pad+ma la// daM skyes mche ba gtsigs pa ca no// de yi pang gnas dkar mo ni// daM las skyes pa'i 'od rlom// de yi g.yon gyi pad+ma lnga// d+h+r-i sgras brten pa 'jigs rung can//
130b3(rgyud 'grel): de yI pang par gnas pa ni// sngon mo'i 'od can dal sgyu mo// badren bral g.yas kyi pad+ma la// pi skyes zas la spyod byed ma// de yi bong par gnas pa ni// 'od sngon mig ni ser skya mo// de yi g.yon gyi pad+ma la/
130b4(rgyud 'grel): phuM skyes gdong ni rgyas pa dgod// de yi pang par gnas pa ni// dmar mo'i 'od can mig rgya sdo ma// rlung go g.yas kyi pad+ma la// baM skyes tshangs pa'i dbyangs can dgod// de yi spang du gnas pa ni// dmar
130b5(rgyud 'grel): mo g+ho nyan gyi lus can ma// de yi g.yon gyi pad+ma la// b+hi ser 'jigs pa'i sgra can te// de yi spang na gnas pa ni// sa bon b+haM las bud sgra ma// sa bo ni haM skyes mkha' dbang ni// kha dog sngon po 'bar ba che//
130b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ral gri dbyug pa dung // phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spros// ral pa'i cod pan yan lag mdzes// shar sgor khyab 'jug dgod par bya// de yi g.yas kyi ngos su ni// sa bon lam las dpal mo dgod//
131a1(rgyud 'grel): ser mo thod ni lhag par bcings// mi 'jigs pa dang chu skyes 'dzin// khyab 'jug g.yon du phag mo ste// baM yig las ni mngon par sprul// phag gi gdong can khros pa'i gzugs//
131a2(rgyud 'grel): b+ho b+hitsad can gyis ni spras// ba dog sngon po 'brar ba che// ser po'i gos ni 'dzin la dga'o// glu yon pa na ni thong khrag ste// g.yas pa yis nI mi mgo 'dzin// byang gi sgor ni tshangs pa ste// kha dog ser po 'bar /
131a3(rgyud 'grel): oM yig sa bon las skyes pa// ral pa'i cod pan gyis ni brgyan// phyag bzhi pa lnga gdong bzhi pa// g.yon na pad+ma spyi blugs ste// mchog sbyin dang ni bgrang phreng yang // lag pa g.yas pa yis ni 'dzin// tshungs pa'i
131a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi ngos su ni// tshangs ma gser gyi mdog can te// sa bon po yig las skyes pa// pad+ma dang ni rnga yab 'dzin// tshangs pa'i g.yon gyi ngos su ni// dbyangs can ma ni spyad khu'i 'od// sa bon sa yig las
131a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i// g.yon gyi ut+pal gsar pa 'dzin// sa bon hUM daM shaM las byung // 'byung po kha dog dkar zhing 'bar// dbang phyug nub kyi sgo ru ste// phyag bzhi yis ni rnam pa r-i spras// g.yus na ba dan cang te'u ste//
131a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na mdung dang thod pa'o// stag lpags bla gos phrag par gzar// zla phyed ral pa'i cod pan can// spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras// 'phrog byed g.yas kyi ngos su ni// sa bon ma las dbang phyug
131b1(rgyud 'grel): khyu dog dkar po spyan gsum pa// bgrang phreng dang ni rtse gsum ldan// dbang phyug g.yon gyi ngo sA su nI// sa bon gaM byung gaM grA ma// dung dang kun da zla bar mtshungs// mchod sbyin dang ni chu skyed 'dzin// brgya byin lho yi
131b2(rgyud 'grel): sgo ru ste// sa bon sham las yang dag byung // kha dog dkar po 'brar ba che// spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgya ni// g.yes pa snying gar bkug pa yis// rdo rje rin chen gdugs 'dzin zhing // rin+da thang med
131b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i cod pan mdzes// lag pa g.yon na ut+pal// g.yon pas 'khyud de rol por byed// brgya byin gyi ni g.yas ngos su// dbang mo dkar mo maM las skyes// gdugs ni lag pa g.yas bra na// g.yon pas 'khyud
131b4(rgyud 'grel): de rdo rje 'dzin// brgya byin g.yon gyi ngos su ni// sa bon ti las thig le mchog/ ser mo 'khril zhing mchod sdong g.yon// g.yas pa yis ni lcags kyu 'dzin// dbang ldan zur du dang po ste// ser po i las yang dag
131b5(rgyud 'grel): byung // g.yas bkug snying gar rdo rje ste// g.yon bkug 'khyud cing rol par byed// bde byed me ni bdag por mtshungs// dbang po'i g.yos su dgod bIr bya// de yi g.yon du ri les byungat+ma// rtsom pa mo ni sngo bsangs
131b6(rgyud 'grel): me// sgra ni man da ra ba 'phyang // lag pa na ni me yang thogs// kum zhi yi go sa bon las skyes pa// me yi zur du lus ngan te// ser po 'khrel shing ljon shing g.yas// g.yas ni bi dza pU ra'o// lus ngan gyi ni
132a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas ngos su// baM skyes nur gyi blo gros ser// gson pas 'bras kyi snye mA ste// g.yas pa yis ni mi 'jigs sbyin// lus dAn gyi ni g.yon dros su// 'phrog ma ljang gu'i mdog
132a2(rgyud 'grel): tsan+da te// hUM yib sa bon las skyes ma// mchog sbyin mya ngan med pa 'dzin// bden bral 'byung po'i rgyal po ni// sa bon khaM las yang dag byung // g.yon paswa gi waM sdigs mdzub ste// g.yas pa yis ni dbyug pa
132a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// zla phyed dang ni thod pas mtshan// spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras// rus pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa ste// khro bo yi ni tshogs dang ldan// 'byung po'i ni g.ya sgyings su ni// lam skyes lam ka'i dbang phyug dkad // kha
132a4(rgyud 'grel): dog sngo bsnyungs 'bar bya che// thod pa'i cid pan gyen du brtsegs// lag pa g.yas na rtse gsum ste// g.yon pa na ni thong khrag go/ khros pa'i gzugs can 'jigs pa che// smyug gi pags pa'i shim thabs can//
132a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po yi ni g.yon ngos su// ram skyes khrag la dga' ba dgod// kha dog dmar po 'bar ba che// mtshan ma lang ka'i dbang phyug mtshungs// rlung du klu'i rgyal po ste// mgo bo rgyu yis rnam pUr brgyan// kha dog dkur
132a6(rgyud 'grel): po 'bar 'che// b+hur b+hu'i sa bon las sprul zhing // lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin te// g.yon pas de bzhin zhags pa 'dzin// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// rin po che'i thod kyi so brgyan// de
132b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi ngos su ni// dpal ldan longs spyod ldan ma ni// dmar mo sa bon b+h+rUM las byung // g.yas pa na ni rnga yang ste// g.yon bkug 'khyud cing rol par byed// 'o ma 'dzin la nges par blta// gdengs ka gsum
132b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi g.yon du oM las byung // ut+pa la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor ma// kha dog dmar mo 'bar ba che// gdengs ka gsum gyis rnam par spras// lag pa g.yas na ut+pal te// g.yon pa/
132b3(rgyud 'grel): bus mor 'phyang po yau// de yi phyi rol zla po'o zhing // dpa' bo bcu drug re mig ste// de la shar sogs re mig la// 'jig byed dkar min yan lag sogs// thams cad ro gdan shes par bya// phyag bzhi
132b4(rgyud 'grel): yis ni rnam par smras// rtse gsum rnal 'byor snod dang ni// kha T+wAM ga dang thig le'i lag/ dkar min yan lag kha dog gnag/ shar gyi re mig rnam bA ra g.yas gnas// g.yon gyi ngos gnas myo ngan mod//
132b5(rgyud 'grel): ser po'i 'od can rdo rje 'dzin// dbang ldan 'jigs rung shes bya ste// kha dog ser po 'bar ba che// g.yon nas rna ba mthong ba can// dra mar mo rtse gsum 'dzin par byed// gtum po byang gi re mig la// kha dog dmar
132b6(rgyud 'grel): po 'bar ba che// g.yon gyi ngos nas bde byed ma// se ra mo'i 'od can rin chen 'dzin// sdud byed 'jigs byed dmar mo ste// rlung gi re mig la shes bya// rlung shugs ma ni g.yon du gnas// rgyal mtshan ljang gu
133a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par byed// sgra sgrogs nub kyi re mig la// kha dog ser po 'bar ba che// g.yon gyi ngos su sgyu ma che// lag na zhags pa dkar po'i 'od// smyo byed bden bral re mig la// kha dog ston
133a2(rgyud 'grel): po 'bar ba che// g.yon gyi ngos nas 'bar ma ni// du ba'i mdog can ral gri 'dzin// thod can lho yi re migra la// kha dog ser po 'bar ba che// g.yon gyi ngos su dpal chen mo// nag mo dbyug pa 'dzin pa la// khro bo me
133a3(rgyud 'grel): yis re mig la// kha drog sngo bsangs 'bar ba che// g.yon gyi ngos gnas nag mo ni// sngon mo mdung thung 'dzin pa ma// stobs chen la sogs dpa' bo rnams// ro yi gdan la yang dag gnas// khA nAM ga dang rnal 'byor/
133a4(rgyud 'grel): snod// kham phor dang ni gri gug 'dzin// shar gyi zur mtha'i re mig la// stobs chen kha dog dkar po'o// dri yi g.yon du rab dang ma// ser mo zas nI 'dzin par byed// gshin rje'i ngos mtha'i re mig la// dril bu chen po'i
133a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug gnag/ de yis g.yon gnas aM bi ka/ g.yas pas kun nas gtor ma 'dzin// gshin rje bden bral dag gi dbus// sngon po ming ni trog gi rtse// de yi g.yon du ser sgyu ma// sngon mo til ni 'dzin pa can//
133a6(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi g.yas kyi re mig la// bi bi ta ka kha dog dmar// de g.yon lha mo rtsub mo ma// dmar ba'i 'od can chang ni 'dzin// nub kyi g.yon gyi re mig gnas// dmar mo gsang ni brtsegs pa yi// de g.yon rna bar reg
133b1(rgyud 'grel): byA ma// dmar mo ba dan wA ni 'dzin// rlung gi zur mtha' ri mgu la// ser bo ming ni sgrogs pa can// g.yon gnas skra ni brtsegs pa mo// ser po'i 'od can khrag ni 'dzin// nor gyi phyogs mtha'a'i re mig la// ser ze'i 'od can
133b2(rgyud 'grel): tshig legs brjod// g.yon gnas rig byed la 'jug mA// ser mo'i 'od can sha 'dzin ma// shar gyi zur mtha'i raM mig la// dbang phyug rgyal mtshan ser po'i mdog/ g.yon gonas dmar mo rgun byad ma// til dang 'bras/
133b3(rgyud 'grel): ni gsal bar 'dzin// de nas gzhan yang brjod par bgyi// bla ma rnams kyi mun ngag las// rgyud chen po yi rjes 'brang nas// du khrod rnams ni ji bzhin rim// shar gyi gdan ni bum pa'i dbyibs// drag tu gzhad par
133b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa ste// thod pa nyi shu rtsa bdun rnams// de la shing ni tsam pa ka/ sprin ni nges par sgra sgrogs b+ha// rkang pa mtshon tshwa ngan pa rgyo// de la nor rgyas bu ni ser// grub pa'i ral gri ce sbyong ste// tshangs pa chen mo dang bar
133b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// thod pa'i thig le 'thung bar byed// g.yas pas bgrang phreng 'dzin pa ste// g.yon pa na ni po ti 'dzin// de la ri ni lhun po ste// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba che// mchod rten kun pa'i mdog tu 'gyur// chu klung rgya che
133b6(rgyud 'grel): yi ni cha// bcud ldan dang ni rje rigs ma'o// byang du chu lha shes par bya// gdan ni gru bzhi pa rnams te// thod pa rnams ni nyi shu bzhi// ri bo ser po ma la ya// 'ug pa ro dang stag dang ni// 'dab chags dang ni sgrub
134a1(rgyud 'grel): ba bo// mchod rten da/ dang cu rteb shing // 'dzeg po dkar blo chur ba 'debs// drag mo khyu mchog bzhon pa can// mdung thung dang ni bgrang phreng 'dzin// thig le'i snod ni gtsang ma 'jom/
134a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu klung bcud ldan gting mi rtogs// ShaSh+T+rA ki nA~M/ nub kyi phyogs su nye rgyu la ma// gdan ni gzhu yi dbyibs su'o// thod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // sprin ni e shrId+d+ha 'joms pa// gsar ba'i ro dang phag bya dang // de la
134a3(rgyud 'grel): stospobs rgyu bcu de ldan grug/ ke la shwa dring mchod rten dkar// chu klong ma ni ne rany+dza// dkar me glang po la zhon pa// g.yas bris rdo rje dkar po 'dzin// lha mo'i g.yon pas gdugus 'dzin cing // thod pa'i thig la
134a4(rgyud 'grel): ster zhing blta// ke r+dz+nyA Ta nI/ grwa shrin rjer kaul+lA gi ri shing // ka ra~M bai rA ser po'i mdog/ gdun ni zur gsum dbyibs su ste// thod pa rnams ni bco brgyad do// steng du drag po'i tshogs rnams te// sa 'og pad+ma mAn
134a5(rgyud 'grel): dUr// chu klung zla dwa'i tshe dang ni// seng gi ngagi dang mA he gnas// nya ni lcags kyus 'dzin pa'o// thing khrag 'dud rtsi ster zhing blta// chang 'tshong ma ni blto bar bya// dpeng ldan de wi ko Ta ste// de la gdan ni zlum bya'o//
134a6(rgyud 'grel): thod pa bcu gnyis shes par bya// bya rgod bol ba de bzhin phag/ pad+ma chen po gang ba dang // ro langs 'byung po'i dngos grub ste// de la ri bo dbang chen po// mchod rten dkar pos nye bar mtshan// gtum mo gri gug mgo bo 'dzin//
134b1(rgyud 'grel): rolongs kyang ni yongs su gnas// tho pa'i thig lo ster zhing 'dzin// chu klung ming ni gang ldan no// d+hA nu ba ri dang sha no// myA ya m+b+hatshams s+yA tsa radz+nyA// gdan ni g+ha bzhi pa yin to// thod pa rnams ni bcoM lnga'o// karan+ta sha
134b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs byed sprin// khyi dang gtsang byed gyen du 'barnya// ril bu snod dang bcas pa ste// dung skyong chu klung drag shul can// ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang ngo // gzhan nu ma dang mchod rten dmar// rma byA yongs su gnas pa'o// thod pa nas ni/
134b3(rgyud 'grel): thog le ster// lha mos mdung thung mda' cheni 'dzin// pra d+h+we NI'o// srin po'i zur du rgyal ba mo// 'khyil pa dang ni nim pa'i shing // gdan ni dung gi rnam pa ste// de la thod pa drug ni sbyar// dam dang rkang 'gyogs dngos grub
134b4(rgyud 'grel): po// rigs ldan dang ni mdung gos 'bigs// ri bo gang ni brtsegs pa dang // chu klung ming ni stobs ldan no// gzigs gnas khyab 'jug sngo bsangs la// thod pa nas ni thig le stor// dbyug pa 'khor lo g.yon dang
134b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas// mchod rten dmar pos rnam par spras// d+ho bi nA daR+Ya naM/ rlung gi zur du rab sbyor ba// gtum po'i 'o ma 'thung bar byed// de la gdan pad+ma'i dbyibs thod pa rnams ni bcu dgu ste// re langs hu lu hu lu dang // blo Ta kyil
134b6(rgyud 'grel): khulung bur 'jug/ mchod rten sngo bsangs mdog tu 'gyur// de la dpal gyi ri bo che// seng gau la gnas rgan byed ma// sngon mo thod pa'i bdud rtse ster// la go na ral gri rtse gsum ste// chu rlung tsar man da dang na ldan// ma ta
135a1(rgyud 'grel): ga ni dAR+Ya ni// dragra po nag po dkar myin shar// rgan byas ma sogs 'khor gyis bskor// dkar drang ser dang dmar dang sngo// g.yon bskor gyis ni yang dag gnas// byang du drag po
135a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po sder// rgyal ma la sogs pa yi bskor// ser drang dmar dang sngo dang dkar// g.yon skor gyis ni yang dag gnas// nub tu lha byin mnyam du sten// nag mo bzang mo sogs kyis bskor// dmar dong gnag dang
135a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar dang ser// g.yon skor gyis ni yang dag gnas// lhor ni nag po dmar po'i mdog/ dbang mo la sogs yongs su bskor// sngo dang dkar dang ser dang dmar// g.yon skor gyis ni yang dag gnas// dbang ldan
135a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas su btsigs pa ni// kha dog dkar dang ser ba can// sum cu dbang sogs lha mo ni// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang sgo// sreg za'i gnas su 'jig byed ni// kha dog dkar dang sngo ba can// lhag mo drag mo'i gzugs/
135a5(rgyud 'grel): can sogs// sngo dang dkar dang ser dmar// bden bral du ni dga' las 'das// kha dog nag dang dumar ba can// lha mo thod pa ma la sogs// dmar dang gnag drang dkar dang ser// rlung du log par 'dren pa ni// kha dog
135a6(rgyud 'grel): ser dang ser ba can// lha mo ral gri'i lag pa sogs// dmar dang sngo dang dkar dang ser// dpa' bo rnams ni phyag bzhi pa// thod pa yi ni thig le ster// phyag ni gzhan pa gnyis po yis// mdung dang kha T+wAM ga ni 'dzin//
135b1(rgyud 'grel): rgan byung ma sogs lha mo rnams// lag pa rtse gsum dang ni snod// ral gri'i lag can la sogs bzhi// rang rang mtshon bye cha dang ni ldan// kun la ro dan shes par bya// mi yi rus pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan// 'jigs pa'i
135b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can gzi brjid canA// spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras// tshig 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang // ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// ye shes dkyil 'khor yod kyis ni// nu mo kha'i dkyil 'khor
135b3(rgyud 'grel): byasta~M bar bya// sbyar brjod khyo na tshig yis// thams cad du ni lha rnams dang // khyad par 'jig rten pa rnams la// dgug pa la sogs pa rnams bya// zla ba'i khu tshur brtan bcings nas// gi wang dri gsum gyen du skye
135b4(rgyud 'grel): dri ma gsum pa'i tshogs kyis ni// gsum par 'gri bang dgod biR+Sha bya// oM A~M kuR+Sha ni hUM phaT/ 'jig rten pa'i lha rnam dgug pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// lha rnams spyan drangs nas gdan dbul bar bya'o//
135b5(rgyud 'grel): lcag bA gnyis ni sbyar byas nas// pad+ma'i rnam par dbye bar bya// oM taSh+Ti A saM ne hU~M swA hU~M// gdan gyi phyag rgya dang sngags so// snying gor rdo rje dkar po bsam// zla dkyil dbus su bAlta bar bya// dam
135b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi phyag rgya rnams// rdo rje bcing ba las 'byung ste// g.yon pa khu tshur snying gar bya// g.yas pa mkho mtshon khung gzhug par bya// 'di ni dkyil 'khor thams cad la// thun mong du ni dam tshig 'gyur// oM
136a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUMHsa ma ya tiSh+ThaT+wA~M sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hU~MHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma s+yo hUM/ pad+ma dang ni ye shes sbyar// sa gdugs rnam shes kyis ni mnan// gnyis po lcags sgrogs bcings nas ni// lhag
136a2(rgyud 'grel): ma bA dan gsum pa bsgreng // dri gsum du ba sbyar ba ni// mgon pa'i dam tshig tu ni brjod// oM yo gAm+b+he ri dri sh+ya dzaSh+TahU~M baM hoHsa ma yo s+t+waM/ sa ma yo haM/ oM hUM swA hA/ rdo rje bcing ba brtan bcings nas// dri gsum gyen du ba gyen
136a3(rgyud 'grel): du bsgreng // snyems me rdo rje rnam par grags// lha mo'i rang gi dam tshig brjod// aM yo gAm+bA rI dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUMhUMHsa ma yo d+hardo rje bcing ba'i nang du ni// ye shes rnam shes sbyar te dgod// oM badz+ra DA
136a4(rgyud 'grel): kiM nI sh+ya dzAHhUM baM hoHsa me yo stAM/ sa ma yo hUM/ de nyid yAM shes rnam shes sgreng // 'di ni mkha' 'gro drag mor bshad// au gr-i rI TA kI nI ti sh+tsa dzaHhUM bAM hoHsa ma yu s+yAM/ sa ma yau hAM/ de ny+Nid pad+ma'i
136a5(rgyud 'grel): gdugs ni// rtsi sbyarar+ya mkha' 'gro ro langs ma'o// oM bat+tA l-I D+ha kI nI dI sh+ye dzahU~M hU~MHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma yo haM/ rdo rje bcing bi brtan byas nas// dri gsum du ba rtse mor sbyar// rin po che yi rnam par
136a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas// gtum mo'i dam tshig tu ni bshad// oM tsat+tA lA DA kI nI tr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM ba~M ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma yo haM/ rdo rje btsang ba brtan byas nas// dkar po gi wang sbrel bar bya// mgon pos gsungs
136b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag rgya ste// seng ge ma yi dam tshig btsang // oM sid+ha DA kI ni tI sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma yo haM/ phyag rgya de nyid brtan byas nas// dri gsum du ba rtse mor sbyar// rtse sbyar cung zad phye ba nA/
136b2(rgyud 'grel): stagra mo'i phyag rgyar rab tu grags// oM byA g+ha DA krI nI tr-i sh+ya dzAd+hIhUM bAM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma yo ha~M/ phyag rgya de nyid brtan bcings nas// sa gdugs pad+ma lcags sgrogs bya// mgon pos gsungs pa'i phyag
136b3(rgyud 'grel): r+g+ha ste/ tso spyod mA dam tshig / oM dzaM buk+ShA DA kr-In+t+r-i dzau sh+yA dzaHts+tshiHn+do/ sa ma yo b+h+yo// sa mo ya s+t+wa~M/ su ma pordo rje btsit+sA dA brtan bcings nas// lanA gsum+b+ha du ni dkrol bar bya/
136b4(rgyud 'grel): oM lu u lu kr-in+d+ha kIr+m+ma Na shU dzaHdz+dza sA m+b+ha yai s+t+wa~M/ saM ma yo ts+tsha/ rdo rje bcing ba brtan bcings pa// rnam par bya ste kha ru bzhug/ oM DA kI nI dzi sh+tsab+h+rUM po \u0f7fsa ma sa m+b+has ma mr-iSh+Ti/ thal mo spyi bor
