172b3(rgyud 'grel): lho sgo'i phyogasu gnas nas ni// gtum mo'i gzugasu sprul te 'phang // lag gnyis rdo rje dam bcings nas// spyi bo'i steng du gzung bar bya// pus mo'i rkang stabs ru sbal stabs// bskor ba dang ni bzlog stabs bya// hUM gi sa bon drag po ni// bzlas pas skra
172b4(rgyud 'grel): yis dgong bar bya// oM hUM a phaT/ shar gyi gnas su gnas nas kyang // slar yang 'phen pa'i stobs kyis sbyor// g.yas kyis rdo rje snying gar gzung // bdag nyid ye shas mkha' 'gro mar// bsgoms nas hUM zhes brjod par bya// g.yas brkyang 'dug/
172b5(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon brkyang 'dug/ g.yas brkyang bskum dang g.yon brkyang 'dug/ dbus dang 'og gi bgegs btsam nas// phur bu ra ba dra ba dang // go chas lus ni bsrung bar bya// ye shes mkha' 'gre bdag bsgoms te// sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag
172b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas// lag gnyis kun tu kha sbyar te// ser mo brkyang ste rtse mo sbyang // oM hU~M pu phaT/ dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas// ye shes rnam shes bsgreng bar bya// pad+ma sa gdug sbyar te brkyang // phyogs brgyad du ni bskor bar bya//
173a1(rgyud 'grel): oM dzam+b+ha ni hUM phaT/ ra ba chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor bdag nyid lag brkyang ste// der ni rdo rje brtags nas kyang // sa la gnas lngar bsrung ba yi// sa bog bduni sbyang bar bya// 'di ni snying la phur bus gdab pa'i
173a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o// oM hUM phuM phaT/ dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i che ga ste drug pa'o// / de nas bsngags pa bdag nyid ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i ting 'dzin la gnas// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// bum pa rnams
173a3(rgyud 'grel): la bsong gtor bya// bum pa dag ni bcu bzhir ba shad// de kho na nying mtshan nyid gsungs// bum pa chu yi bkang nas su// gang+gA'i mu ni 'gug par bya// oM tap+ta tap+te ma hA dap+te hUM swA hA/ lan bdun du ni bzlas pa yis// gang+gA sngagasu bsres pa yis//
173a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs dri dang me tog dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis bsre bar bya// shing lo myu gus kha brgyan nas// kun la stan ni sbyin par bya// ras bzung gis ni mgrin pa ru// dkris par rgya cher mdzes par bya// 'o ma dang ni bsres nas ni// me tog phreng bas sbyang
173a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// sa gdugs rnam shes rtse sbyar te// lhag ma gsum ni brkyang bar bya// dum pa kun la reg nas ni// sngags 'di lan bdun bar du bzlas// oM hUM suM kU yuM hUM swA hA/ bum pa bzhag pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o//
173a6(rgyud 'grel): shar la sogs pa'i phyogs brgyad du// de dag ming bzhin bzhag par bya// de nas slob dpon bdag gi lus// rdo rje na mkha'i rang bzhin bya// tshon chen so gas kyai gos dang ni// dar la sogs pa sar pas brgyan// lus ni kun tu brgyan nas kyang //
173b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas lnga yi cong pan bsgom// shin tu mnyam gzhag sems kyis ni// byang chub yan lag go cha bya// go cha dag ni bskon nas su// bsrung dang bcings pa dag tu bya// lag pa gnyis ni brkyang byas la// ye shes rnam shes sbrel bar bya// dang
173b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gshog pa'i tshul byas nas// snying ga'i drung du bskor bar bya// oM hUM pheM phaT/ go cha chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni// ji skad bshad pa gzung bya ste// de nyid gnyis kyis blangs nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag
173b3(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod// ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya ru// brkyang ba rdo rje zhes bya 'dis// yi ge brgyad po thams cad dang // btsos pas yan lag brgyad du bsrung // lce la chu yi sa bon te// nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la// sa ni mig la sbyar bar bya// de bzhin tshangs pa me
173b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba// mgrin par gti mug kho lo sgyur// bskyod pa snying gar yang dag gnas// nyon mongs kun tu nam tshong ste// phyugs ngag lte ba'i rtsa bar ro// yan lag brgyad po bsrungs nas ni// lha yis gzugs kyis bzlas par bya// me tog bdug pa dri
173b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas// bdag nyid kun tu mchod par bya// oM badz+ra kA yA hoHoM badz+ra bAHAHoM badz+ra hr-i ya hUM/ oM sa b+hA ba/ shud d+haHsarba d+harmA swA b+hA ba shud d+ho haM/ oM badz+ra shud d+haHsarba d+harmA badz+ra shud d+ha haM/ oM yo ga shud d+harmA sarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+he haM/ rdo rje zhes
173b6(rgyud 'grel): bya rdo rje'i bdag/ mngon par byang chub rim pa'o// bdag nyid mngon par byang chub pas// ril pa'i cho ga ste bdun pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor chen po brtsam// ri sogs rim gyis bskyed nas ni// sngags dang phyag rgyas rigs bzhin du// rnal 'byor
174a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang lha kun bsgom// rlung dang me yi bdun bton pa// rdo rje ma yi sa bon sbyar// sgra dang thig le yang dag mnan// 'byung ba bzhi pa bzhag par bya// bdun po'i don ni sngon bzhin sbyar// 'o ma'i rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur// sngon gyi rdo rje'i
174a2(rgyud 'grel): sa bon gyis// ri bo kun gyi bdag por sbyar// sngar gyi ye shes gnas kyi ni// rten gyi mchog ni sprul par bya// gser las byung ba'i grong khyer mchog/ rin chen bdun po rnams kyi sgras// g.yer ka'i dra ba phreng ba dang // dra ba dra phyed tshogs pas brgyan//
174a3(rgyud 'grel): dang por khang brtsegs bsgoms nas ni// dang po'i sangs rgyas ye shes dang // rnal 'byor ma kun dkyil 'khor dang // lha rnams bsgoms te sprul bar bya// dbus su seng ge'i gdan la ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan par// A li kA li'i sa bon
174a4(rgyud 'grel): las// dbu ma'i gzugs ni khyad par bskyed // zhal gsum dang ni phyag drug ste// sprin sngon 'od zer sdug par ldan// spyan gsum gzhang dang khro ba dang // sgeg pa yi ni nyams dang ldan// sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs// steng du mnga' ni dgod par
174a5(rgyud 'grel): bya gnyis pa 'khyud cing nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni rdo rje'o// g.yon gyi dang por gzhu dgod de// bdud rtsi chu yis yongs bkang ba// g.yon gyi gnyis pa'i mtshan ma yin// gsum pa na ni dril bu ste// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' klubs// ral pa dar gyis
174a6(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas su// thod pa'i tsang ban shin tu bcings// de ltar mtshan ma rnam drug dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa'i sku// sna tshogs me dpung 'bar ba can// sangs rgyas rnal 'byer na mkha' dgod// de yi stan ni shes rab ste// kha dog dkar zhing shin tu
174b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes// phyag gnyis mgrin par 'khyud nas su// ma mchu tshems kyi 'dengs par mdzad// zhabs kyi tshogs kyis dkris nas su// rdo rje pad+mar thim par mdzad// rnal 'byor na mkha' sangs rgyas ni// dbus su sems kyis 'di 'drar bsgom// ye shes shar
174b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi re'u mig la// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsams te// bdud rtsi yi ge las byung bas// glang chen dbang la rol pas bzhugs// kun da lta bur dkar ba'i 'od// rol po'i tshul gyis 'phen par bcas// phyag gnyis skra ni rnam par grol// sangs rgyas lnga
174b3(rgyud 'grel): yis shin tu brgyan// sku la sbrul gyis brgyan pa ste// spyan gsum khro bo'i hUM mdzad la// kha T+wAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod// 'od zer sna tshogs rab tu 'phrog/ sham thabs glang po'i pags pa ste// mi yi bgos pa'i na bze' mnabs// me yi dkyil 'khor
174b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan par// shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgom// de yi byang du lha mo ni// drag me me'i sa bon byung // kha dog ser mo shin tu mdzes// ha har gzhang cing gtsigs pa'o// sgra ni gyen du 'bar ba la// sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can// rma byA yi ni
174b5(rgyud 'grel): gdan stangs na// skyil krung phyed pas yang dag bzhugs// sku ni sbrul gyis brgyan pa ste// phyag gnyis kyis ni shin tu mdzes// kha T+wA~M gA ni rnal 'byor snod // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing // sham thabs glang po'i pags pa ste// mi yi pags
174b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i na bza' mnobs// oM shes byang gi phyogs char ni// mkha' 'gro drag mo bsgom par bya// ye shes nub kyi phyogs char ni// ro longs drag me'i hUM sgrogs ma// cog pu yi ni 'dug stangs kyis// bya khyung gi ni gdan la bzhugs// sku mdog
175a1(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo shin tu mdzes// phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i hUM sgrogs mdzad// skra ni 'bar zhing rnam par grol// sangs rgyas lnga yis shin tu brgyan// kha T+wAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod // sku ni sbrul gyi rnam par brgyan// glang po'i pags
175a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sham thabs can// mi yi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs// thig le sgra las sngon byung ba// nub kyi lha mo bsgom par bya// ye shes lho'i phyogs char ni// gtum me zhes bya'i lha mo ste// sku mdog sngon me shin tu drag/ ha ha ra bzhad pa 'jigs
175a3(rgyud 'grel): su rung // skyil krung phyed pa'i thabs kyis ni// bka' nyan gyi ni stan la bzhugs// sgra ni lkug pa kun tu rgyas// sangs rgyas lnga yis shin tu brgyan// phyag gnyis na ni ha har bzhad// me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// kha T+wAM ga gdang rnal 'byor
175a4(rgyud 'grel): snod // sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// gla mo'i pags pa'i sham thabs can// mi yi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs// thig le sgra las byung ba ru// gtum mo lho yi phyogasu bsgom// bang ldan lha mo seng ga ni// rol pa yi ni 'dug stongs
175a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis// seng ge yaM nI gdan la bzhugs// sku mdog gser zhing dkar ba ste// phyag gnyis khro bo'i hUM mdzad la// 'od zer me ltar gsal zhing 'bar// na bza' dmar pos shin tu mdzes// sbrul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par klubs// ral gri gyen du
175a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phyar ba dang // g.yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnabs// bdud rnams thams cad bsreg pa ru// sa bon las ni bsgom par bya// me mtshams lha mo stag mo ni// zlum po yi ni stang stabs kyis// rdo rje phag gdong stan la bzhugs// sku
175b1(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar zhing sngo ba ste// phyag gnyis shin tu khro dang bcas// na bza' dmar po mnabs pas mdzes// lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub bsnams// snang ba thams cad gdan gcod par// me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od can du// sa bon ston 'gro bsgom
175b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// bden bral lha mo lce spyang mo// skyil krung phyed pa'i stangs kyis ni// ma he'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste// sku mdog dmar zhing sngo ba la// phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par mdzes// dgra sta zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang // na bza' dmar po mnabs
175b3(rgyud 'grel): pas klubs// me yi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba can// ha har bzhad pas 'jigs su rung // sa bon las byung bsgom par bya// rlung mtshams lha mo 'ug pa mo// tsog pu yi ni bsdug stangs kyis// ce spyang gi ni gdan la bzhugs// sku mdog dmar zhing ser
175b4(rgyud 'grel): bste/ dbyug pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams// sku la na bza' dmar po gsol// sa bon las byung bsgom par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor re'u mig dgu// sgor ni mkha' 'gro ma bzhi ste// shar gya skar na mkha' 'gra ma bzhi ste/ shar gyi
175b5(rgyud 'grel): sgosbyor ni mkha 'gro ma// mi ro yi ni stan la bzhugs// sku mdog dkar mo shin tu 'bar// sgra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// lag gnyis kha ru bcug nas ni// rgyan rnams kun g+hini klubs// gos dmar bla yos phrag par gzar// puM zhes bya bas bskyed
175b6(rgyud 'grel): de bsgom// byang sgor lha mo mar me ma// stan no de dang 'dra ba ste// kha dog ser mo 'jigs chen mo// thal sbyar spyi bor bzhag pa dang // na bza' dmar pos rab mdzes par// pheM las byung ba bsgoms par bya// nub kyi sgor ni 'jib byad ma// yi dgas stan
176a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa s+ho/ l+h+wam da nga mar bab / sa khrug ni 'ju da// sacan sa sa byung ba ste// nan bsgru ba mdzad// 'brug byed pa na g+hu te// b+hur bsgyun rdzun pa bzhugs pa yis// klu ya ga/
176a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon mo cher 'bar ma// sku la na bza' dmar po bsnams// gri wang gtun shin bsnams pa ru// sa bon phreM las byung bar bsgom// bcu bzhi gnas kyi phyi rol tu// rnal 'byor ma ni nyi shu ste// rdo rje phreng bas mngon bskor te// rta babs dang ni dpral
176a3(rgyud 'grel): ba la// phyi rol gnas ni zlum po ru// pad+ma dang ni zla bar brten// oM ha he hrIH/ spos mo 'ju byed gtum mo che// bdud rtsi'i snod ni phyag na bsnabs// byang du g+h+raM g+ha/ drag mo khrag gsol sha gsol ma// lcags kyu lnga yis bkang ba yi//
176a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i snod ni bsgoms nas su// gcig gis steng nas 'gebs par mdzad// nub tu ku ru/ drag shul 'bar ma mi sdug ma// phyag na 'dam skyes gtor mos bkang // lhor ni bat+tA li hUM/ thos pa ma dang rdo rje ma// bum can bza' btung
176a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams shing 'gebs// hUM dbang ldan sgeg mo sgeg dang bcas// g.yon du 'gying dang bcas par bsgom// hUM sri dung chen min dga' me ste// dri yi phyag rgyas byug par mdzad// hUM hi me yi mtsham su pi wang ma// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rdung bar
176a6(rgyud 'grel): byed// sr-i ma me tog ma ste thal sbyar nas// bsdus te gyen du 'thor bar byed// hUM hUM bden bral du ni glu mkhan ma// dkar po bskyod cing glu len byed// oM bdug spos ma ste mkhrig ma nas// gzung nas gdug spos lta bur 'bul// d+hu rlung
176b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams gar ma zhes bya ste// g.yon du snyems shing sum 'byor byed// hUM mar me ma ste phyag 'tshal ba'o// thal mo snyim par sbyar ba'o// mchod pa'i lha mo nyi shu 'di// thun mong ji ltar mdzes par brtag/ ye shes kyi gdan+d+ha dang gzhan d+ha
176b2(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga ste brgyad pa'o// de las mkha' dbang shar du dgod// mdog sngon lag pa bzhi dang ldan// bya khyung gi ni gdan la bzhugs// ral pa'i thor tshugs nya
176b3(rgyud 'grel): bar brgyan// 'khor lo ral gri dbyug pa dung // sgro dpon du ni sprul pa yin// de yi g.ya su l-i las byung // dpal lha mo ni dgod par bya// mdog ser sgra ni lhag par bcings// g.yas pa mi 'jigs g.yon pad+ma// de yi g.yon du phag
176b4(rgyud 'grel): mo ni// yi ge baM las sprul pa ste// phag gi gdong can khros par ldan// thod phreng cod pan shin tu bcings// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar tshun mo// gos se raM dag la rab tu dga'// g.yon na thod pa khrag dang bcas// g.yas pa mi yi mgo
176b5(rgyud 'grel): bo gsol// byang sgor tsha ngas pa'i mi las byung // 'od zer dmar po shin tu 'ber// gdong bzhi pa la lag bzhi pa// tsid bran gyis ni nye bar brgyan// ngang pa'i stan la gnas pa ste// g.yas pa mchog sbyin bgrang phreng thog/ pad+ma ril pa'i
176b6(rgyud 'grel): blugs dang // rnga ma dag ni g.yon na thogs// de yi g.yas su baM las byung // tshangs pa mo de bdag por mtshungs// de yi g.yon du saM las byung // dbyangs can maR+sha ta'i 'od// lus ni me tog phreng bso brgyan// tam bu ra ni brdung zhing
177a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas// nub kyi sgo ru saM las byung // 'phrog byed dkar mo glang la zhon// stag lpags bla gos phrag par gzar// zla ba phyed pa'i dbu rgyan can// mig gsum mchog sbyin rnge'u chung dang // thod pa mdung gi lag pa brgyan// bkra shes
177a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra ni sgrogs pa dang // glu dang gar gyis rtag tu gnas// de yi g.yas su maM las byung // dbang phyug chen mo gtso bor mtshungs// 'on kyang de yi lag g.yas na// bgrang phreng dag ni thogs par bshad// de yi g.yon du shaM las byung // gang+gA'i lha mo
177a3(rgyud 'grel): gtso bor mtshungs// lag na mchog sbyin pad+ma thog/ sum cu gsum pas mchod pa yis// lho sgor aM las byung ba yis// brgya byin mdog ser cher 'bar ba// g.yas na rdo rje snying gar thogs// g.yon gyi rin chen gdugs thogs nas// lha mo la ni
177a4(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen te gnas// rin po che yi cod pan brgyan// de yi g.yas su iM las byung // dbang mo zhes bya bdag por mtshungs// skra ser thor tshugs g.yon du bcings// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs// de yi g.yon du taM las byung // thig le mchog
177a5(rgyud 'grel): ma gser bsregs 'dra// g.yas na thod pa lcags kyu bsnams// g.yon pa mchod sdong lcug dkris 'dra// dbang ldan oM byung dbang po ni// dzam+bu nA dA'i gser 'od 'dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// glang chen sa srung stan la ni// rgyal po'i
177a6(rgyud 'grel): rol pas yang dag gnas// g.yas kyis rdo rje snying gar 'dzin// g.yon pa lha mer bsnyems te gnas// mchod pa'i las la rtag tu brtson// de yi g.yas su saM las byung // bde sogs ma de bdag por mtshungs// g.yas kyis rtse gsum snying
177b1(rgyud 'grel): gang thogs// g.yon pas lcags kyu lta bur 'khyud// g.yon du raM las byung ba yi// ram+b+ha pa zhes bya markata 'dra// skra ni man+da ra yis brgyan// me long thogs shing rol par bcas// mer ni kuM las byung ba yi// nor bdag ku be ra zhes bya// mdog
177b2(rgyud 'grel): ni ser skya shin tu mdzes// g.yas na bi tsa pu ra thogs// g.yon na rin chen lcug ma'i shing // ro langs kyi ni stan la gnas// de yi g.yas su baM las byung // nor gyi blo ma gser mdog can// lus ni rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs//
177b3(rgyud 'grel): lag po gnyis kyis shin tu mdzes// g.yas kyis mi 'jigs sbyin par byed// g.yon na 'bras kyi snye ma thogs// de yi g.yon du haM las byung // 'phrog ma mnang lta bu'i 'od// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus// mchog sbyin mya
177b4(rgyud 'grel): ngan med shing thogs// bden bral b+hU byung 'byung po'i rgyal// mdog sngon rta yi stan la gnas// thod pa rin chen cod pan can// g.yas na dbyug pa thogs nas su// g.yen pa gi waM sdigs par byed// de yi g.yas su laM las byung //
177b5(rgyud 'grel): lang ka'i bdag mo zhes bya ba// gyen 'greng skra ni thod pas bcings// mdog ljang marka ta 'dra ba// g.yas na rnal 'byor mtshon cha thogs// g.yon ma thod par khrag ni thogs// de yi g.yon tu raM byung ba'i// khrag la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor/
177b6(rgyud 'grel): ma// mdog dmar gzi brjid chen mo ste// mtshan ma lang ka'i dbang mor mtshungs// rlung mtshams chu yi'i rgyal po ste// b+hur b+hu pa zhes bya bas bskyed// chu srin gyi ni stan la gnas// mdog dmar gzi brjid chen po ste//
178a1(rgyud 'grel): lag na mchog sbyin zhugs pa thogs// cad phan dmar pos nye bar mdzes// de yi grams su b+ha las byung // longs spyod ldan ma b+hu ru'i mngag/ spyi bor dengs kas brgyan pa ste// g.yas pa yis ni rnga yab thogs// g.yon pa lnga
178a2(rgyud 'grel): yi lus las skyes// rang gi nu ma blta zhing mdzes// g.yon du hUM las byung ba yi// ut+pa la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor ma// mdog dkar gzi brjod chen mo ste// nor bur bcas pa'i gdengs kas brgyan// g.yas kyis ut+pal thogs nas ni//
178a3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pas bus mer brkyang // 'jig rten pa yi lha yi gnas// rdo rje'i phreng bas shin tu bskor// sbyor ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa yis// 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi phyag dang mdog la sogs pa'i cho ga ste dgu pa'o//
178a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol gnas ni zlum po la// dpa' bo nyi shu'i re'u mig bya// shar gyi re'u cha'i dbus dgod pa// rkeng rus 'jigs byed kaM yas byung // de yi bang par dgod bya ba// pad+ma 'byung ba kaM las byung // de yi g.yas su khaM las byung // kha T+wAM ga yi
178a5(rgyud 'grel): srin po ste// de yi pang par dgod bya ba// khaM byung lha mo sen rnon la// de yi g.yen du gaM las byung // sgyu zab ces bya'i dpa' bo ste// de yi pad+ma dgrad lha mo ni// gaM las byung ba sgra zab ma// 'khor lo'i byang gi dbus su ni// dri la rna zhes bya lha las
178a6(rgyud 'grel): byung // de yi bang gnas lha mo ni// bum pa'i nu ma g+haM las byung // g.yas kyi tshal tsam las ni// byung ngo'i gtum pa'i dbang phyug ste// de dang 'khyud pa'i lha mo ni// g.yon pa'i gdong can po las byung // de yi g.yon du tshe byung ba'i//
178b1(rgyud 'grel): ser rga'i gdong can zhes bya ba// de dang 'khyud pa'i lha mo ni// so yis 'dral ba tsha las byung // nub kyi re'u cha dbus ma la// dzaM byung mngal gyi mtshon cha dga'// de dang lhan cig gnas pa ni// brla mthon ma ste dza las byung // g.yas kyi re'u char gnas
178b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// sgra 'jigs zhes bya d+h+waM las byung // de dang 'khyud pa'i lha mo ni// sgra byed dga' ma'ang d+h+waM las byung // de yi g.yon gyi re'u cha la// chu skyar za ba TaM las byung // de yi bang par gnas pa ni// thor cog gis brgyan TaM yas byung //
178b3(rgyud 'grel): lho'i ri'u mig dbus ma wa// waM las byung ba sgrogs pa can// de yi bang por gnas pa ni// der thabs la dga' rje las byung // de yi g.yos su dgod pa ni// cing te'u 'dul byed DaM las byung // de yi bang par gnas pa ni/ Di dzi s+thA DaM las
178b4(rgyud 'grel): byung // g.yon gyi re'u cha gnyis pa la// rA ka'i 'ur smA DaM las byung // de yi pang par gnas pa ni// mda' klas rol ma dz+ha las byung // dbang ldan gyi ni re'u cha la// rtsod la dga' ba taM las byung // de yi pang par gnas pa ni// byin phran
178b5(rgyud 'grel): mA ste tAM las byung // de'i re'u cha gnyis pa la// lag rnyings zhes bya tha las byung // de dang lhan cig gnas pa ni// rnam par g.yo ba thaM las byung // mi mtshams kyi ni re'u cha la// mche ba brtsegs pa de las byung // de yi bang par gnas pa
178b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'od rnon ma ste dam las byung // de yi re'u mig gnyis pa la// brtan bzhir 'jigs pa taM las byung // de yi bang gnas rnal 'byor ma// del bus smras pa'ang te las byung // bden bral gyi ni re'u mig la// lus rgyas zhes bya ba las byung //
179a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi bang par gnas pa ni// mig ser ma yang paM las byung // de yi re'u cha gnyis pa la// gtsub pa'i gdong can po las byung // de yi pang nas lha mo ni// paM las byung ba'i mig rgyas ma// rlung mtshams re'u
179a2(rgyud 'grel): mig gnas pa// tshangs pa'i dbyangs can paM las byung // de la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma// mdzes pa'i lus can baM las byung // de yi re'u mig gnyis pa la// sgra 'jigs zhes bya b+haM las byung // de yi yan lag la gnas pa/
179a3(rgyud 'grel): bungad sgra ma ste b+h+rUM las byung // na mkha' yi ni grong khyer mchog/ dpa' bo nyi shu kun gyis bskor// rtse bran lngas ni brgyan pa ste// gtsar bu skra ni rnam par grol// rnal 'byor me dang phan tshun 'khyud// rnal 'byor mtshon dang snod thogs nas/
179a4(rgyud 'grel): bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs dang // btung ba zhim po dag gis bkang // ye shes gdan dang gzhan gyi gdan// sbyor gdan 'dod pa lnga yis mchod// gsang ba'i gdan la dgod pa'i dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i mtshon pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste
179a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa'o// / de nas 'khor lo kun bskyed de// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas kyang // dum tshig 'khor lor bcug byas nas// gnyis med ye shes 'khor lor 'gyur// til dang 'bras mas
179a6(rgyud 'grel): nas drang rgya// kyi nim me tog dkar bor bcas// mun 'amar skyes pas dag go// gser ram gzhan las byas pa'i snod// mdzes pa mdun du bzhag par bya// deran ma long dri med bzhag/ rdo skye chur gnyis bcings nas//
179b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang ni sa gdugs sbyar// dkar po cung zad dgug par bshad// dam tshig mchog tu dgug pa ste// 'di ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'o// g.yon pa khu tshur
179b2(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas su// gaM wang dang ni dri gsum brkyang // dri gsum gyi ni tshig gsum par// gi wang gri ni rtse mo gzugs// du ba lcags kyu nyid du bya// oM a kaR+Sha ni hUM phaT/ 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'o// rdo rje bcing ba bsdams
179b3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// dri ma gsum dang dud pa bsgreng // an+d+ra'i snod la reg nas ni// oM pra tits+tsha ar+g+haM swA hA/ zhes bdun nam nyi shu gcig banas la// ar+d+ha dag ni dbul bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas ni// dkar po dang ni ye shes sbyar// pad+ma
179b4(rgyud 'grel): dung dang du ba rnams// rim gyis bskyod cing dgrol bar bya// phyag rgya 'di yis me tog dbul// oM pra ba ra sa ta kA ra pra tits+tsha swA hA/ zhes bya bas so// sngar bstan sngags kyis btab nas su// kha zhags bkru ba dbul bar bya// nye bar spyod ba
179b5(rgyud 'grel): lngas mchod nas// hUM gi bkra shos dbyangs blang bya// hUM hUM hUM/ dga' ba'i lus 'di shin tu sprul// rnal 'byor sa ni thams cad khyod// gsang ba dag ni bcings don du// gsang ba'i rdo rje shin tu bskyod// tshangs pas bsil yab
179b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yob pa dang / seng ge ngag ni sgo dpon te// brgya byin gdugs ni thogs pa yis// 'phrog byed yon tan sgrogs par byed// mi 'am ci dang drang srong tshogs// bkra shis glu ni len pa'o// bkra shis kyi glu'o// rtsa ba nag sogs med cing
180a1(rgyud 'grel): chos// lto yangs mgrin pa 'phyang ba ni// shing lo phye ma'i steng bzhag ste// rgya mtsho 'ba' chu chu bo'i chu// rdzing bu'i chu la sogs pa ni// btsags nas rab tu dgang bar bya// me tog phreng bas mgrin bcings te//
180a2(rgyud 'grel): sman lnga rin chen lnga sogs bzhugs// chu ni 'o mar bsres par bya// shing lo myu gu sna tshogs dang // mgrin pa bgos kyis brgyan par bya// i dap+te ma hA tap+te zhes bya bas/ gang+gA'i chu ni dbugs par bya// rnam shes dang ni sa gdugs sbyar//
180a3(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma brkyang ba'i phyag rgya dang // reg nas sngags 'di lan bdun brjod// oM suM hU~M yuM hUM phaT/ 'byor pa yod na lnga chen dang // dung dang gling du sna tshogs rnga// dga' dang bcas pa'i dril bu dkrol// khrus kyi dus su sbyar bar bya// dang por dri zhim mar
180a4(rgyud 'grel): nag dang // bdag tshal gyi ni byug par bya// de nas dri zhim chu dang ni// sbrang rtsi yos kyang nan tan bkru// dung chos chu dang 'o ma ni// me tog dri zhim bcas pa thugs// de nas khu tshur gnyis bcings na sa// des ni gos bzung brjod nas su//
180a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje steng gi phyogs su ni// rol par bcas pas dbul bar bya// oM hUM swA hA zhes brjod pa ni// gsang sngags 'di yis na bza' dbul// sngon bzhin sngagasgra dang phyag rgya yis// yon chab zhabs bsil la sogs dbul// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
180a6(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas// dkar po gi wang sgrog tu sbrel// oM badz+ra pA ba hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gzhug par bya'o// seng ge'i phyag rgya bcings nas su// oM hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags// khro dang bcas par bzlas pa yi// bgegs rnams thams cad
180b1(rgyud 'grel): bskrad par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyub ni sbyar bar bya// 'di ni lcags sgrog phyag rgyu ste// oM badz+ra s+pho tsA ba zhes bya bas bcing ngo // sgo rnams kyi las so// ye shes kyi 'khor le dgug pa dang // khrus kyi cho ga ste bcu gcig
180b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni// rnal 'byor na mkha'i phyag rgyab cing // oM tiSh+Tha A sa na hUM swA hA/ zhes bya bas seng ge'i gdan sogs bstan par bya/ phyag rgya'i lan la ngos gnyis/
180b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i bskor ba byas nas ni// de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcings// ye shes kyis ni pad+ma mnan// sa gdugs rnam par shes pa gcig/ gnyi ga phan tshun sgrog tu sbrel// lhag ma ba dan gsum brkyang ste// dri mo gsum dang dud pa skrang /
180b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga zhes bya ba// rnal 'byor na mkha' de bzhin gshegs// phyag rgya 'di ni bla nA meng // oM badz+ra satwa dra sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma stu a haM zhes mthar btags pa'i// snying sngags lan bdun brjod par bya// sngags ni oM hU~M d+ha swAt+ma/
180b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bcings pa dam bcas la// dri ma gsum dang dud pa bsgreng // shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i rgya// sngags ni oM aM A swAhA/ zhes bya ba ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i'o// oM hUM ha ha swA hA bya ste/ de dag ni ye shes mkha' 'gro me'i /
180b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bcings pa bsdams pa yi// nang du ye shes rnam shes sbyar// oM su a swA hA/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i'o// de nyid las ni ye shes dang // rnam shes bsgreng po drag mor 'dod// oM k+ShuM aHswA hA/ drag mo mkha' 'gro ma'i'o//
181a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid pad+ma sa gdug su// rtse sbyar ro langs ma yir dgod// oM yuM aM swA hA/ ro langs ma'i'o// de nyid dung pa dri ma gsum// rtse sbyar gtum mo'i yin par 'dod// oM hUM AHswA hA gtum ma'i'o// pad+ma sa gdugs
181a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar nas ni// dkar po gi wang rtse sprang pa// seng ge la sogs rnam bzhi yi// dam tshig yin par thub pas gsungs// mkha' 'gro ma sogs sgo skyong dang // dkyil 'khor zlum po la gnas rnams// bdag po yi ni phyag rgya nyid// sngags dang
181a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa sbyar ba dag/ dam tshig phyag rgya sngags dang ni// las kyi phyag rgya bstan pa yin// 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi cho ga ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
181a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag chung mar bcas pa yi// sngags dang phyag rgya bstan par bya// nyi ma'i khu tshur dam bcings nas// gyen du rnam par dgrol bar bya// oM khi sha swA hA/ seng ge'i'o// rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas ni// rang gi snying gar bskyod par bya/
181a5(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa yi ni dam tshig tu// bde bar gshegs kyis mdor bsngos gsungs// oM oM swA hA/ tshangs pa'i'o// nyi ma'i khu tshur bcings nas ni// bi dan gsum pa gyen du bsgresgrung // 'di ni mdung can phyag rgya ste// dam tshig 'jog pa'i
181a6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'o// oM hUM swA hA/ ru tra yi'o// zla ba'i khu tshur bcings nas ni// gi wang dag ni bsgreng bar bya// nyi ma'i sor mo kun brkyang nas// de yi steng du dga' par bya// oM maM suM hU~M swA hA/ brgya byin gyi'o// nyi ma'i khu tshur brtan bcings la
181b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dud pa bsgreng bar bya// dpral bar steng gi thod sor drug/ dbang po yi ni dam tshig 'dod// oM muM mu hUM swAhA/ dbang po'i'o// rdo rje bcings pa bsdam byas nas// dkar po dang gi wang bsgong // rin chen lta bur sbyar nas ni// lus
181b2(rgyud 'grel): ngan la ni bstan par bya// oM d+ha na a gre hUM swA hA/ lus ngan gyi'o// khu tshur bcings nas dkar po ni// brkyang nas gyen du bsgreng bar bya// 'byung po bdag po'i dam tshig tu// thub pa rnams kyis bshad pa yin// aM khA ta na~M hUM phaT/ 'byung po'i
181b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag po yi'o// khu tshur de nyid bzhag nas su// dkar po dang ni du ba brkyang // phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal ba yis// gdengs ka'i bdag po'i dam tshig bshad// oM b+hur b+hu ba swA hA/ klu yi bdag po'i'o// de dag gi ni chung ma rnams// bdag po'i
181b4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig phyug rgyu nyid// btsangs pa dam tshig yin par bshad// sngags ni sau saur bstan par bya// oM la k+Sh+mI ye swAhA/ oM bAnA hA swAhA/ oM sA ra swAd+d+ha/ oM br-i hUn+tu swA hA/ oM ma hA shwar+ye swAhA/ oM ga~M g+hA ya~M swAhA/ oM in dra ye
181b5(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ oM ti lot+ta ma ye swA hA/ oM sa tsi ye swA hA/ oM ra~M b+ha ye swA hA/ oM ba su ma ti ye swA hA/ oM ha re n+ye swA hA// oM lang+ge shwa r+ye swA hA/ oM ra ka ta pr-i ya ye swA hA/ oM b+haM ga bA d+ye swA hA/ oM ut+pa la br-i yA ye swA hA/ sbyor ba'i gdan la bzhugs
181b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ lha rnams kyi dam tshig phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi cho ga ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje thal mo ni// dam bcings ye shes rnam shes dang // nang du bcug ste btsir bar bya// pad+ma snod ces bya bar
182a1(rgyud 'grel): grags// keng rus 'jigs byed la sogs pa dang pad+ma'i 'byung gnas la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ de dang chung ma dang bcas pa'i sngags ni 'di dag yin no// oM ka re ka b+hai rA b+hA ya sAt+ma/ oM ka ma la ka ring ye swA
182a2(rgyud 'grel): oM kha T+wAM g+hA gA s+phA ya swA hA/ oM n+yA kha ti yA swA hU~M/ oM gA tI b+hI ran+ta dA ya swAt+ma/ oM gaM b+hI ra nA dI ya swA hA/ oM g+har+thakAD+D+h+ya yA swA hU~M/ oM b+ha da shA nAM ye swAt+ma/ a tsaN+De shwa rA ya sAt+ma/ oM tse pa lA na d+hA ya swAt+ma/ oMts+tshe tra g+ho na yA swA t+ma/ oM ts+tshi t+pA da sha na
182a3(rgyud 'grel): s+yAH/ eMd+hin pre skr-i/ oM dz+nyAka ma~Mni d+ha li s+t+rai d+ha/ oM d+ha kai rims d+d+ha/ ma na swAt+ma ts+tshi y+YA s+thAn+tu/ m+me swAn+tu/ d+hA la swAH/ oM tha kA ma 'i s+t+rai/ oMT+Taka kA sa~M ni b+h+yaH
182a4(rgyud 'grel): D+ho ma pri ya smr-id+d+ho/ oM DA kA ko la ha lA ya swAhA/ sauT+Ta ka la lA s+yA swAt+ma/ oM taM ka pr-i yA ye swAt+ma/ oM ti nu tra~M kA ye swAtAM/ oM thai rinA bi sUhA/ oM thA ra~M gI nI yai swA hA/ oM dASh+Thag ra lA yA swA hA/ oM da ra ra smai nA ye swAhU~M/ oM dka ra g+ho rA yA swAH
182a5(rgyud 'grel): oM d+hi ra b+ha Shi nA ye s+yAt+ma/ oM bi nA da ta rA ya swA hA/ oM pheM na mu khyA ya~M swA hA/ oM pul+la nA ya ni swAhA/ oM prah+ma da tsA yai swA hA/ oM ban+d+ha ra tsatwA ye swA hUM/ oM b+hi ma nA da ya swAhA/ oM b+h+ra ma ra ka shri ye swA hA/ gsang ba'i gdan gyi dpa' bo dang / dpa'
182a6(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags kyi cho ga ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// / de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis snga ma bzhin du rgyas gdab bya/ lce'i dam tshig rdo rje la// dbyangs yig dang po la sogs dgod// 'di ni
182b1(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams thams cad kyi// chos kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad// pad+ma bskor ba byas nas su// rdo rje lcags sgrog bcing bar bya// snying gar bskyod de bkug nas kyang // rna ba'i drung du bzhag par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor na mkha'i las kyi phyag
182b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o// khu tshur gnyis bcings snying ga ru// kun tu 'khyud cing btsir bar bya/ oM shrI pa ta ya hUM swA hA/ ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i'o// zla ba nyi ma kha sbyar nas// pad+ma'i tshul du dbye bar bya// shes rab pha rol phyin ma'i'o// rnam shes kyis ni sa
182b3(rgyud 'grel): gdugs mnan// lhag ma bsgreng ba rdo rje'i rtse// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi'o// ye shes pad+mar de bzhin sbyar// snga ma dang ni rgyab sbyar bya// mkha'agro drag mo yi'o// gnyis ka thal mo sbyar nas su// cung zad phye ste kha ru gzhug/ ro langs ma'i'o//
182b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// dkar po dang ni gi wang brkyang // rin chen tshul du sbyar nas kyang // gtum mo la ni bstan por bya// gtum mo'i'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// dkar po gi wang sgrog tu sbrel// seng ge ma'i'o// de nyid brtan
182b5(rgyud 'grel): por bcings nas su// dri ma gsum dang dud pa bsgreng // 'ug pa ma la sogs pa'i'o// nyi ma zla ba sbyar nas su// rgod cing kha ru gzhug par bya// oM phaM phuM swA hA/ mkha' 'gro ma'i'o// thal mo sbyar te spyi bor bzhag/ oM pheM phuM swA hA/ me 'bar
182b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i'o// yi dgas thal mo kha ru gtor// oM pr-i pu swA hA/ 'jibs byed ma'i'o// zla ba khu tshu ri brtan bcings nas// rna ba'i rtsa bar bzhog par bya// oM pa~M puM swA hA/ 'phrog byed ma'i'o// zla bo'i lag pa brkyang na su// rnam shes dang ni 'jig
183a1(rgyud 'grel): dAr+yA s+yA// ma r+b+ba kyim ga/ sgyus ma sogs pa rab tu grags/ @ Ad+d+ha/ rnam ma la sogs pa mag// nyim zla ba brgyad nas su// sbyar nas ni steng du bzhag/ oM k+ShiM swA swAH/ drug mo la rdzogs pa
183a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas// hU~M ma zlab bye ste b+h+yo// sa~M gu ra g+hu ru swAd+d+ha/ drag shul can ma la sogs pa'o// nyi ma zla ba rab brgyad nas// d+hArtswa dang rgyub gnyis sgyur byaste// lag pa ma~M ni ser mo rnams// phan tshun rna me sgrog tu snre la/
183a3(rgyud 'grel): oM wat+ta la~M swAhA/ thod pa can la sogs pa'i'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rked pa'i mtsham su bzhag par bya// snyems dang bcas par rab brtags nas// sgeg mo yi ni dam tshig 'gyur// oM hUM swA hA/ sgeg mo'i'o// zla ba'i lag
183a4(rgyud 'grel): brkyang nas su// rnam shes dang ni 'jig par sbyar// nyi ma'i log pa gzung bar bya// dri'i dung zhes bya bar glags// oM su~M gan+d+he trAM swAhA/ dri yi'o// zla ba'i sbrul mo ga shib+has te brkyang // gru mo gyen+da du bsgreng bar byaM// ts+tsho m+b+ha'i sor mo bsgreng ba ni/
183a5(rgyud 'grel): bo zang phyag rgya zhes byar grags// oM hUM ho swAhU~M/ bi bang ma'i'o// zla ba nya ma snyom par sbyar// gyen du bskyed de gtor bar / kau me tog snyom pa sbyor ba yi// me tog gi ni dam tshig 'gyur// oM sr-i swA hU~M/ me tog gi'o// khu tshur bcings nas dkar
183a6(rgyud 'grel): bo bsgre // hUM hUM zhes byas bskyod par bya// kha ru thug pa'i tshul byas pa// kruM mkhan ma~M yi dam tshig zi shid// oM hU~M hU~M hU~M swAhA/ glu mkhan ma'o'o// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// zla bas mkhrog mar gzung nas su// bdug spos dbul ba
183b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul byas pa// bdug zlos ni dam tshig gzung // A oM swAt+ma/ bdug smras kyi'o// rnyed pa g.yas kyi ma ru ni// zla ba'i lag pa bzhag nas kyang // nyi mA'i lag pa bskyed de gzung // de yi phyag rgya 'dzin par 'gyur// oM su nr-i t+yai hU~M swA hA/ gar
183b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas// spyi bo'i steng du bzhag par bya// lus ni g.yon du cung zad dgug/ mar me'i phyag rgya zhes byar grags// oM hUM swA hA/ ma me'i'o// nyi ma'i lag pa brkyang nas su// dkar po dang ni yo shes sbyar//
183b3(rgyud 'grel): du ba la sogs bsgreng bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyar grags// oM hUM swA hA/ rdo rje'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de ltar zla ba'i lag byas pa// dril bu'i phyag rgya zhes byar grags// oM ho swA hA/ dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// nyi ma zla ba kha sbyar te//
183b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i gnasu gzhag nas kyang // pad+ma sa gdugs bskyod par bya// A li'i phyag rgya zhes byar grags// oM a swA hU~M/ mkha'agro ma thams cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// ye shes kyi ni pad+ma gnon// lhag ma gsum ni brkyong ste
183b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgreng // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dkyil 'khor// mtshon tshwa'i phyag rgyu zhes byar glags// oM sh+tsi ti ka swAhA/ mtshon cha'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba'i lag pa de bzhin du// byas pa bde bar gshegs pa yis// mkha'agro ma'i
183b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du// mtshan tsho med pa'i phyag rgyar bshad// oM g+huR+ShI d+ha hUM phaT/ mtshon cha med pa rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// mtshan mar bcas pa gzhan la ni// phyag rgya che nyid las phyag rgya// sngags kyang sngar gsungs bzhin du bstan//
184a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das kun gyi// phyag rgya chen po'ang sngar bstan bzhin// so so'i mtshan ma rgyan dang ni// na bza' kha dog cha lugs bcas// phyag rgya chen po'i'o// de ltar phyag rgya bzhi yi ni// phyag rgyas btab nas sngar
184a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad bzhin// rkang stabs brgyad dang bsrung brgyad bya// sku gsung thugasu byin brlabs nas// dbang bskur nas ni go cha bskon// dar dpyangs kyis ni mnyes par bya// mchod yon zhabs bkru phul nas su// me tog sogs pas mchod par bya//
184a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa'i cho ga ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas pad skor sngon 'gro ba'i// sgeg pa'i tshul gyis sgeg pa dang // bi bang tshul gyis
184a4(rgyud 'grel): bang dang // gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang // sil snyan tshul gyi dkrol ba dang // brdab pa'i tshul gyis rdeb pa dang // gar gyi tshul gyi yan lag bskyod// rlung yang tshul gyis g.yob pa dang // rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang // bla re'i tshul gyis
184a5(rgyud 'grel): bre ba dang // ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang // gdugs kyi tshul gyis dga' ba dang // cang te'u'i tshul gyis rdeg pa dang // rnga yi tshul gyis brdung ba dang // bzhad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang // gar gyi tshul gyi gar byed pa// khro ba'i tshul gyi gar byed pa//
184a6(rgyud 'grel): khro ba'i tshul gyis khro ba dang // sgrog pa'i tshul gyis sgeg pa dang // 'gying ba'i tshul gyis 'gying ba dang // mnga' 'dren nu ma 'khyud pa dang // rdo rje gsor zhing phyag 'tshal ba'i// tshul gyi 'dud pa byed pa ste// phyag rgya'i mchod pa nyi shu nyid// hUM gi glu dang sbyar ba
184b1(rgyud 'grel): bya// rdo rje dril bu rol bcas pa// glu yi sgra yis dgang bar bya// dpal gyis 'bras bu 'am gzhan yang rung // 'bras bu sna tshogs dbul bar bya// nyi ma zla ba kha sbyar te// 'bras bu'i tshul gyi du byas la'ang dbul// oM hrI swA hA/ 'bras bu tham
184b2(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas bdud rtsi lnga po nyid// mkhas pas de kho na yis dbul// nya phyis snod ni bkang nas su// nyi ma'i pad+mar bzhag par bya// rnam shes 'jig par sbyar nas u// de nyid thams cad rig pas dbul// lha gsum gyis
184b3(rgyud 'grel): ni bsrubs nas kyang // thig pa'i thor ma kun la dbul// bsnod brgyad dag ni bkang nas kyang // gnas brgyad dag tu dbul bar bya// lcags rgyu rdza la sogs pa dag/ de bzhin de nyid rig pas dbul// bza' dang bca' ba sna tshogs sogs//
184b4(rgyud 'grel): kun nas thams cad dbul bar bya// oM sr-i g+haM dz+dza a swAhA/ lcags kyu lha'i phyag rgya'o// oM hUM hUM hUM guM guM hUM hUM hUM/ oM pheM guM dzaM gu hUM swA hA/ mnyes pa chen po'i sngags kyi mnyes par bya ba'o// de nas rdo rje dril bu dkrol// de nyid rig pas rdo rje gsor/
184b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mdzes pa gsor ba yis// sems can 'khor ba las grol zhing // thar pa thob par mdzad pa ste// dga' dang bcas pas rdo rje gzung // rdo rje gsor ba'i de kho na nyid do// rdo rje lha tshur dam bcings nas// rgyu ba dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// pad+ma dang ni swa
184b6(rgyud 'grel): gdugs sbrel// hUM zhes bya bas bskyod par bya// oM badz+ra g+haN+De hUM hoHoM badz+ra g+haN+De ra Ni ta pra ra Ni ta sarba bud d+ha pra tsi li te pra dz+nyA ra mi tA nA da swa d+hU be badz+ra d+ha ra hri da lA ba to/ ra ni hUM hUM hUM he ho ho AHswA hA/ rdo rje dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje
185a1(rgyud 'grel): dril bu'i sgra dang ni// de kho na yis mchod nas su// me tog dkar po bdug pa dang // sa lu'i zan dang zho ru bcas// bu ram sbrang rtsi bsres nas ni// dbang ldan mtshamasu 'bar de mchod// me tog dkar sogs bdug pa dang // chang
185a2(rgyud 'grel): gi snod ni rgya cher bcas// lha bshos sna tshogs mchod pa ni// rlung gi mtshams su dbul bar bya// nya dang sha dang sran chan bcas// snod ni yongs su bkang nas su// til 'khur la sogs bca' dang bcas// bden bral du ni dbul bar bya// zho dang
185a3(rgyud 'grel): sbrang rtsi mar du bsre// bza' ba zhim por bcas pa dang // blo dang ldan pas me mtsham su// khyad par du ni dbul bar bya// dri dang me tog rgya chen dang // bdug spos mar me rgya chen dang // gtor ma'i mchod pa rgya chen rnams// dad dang ldan pas gnas nas
185a4(rgyud 'grel): dbul// phyi rol mtshams bzhi'i gtor ma'i mchod pa'i cho ga ste bcu drug pa'o// mnyam nyid ye shes las bskyed pa// slob dpon shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// nyi mas rdo rje gsor ba dang // zla bas dril bu bsil
185a5(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// sgeg cing rgod pa'i bzhin gyis ni// thams cad kun nas mchod par bya// hUM gi glu yi tshul gyis ni// rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes bya ste// mda' dang gzhu la sogs pa yi// phyag rgya dang ni ldan par bya// gang dag gang gi rgya 'ching ba// de dang de gzugs
185a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshon par bya// hUM gi sgra ni snyan pa yi// bkra shis gru yis yongs su bkab// sems dpa' chen po dang po mchog/ dgyes chen rnams kyi dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ thugs kyi sems dpa'
185b1(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin mchog/ rdo rje'i rdo rje stobs po che// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i mchog/ bdud kyi bdud sde 'joms pa'o// sem+ba can kun gyi sems byang chub// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog skye mchog/ rdo rje hUM ste hUM mdzad pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug nor sbyin pa//
185b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'dod dang thar pa nor che ba// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste// 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa// mi rgyu ba ni mchog tu gsal// shin tu pra dang sgom pa'i tshogs// rgyu ba rnams kyi rab mchog brnyes//
185b3(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i 'khor lo sbyong mdzad pa// thog mda' med cing gsal ba min// shes rab sdug la rna bar gnas// thugs kyi phyag rgya snyoms zhugs pa// de nyid sems dpa' che bas che// rdo rje khro bo khro chen po// 'jigs pa'i me ni 'dul bar mdzad//
185b4(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa mchog ni 'dul ba che// drag po'i drag mchog 'jigs byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che// chos kyi las chen 'dzin pa po// dam chos las ni bzang po'i lam// byang chub sems ni sbyor bar mdzad// thams cad dag tu pad+ma che//
185b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs kyis nor che ba// 'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug che// nam mkha' mtha' yas rtag pa'i don// sems can kun gyi gnas chen po// dpal gyi 'byor pas 'byor pa'i rgyal// bsam pa thams
185b6(rgyud 'grel): cad rdzogs mdzad pa// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal 'dud// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud// dad pas khyod la 'dud bgyid pas// deng bdag rdo rje sems 'grub mdzod// thams cad rnam par dag pa dam pa dang po'i
186a1(rgyud 'grel): bstod pas mchod pa'i cho ga ste bcu 'dun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje dril sgrar bcas// slar yang bstod pas mnyes par bya// hUM zhes bya dang sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje glu yis glu blang bya// hUM hUM hUM/ 'khor ba mchog
186a2(rgyud 'grel): gi sku 'dzin pa// phan tshun 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba 'chang // rdo rje 'dzin pa te nA hUM/ ten te te hUM/ zhabs mchog lha mchog gis 'dud pa// me tog las sbrul khro dang bcas// kye rdo rje khyod te na hUM/ te na te te hUM/ dngos grub grol ba'i don gyis phyir// gsang ba
186a3(rgyud 'grel): nges par 'ching mdzad pa// rol cig rol cig rdo rje khyod// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa mdzad// te na hUM/ tAn te te hUM/ rin thang med pa'i bdud rtsi yos// sems can rnams ni khyod kyis bkrus// bdag ni 'khor ba las grol ba// khyod ni gus dang bcas
186a4(rgyud 'grel): pas 'dud// te na hUM/ te na te te hUM/ glang chen mchog gi steng bzhugs shing // sku ni dung ltar dkar bas mdzes// mtha' yas dug gis brgyan pa'i sku// shar gtso rdo rje ma la 'dud// gser gyi mchog ltar mdzes pa'i sku// shin tu drag po'i sbrul
186a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan// mdzes pa'i bza' bkang thod pa can// byang gi lha mo rgyal gyur cig/ pad+ma dmar ltar mdzes pa'i sku// hUM gi ra res 'jigs par mdzad// drag po'i dbyug pa thod pa bsnams// nub kyi lha mo'i gtso la 'dud// 'od zer dra ba sngon pos
186a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes// seng ge 'phrog byed tshangs dbang gtso// bdud 'dul phyir na khro gzugs 'dzin// hUM mdzad lho yi lha mor 'dug/ hUM hUM hUM/ sangs rgyas lnga yi mkha' 'gro ma// lnga lnga rnam par dag pa yis// rnal 'byor ma kun de nyid sbrul// stong dang stong min
186b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i dngo// dngos dang dngos min grol ba nyid// de pad+ma sku ni dbus bzhugs nas// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyi bskor// sangs rgyas mkha 'gro ma yi sku// dkyil 'khor bya ba de yi mnyes// klu sogs chags pa'i rang bzhin nyid// bza' dang bza'
186b2(rgyud 'grel): na sngon nas spangs// stong pa yi ni rdo rje yis// pad+ma la ni bskyod par mdzad// bdud rtsi lnga yis bdag la bkrus// lcags kyu gsol ba'i sbyor ba bsten// bzhengs shig kha sbyor sbyor ba mdzad// dam chos snying po rgyas mdzad ma// dam chos thar
186b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gtso bo'i gtso// yang dag rgyal ba 'khor ba spangs// dkyil 'khor spros pas 'gro ba sgrol// bdud gsol seng ge ma yi sku// stag mos shin tu skrag par mdzad// 'ug pa'i sgra yi kun skrag cing // pheM pheM sgrogs pas sdang lus gzigs dpa' bo
186b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khyod la 'dud// 'khor ba sgrol ba khyod la 'dud// gsang ba'i bdud rtsi gsol la 'dud// gus dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal lo// de nyid sbyor bas glu blang ba// lnga ldan dbyings dang sbyor bsngags// rdo rje dril bu sgrar bcas pas// 'bad de
186b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs mchod par bya// dpal ldan de nyid rgyal po dam pa'i dbang phyug rol pa'i cod pan mdzes// dpal ldan gsang ba'i gdan la sku mchog 'od zer 'bar ldan pa// dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu bskyod sgra rnal 'byor de nyid can// dpal ldan
186b6(rgyud 'grel): shes rnyed pa dam pa'i dbang phyug longs spyod rnams la spyod// ces bya ba'i sna tshogs pa'i glu dang bstod pas mnyes par byas la// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas ni// snying ga ru ni bzung byas la// oM shud d+ha d+harmaHhUM hU~M a a swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags
187a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod par bya'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i de kho na nyid kyi glus mnyes par bya ba'i cho ga ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas blo dang ldan pa yis// gal te 'byor na gzhan dang
187a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas// tshon chen gyi ni gos dag gam// dar sogs sar pa gos nas ni// rdo rje dril bu de bzhin du// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes par bya// brgya byin gdugs ni thogs pa dang // tshangs pa bsol yab g.yo ba dang bcas// seng ge mdun
187a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsol ka ba// 'phrog byed yon tan sgrogs par byed// rol pa'i gdan la gnas pa yi// hUM zhes brjod cing shar du blta// nyi mas rdo rje gsor nas ni// bzlas pas dril bu bsil bas kyang // dri dkar maN+Dal gru bzhir bya// me tog dkar
187a4(rgyud 'grel): bo gcal du bkram// dri dang me tog sogs ldan pa'i// sa lu'i 'bras zan rgya che ba// zho dang bu ram mar 'o thugs// shar gyi sgor ni sbyin par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rgyu ba dang rgyud du sbyar bar bya// pad+ma sa gdugs sbrel gnasu//
187a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang ni gau wang bsgreng // dkar po cung zad dgug pa yis// lha dang lha min grub pa dgug/ oM bat+tA li ma hA bat+ta li hUM hUM dzaHswA hU~M/ shor gyi sgor dgug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla bas snod la reg nas ni// nyi mas rdo rje khu tshur
187a6(rgyud 'grel): bcings// dkar po bsgreng ste rol pa yi// stabs la gnas nas brjod par bya// oM rgyu ba dang ni cher rgyu ma// yi dwags rgyu ba nyid ma zla// dngos grub 'dod dang rgyal ba dang // rta'i rgyal dang zla ba'i rgyal// lha mo u ma ga gA dang // gzugs
187b1(rgyud 'grel): mdze rus pa dang // bza' rnas da chags kyig so// tika dang du ldanas// skamapa 'dzin pa hU~M// sngun pa rlung ni lhag // nA mi rgyal ba lta yin d+hal// g+hu/ hU~M dadu sgras can / ts+tshats+tsha swA kAT+Ta sa swA kAR+tha sa/
187b2(rgyud 'grel): ti baM hUM phaT dzaHswA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las// dkar po gi wang dkri bar bya// oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha sa ma yA d+hi ba ti hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya bas mnyes par byas la sngags dang phyag rgyas btang bar bya'o//
187b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas byung phyogs skyu ru ni// mnyam pa'i stabs gnas nas kyang // nyi mas rdo rje gsor ba dang // zla bas dril bu dkrol ldan pas// maN+Dal dkar pos byugs pa la// 'o ma'i snod la sogs pa bzhag/ me tog dkor dang gdug pa dang //
187b4(rgyud 'grel): le mdo bcos pa'i skye ba shos dbul// sngar gyi phyag rgyas dgug pa dang // sngags dang de ni sbyar bar bya// zla be khu tshur brtan bcings la// rnam shes dang nis gdugs brkyang // nyim+bI'i lag pa logs brgyud ste// gdangs ka'i tshul du steng du
187b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor// phyag rgyas snod la reg nas ni// phyi rol byang bu dgug par bya// oM mtha' da yas dang ni nr-ir rgyas bu// 'jog po dang ni stobs kyi rgyu// pad+ma pad+ma chen po dang // dung skyong dang rigs ldan rnams// lha mo lha mo chen po dang // zla ba'i skye
187b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsugs spyi gtsugs che// be tshon 'dzin dang be tshon che// snying po med dang gu yi ta// dga' bo dang ni nye dga' dang // rgya mtsho dang ni rgya mtsho che// gdung ba dang ni dung chen mo// dpal gyi 'od dang 'od po che// rin chen 'od dang gzugs bzang dang //
188a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs chen sbrul bzangs lto 'phye che// smig rgyu dang ni smig rgyu che// oM A gats+tsha a gats+tsha ma hA nA gA d+hi ba ta sarba b+hur b+hu ba phruM phaT swA hA/ byang phyogs su klu la gtor ma byin nas se gol/ sum gyis gtang bar bya'o// zlum po'i
188a2(rgyud 'grel): stabs gnas sbyor ba'i bdag/ nub kyi phyogs kyi cha ru ni// maN+Dal dmar pos byugs nas su// me tog dmar po gcal du bkram// gnod sbyin gyi ni dbang po rnams// sngar gyi phyag rgyas dgug par bya// tog dri la sogs ldan pa'i// gtor
188a3(rgyud 'grel): ma bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas// sngon gyi rkang stabs bskyod nas ni// nub dung gnod sbyin dbang po mchod// oM nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang // rgyal ba bzang po dga' byed phur// oM phur bu che dang pad+ma'i gtsug/ dung gi gtsug phud dkar dang ni// gar chen
188a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bigs par byed pa dang // gcod par byed dang gang bar byed// nor dang nor min shin tu nor// gzugs bzang rol pha rol chen po// rgod dang rtse dang rnam par bskyod// dpal bzang dang ni gzugs mdzes rnams// bde ba chen po'i bka' 'di yis//
188a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo 'dir shog/ hUM A ba da ra A ba da ra/ oM bat+ta li bat+ta li b+ha kA pr-i ya/ yo ga ni ma d+he hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ khu tshur gnyis ni sbyar nas su// snying kha'i phyogs su btsir bar bya// oM dA na a d+hi pa ta ye bat+ta li phuM swA hA/ nub sgor
188a6(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi gtor ma byin la// se go la lan gsum gtogs par bya'o// gsum gyi gsum pa dbu ma la// rdo rje rkang pas mnan nas su// khrag gam dmar po'i rdzas kyis ni// maN+Dal gru gsum byug par bya// me tog dmar po bdug pa sogs
188b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i longs spyod gtor mar ldan// sha skam dang ni nya la sogs// tsong dang khrag gis gang ba'i snod// sran chan dang ni til khur bcas// bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas par bya// bza' bca' rnam pa sna tshogs pa// lho yi sgor ni sbyin par bya// sngar
188b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi sngags dang phyag rgya yis// lho yi logs su gnas te dgug/ rnga chen la sogs gsum brdung zhing // sgra chen po ni dkrol bar bya// oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri bo dang ni ri sul phug/ grong dang bzhi mdo'i zhong dang ni// khyad par
188b3(rgyud 'grel): du ni khang stong dang // sems can snod dang thang dang ni// khyad par du ni chu la gnas// nag po drag po drag chen po// lhas byin mnyam du bsten pa dang // nag po gtsigs dang 'jig byed dang // dga' dang 'das dang log 'dren rnams// rgan
188b4(rgyud 'grel): byad ma dang drag mo dang // 'jig byed ma dang u ma dang // rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang // mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub pa// nag mo bzang mi nag chen mo// nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma// dbang po dang ni zla ba mo// drag du ljang dang /
188b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phyang ba mo// 'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma// 'jigs byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang thong chen mo// thod phreng phreng can kha TA ma// sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta bcas//
188b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can mo// de nyid chen mo mkha' 'gro ma// las kun rjes su sgrub phyed ma// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen mo// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te// rdul med rnal 'byor sbyin pa mo// rdo rje
189a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis// thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cig/ oM kak+ka D+ha na ba b+han+d+ha na kha khA dan/ sarba duSh+TA na ha na ha na g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru phaT dzaHswA hA/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyab tu
189a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar bya// pad+ma dang ni sa gdugs sbrel// dkar po gi waM sgrog tu bya// oM tiSh+Tha hUM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha dzaHphaT swA hA/ zhes byi bas lho phyogs su gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin// phyogs ni rnam pa brgyad po yi// so so yi ni sa mtsham//
189a3(rgyud 'grel): su// rnga chen la sogs gsum dkrol zhing // rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya// dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs brgyad du gtor mas mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas shar ram byang du ni slong ma sta gon gnas
189a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// bla re dag ni bres nas su// sna tshogs gos kyang sbyang bar bya// seng ge'i gdan sogs khri la ni// rgyan dang mchod pa la sogs bya// 'byor na dpa' bo gzhan yang rung // med na bdag nyid gcig pu yis// rgyun rnams kun gyis klubs nas ni//
189a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems sogs rnal 'byor bya// snying gar thal mo sbyor ba yis// slob ma mdun du bzhag nas ni// cho ga rdzogs par mched nas ni// so shing bca' ba la sogs sbyin// oM a hri hA saM ban+ta ni hUM phaT/ so shing gi sngags te/ lan bdun du ni bzlas nas
189a6(rgyud 'grel): su/ slob ma kun la byin to bstan// chu yi sngags kyis bzlas nas su// kun gyi kha ni bkru bar bya// rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa// rin chen mchog dang 'jig rten dbang // don yod grub pa la sogs pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems chen rnams//
189b1(rgyud 'grel): kun nas bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni// dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su// byang chub snying por mchis skye bar// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// ji ltar dus
189b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum mgon po yis// byang chub tu ni nges byas te// tshul khrims rnam gsum bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims te// so sor bdag nyid brtan por bzung // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // bla med
189b3(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog/ sdom pa sangs rgyas sbyor skyes pa// dang por re zhig gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje dril du phyag rgya dang // so sor de bzhin nyid du gzung // rdo rje chen po'i rig mchog la// stong dpon nyid du gzung bar bgyi// dam tshig nyid du dag
189b4(rgyud 'grel): yi// rin chen 'byung ba'i rigs mchog la// nyin re dus drug byas nas su// sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bya// byang chub chen po 'byung ba yi// pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag la// phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam tshig so sor gzung bar bgyi// sdom pa
189b5(rgyud 'grel): mas cad dang ldan pa// ji ltar nus pa mchod pa'i las// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// de bzhin nyid du so sor gzung // bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// mchog tu bskyed par byas nas su// sems can thams cad don byed phyir// sdom pa ma
189b6(rgyud 'grel): lus gzung bar bgyi// ma brgal ba rnams bdag gis bsgral// ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung ste// mya ngan 'das la sems can dgod// ces bya ba ni slob mas zhus pa'i tshig go/ slob dpon gyis
190a1(rgyud 'grel): lan btab pa// theg pa chen po 'bras dbyung ba'o// dpal spyan ma chag gi sum 'di yin// gang gi khyed rnams grol 'gyur ba// de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yid// lkug par gnas bya mchod nas ni/
190a2(rgyud 'grel): lan ji skad gsungs pa'i chos bshad bya// thams cad sems ni chem byas nas// de 'og dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// de nas slob dpon rang gnas su// rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ldan// rdo rje dril bu sgrar bcas pas// slar yang
190a3(rgyud 'grel): glu ni blang bar bya// 'phrog byed cod pan nor bu'i 'od kyis zhabs gnyis brgyan// yid 'od lha mos thugs ka dam por btsir ba'i sku// zhabs gnyis bskyed pas gsang ba phye zhing pad+mar skor// rdo rje sems mdzes dbang phyug dam pa'i go 'phang
190a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ slob ma lhag par gnas dang / sdom pa'i chog ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas lha rnams tshi ma byed pa'o// sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi nI shir phyogs sam/
190a5(rgyud 'grel): byang dang nub kyi phyogs char ni// zhi dang rgyas pa'i rim pa bzhin// 'bad zlas stegs bu brnam par bya// rgyur ni sor mo bcu bzhi pa// phyi rol gru bzhi pa ru byA// de ni cha gsum bges po la// zabs su cha gnyis brko bar bya// kha khyem
190a6(rgyud 'grel): do yi bzhi ma ru// kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ni// khaM khyer gyi ni byed du bya// phyi rol gyi ni rab dge/ sor gcig pas ni kun nas bskor// thab khung dbus su rdo rje ni// pad+ma'i steng du bzhag par bya// sangs
190b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas lnga yis mtshan pa ni// ji bzhin phyogasu dgod bya ste// kha khyer gyi ni phyogs bzhi ru// sangs rgyas mtshan mas mtshan par bya// dbang po'i rdo rje mdzes pa yis// grwa dang grwa ru brgyan par bya// stan gyi gnas dang nye ba ru// ti se gangs kyi
190b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dge ba// dbangs dang rgyar ni khru phyed bcas// sor mo bcu gnyis bzhag par bya// pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams la ni// rim bzhin lha mo rnams kyang bzhag/ ra ba dra ba phur bur rnams// sngar bzhin thams cad sbyar bar bya// der ni dur
190b3(rgyud 'grel): khrod me dag gam// gtsubs las byung bar brtag par bya// de yi dbus su pad+ma ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan bsgom// yi ge raM gyi lcags kyu yis// me yi dbus su sems kyi dgug/ mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs
190b4(rgyud 'grel): pa// las kyi cho ga ji bzhin dbul// yam shing zho can lnga yi shing // 'o ma la sogs lnga po bsreg/ zho dang sbrang rtsi bu ram dang // 'o ma sA lu'i zan dung bcas// 'bras kyi so ba la sogs 'bru// thams cad cho ga bzhin du bsreg/
190b5(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba la sogs pa yi me// thams cad ji bzhin dpyad par bya// dri dang me tog bdug pa sdigs// mkhas pas thams cad mchod par bya// rnal 'byor pad+ma'i me yi dbus bkod nas// de dbus rdo rje lha mo ni// lha mo kun gyi 'byung gnas
190b6(rgyud 'grel): te// dbus kyi lha mo dgug par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// gzugs mdzes yongs su rdzogs par bsam// sngags dang phyag rgya kun rig pas// sngon bzhin thams cad mchod par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi dbus su ni/
191a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kun gyis mchod nas kyang // bsreg par bya ba'i rdzas kun gyis// lha rnams thams cad tshi ma par bya// oM sarba sa sho d+ha ni hUM phaT/ rdzas bsang ba'i sdugaso// rnam shes sa gdugs sbyar nas ni/
191a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse mo gsum du brtags// oM hUM A swA hA/ sreg blugs kyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dang po yam shing bsreg par bya// de yi 'og tu mar byin nas// mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o mar bcas// 'bru rnams thams cad bsreg pa ni/
191a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bsreg las ni gsum pa yin// bzhi par 'o thug dbul bya ste// sA lu'i 'bras zan mar dang ni// 'o mar bcas bsregs lnga pa yin// de nyid can gyi brgya phrag lnga 'am// 'byor na de bas lhag kyang rung // ji ltar nus pa bsreg pa yi//
191a4(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya// de 'og mar dang 'o mar bcas// zhal gyi nang du bsreg par bya// slar yang de nyid du sbyar nas su// las kyi dbye bas bsreg par bya// mar dang bdud rtsi lngar bcas pa'i// gang ba'i srog thugs brtag par
191a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// de nas rdo rje dril dkrol te// rdo rje glu yis bstod par bya// hUM hUM hUM/ yang dag spong dang sdud pa po// bdag med rnal 'byor sngon mdzad pa// thun mong rnal 'byor bdag nyid de// rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM hUM hUM/ stong bu 'di nyid
191a6(rgyud 'grel): lal sogs pa'i// de nyid las ni gzugs su bstan// gang dge 'dong bzhin gyur ba'i dngos// yang shes lnga la phyag 'tshal bstod// thams cad glu dang gar la sogs// phyi dang nang gI mchod nas kyang // snying po bsdus shing bsags pa
191b1(rgyud 'grel): yis// slar yang de bzhin bsreg par bya// rdzas kyi cho ga yongs rdzogs nas// bsgrub pas bdag nyid sbyor bar bya// dpal gyi 'bras bu lo 'bru'i 'bras// zho dang sbrang rtsi mar gyi bsgos// byang chub sems kyi yam shing la// brgya phrag lnga na
191b2(rgyud 'grel): bsreg par bya// de yi dbus su dbang bskur nas// smon lam btab ste mnyam par bzhag/ rgyal srid nyams pa'ang sa gsum gyis// rgyal srid mdzes pa'ang myur du 'thob// 'o ma sbrang rtsis sbags pa yi// lo ma yi ni yam shing dag/ brgya
191b3(rgyud 'grel): phrag lnga ru bsregs na ni// myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// las ni gang dang gang bsam pa// de dang de ni des 'byung 'gyur// de nas ston gyi rnal 'byor gyis// rang rang gnas su lha mo brtag/ me tog bdug pa sna tshogs kyis// mkhas
191b4(rgyud 'grel): pas sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod// rnal 'byor can gyis brtan par bya// mchod pa nyi shus mchod nas ni// rdo rje dril bus rol par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// sa gsum pad+mar sbrel nas ni// dkar
191b5(rgyud 'grel): pro gi wang bsgrengs nas su// phyag rgya 'di yos bskyod par bya// oM badz+ra gar+b+he hU~M hU~M/ oM badz+ra gaN+De ra Ni ta sa rba bud d+ha pra tsa yi te pradz+nyA pA ra me tA nAd sa b+hA ba~M bad+yA d+hA ra ni hr-id yA a pas ton ni hU~M na ha~M swA AhA/
191b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas bskyod par bya ste// rdo rje dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// me thab kyi mtshan nyid dang // / sbyin sreg gi cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// /
192a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas lcags kyu lnga la sogs// rnal 'byor ma la dbul bar bya// lcags kyu gzhan na thams cad kyang // lcags kyu lnga yis de nyid bya// thams cad rag pas phyinang gi/ rnal 'byor ma kun dbul bar bya// khu rur
192a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni bcings nas su// ye shes rnam shes dkri bar bya// oM AHhU~M hU~M gu suM swA hA/ lcags kyu lha'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// thams cad ro ni gcig gyur pa// lho nub kyi ni mtshams su bzhag/ gnas ni gzhan dang gzhan dag tu// nye bar
192a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i snod kyis mchod// slob dpon shin tu rtags pa yis// bdud rtsi lnga ni dbul bar bya// nya phyis chen po la sogs sngon// snod ni mdzes pa dgang bar bya// zla ba'i lag pa brkyang nas su// rnam shes dang ni 'jigs par sbyar// ba dan
192a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa brkyang byas nas// nya phyis la sogs mdun du bzhag/ sngon gyi sngags sogs de nyid kyis// bdud rtsi lnga ni sbyang bar bya// de yi dbus su zla ba la// bdud rtsi'i yi ge blta bar bya// oM ha ha~M nIHg+h+raM dz+dza A swAhA/ zhes bya ba ste/ bdud
192a5(rgyud 'grel): TI lnga sbyang ba'i sngags so// rnam shes dang ni 'jigs par sbyar// bsrung ba rnam pa gsum du 'dod// rnal 'byor ma kun sngags rig pas// thigs pa'i thor ma dang por dbul// nya phyis laM sogos snod bkang ste// mi so'i char ni dbul bar ba// sbyin
192a6(rgyud 'grel): min pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pa thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje dril bu'i sgra yis ni// slar yang gru ni glang por bya// hUM hUM hU~M/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsam pas rol// thar pa la dgyes blta na yang // shin tu dbyer med brtan pa ste/ sha dang sbrang
192b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsi bsrubs mthu yis// rdo rje ma gcig ngal ba 'joms// drag mo re langs gtum mo yis// bya ba sna tshogs byed 'gyur gtso// yongs su grol ba'i mchog nyid de// thar dang 'gal dang snying rjes khros// snying po yi ni snying por gnas// bzhi pas bka'
192b2(rgyud 'grel): cing khro ba 'joms// dran pa lnga bral srid las grol// chags dang rmongs dang de nyid mkhyen// de nyid sbyor bas gzigs bI gtso// zhabs mchog lha yis phyag bgyis pa// pad+ma'i gdan bzhugs gtso bo ni// yongs su mnyes shing tshim bya'i phyir//
192b3(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin gyis ni gdugs kyang thogs// gdong bzhi pa yis rnga yab g.yo ba// seng ge dag ni gsol kas gnas// 'phrog byed rje be'i mtshan mas sgrogs// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal gyur cig/ lcags kyu lnga la
192b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yi// mchod pa thams cad nges par dbul pa'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byar mar bcas pa'o// dpa' bo'i sems ni mchod par bya// phyogs brgyad kun nas bskor ba ru//
192b5(rgyud 'grel): kun la gdan ni phul nas kyang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma gnas su// cig car lhan cig stan la bzhugs// de nyid rnal 'byor ma kun gyis// gnyis sgro nu ma 'dzin pa dang // sgeg cing bzhad dang bcas pa yis// rdo rje dril bus rol par bya//
192b6(rgyud 'grel): kun la dri ni rim bzhin dbul// kun la me tog sogs pas mchod// thams cad dri yis bdug nas ni// thams cad la ni mar me dbul// thams cad mdun du gtor ma ni// thams cad phud las dbul bar bgyi// lcags kyu'i rdzas ni sna tshogs te//
193a1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par du ni rnam pa lnga// gnyis med de nyid de yid kyi// rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes par bya// rnal 'byor na mkha'i rang bzhin du// slob dpon lus ni nges par bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi dung chos las// nan tan du ni zla bas dbul//
193a2(rgyud 'grel): sngar bstan pa ni de nyid kyi// sgrub pa pos ni gsang sngags brjod// gnas gsum du ni gtor nas su// rnal 'byor pa yis kun nas dbul// dam tshig spyod pa thams cad la// tshigs bcad 'dis ni sbyin par bya// ltos shig mdzes pa yi ni chos//
193a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di la the tshom byar mi rung // khyi dang bram ze gdol pa gsum// rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza'// pad+ma bskor ba sngon 'gro bas// gzhan gyi de bzhin gzung nasu// rnam shes dang ni 'jigs par sbyar// lhag ma rtse mo lta bur sbyar//
193a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi mar zla ba bzhag nas ni// tshogs bcad 'di ni rje su bzla// rin thang med pa'i dam pa'i chos// 'dod chags dri bral legs 'ongs shing // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// de nyid gnas la phyag 'tshalo// de nas thams cad rnal 'byar
193a5(rgyud 'grel): pa// thams cad dag pa'i rim pa yis// thams cad 'dod bzhin byin gyis brlab// bkra shis glu ni len pa dang // dpa' bo rnam par dag pa'o// A li kA li bzlas nas su// rdo rje dril bu'i sgrar ldan pas// de nyid glu ni blang bar bya/
193a6(rgyud 'grel): thar pa'i bde ba dam pa'i mchog/ snying rjes brgyan pa'i bde la rol// chags pa'i dga' bas brgyan pa ni// drag pos 'gal ba 'joms par mdzad// stong pa nyid du gzigs pa yi// bza' dang bza' min rnam par spangs//
193b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro po yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis rnam par rol// bkra shis kun gyis mchod gnas su// rdo rje glu yis nye bar bsrung // rdo rje dril bu sgrar bcas pas// dpa' bos lhag ma'i gtor mas dga'// rang bzhin
193b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sems gcig gis// kha ni yongs su dgang bar bya// las gang 'dod pa bsams nas su// gtor ma'i gnod du gdab par bya// oM ku ri ku ru/ rje dang rje chen dngos grub gdong // dur khrod gnas ma yi dwags gdo/
193b3(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs byed gtum mo khrag dgyes ma// dam tshig srung zhing rnal 'byor 'dzin// ki li ki li sgra chen ma// pha mes nags gnas gdon gyi ni// tshogs bcas dbus su bzhugs gyur pa// gtsigs byed gtum mo dud sol ma// bzhes
193b4(rgyud 'grel): shig gsol cig dam tshig la// bzhag nas dbang du mdzad du gsol// oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sarba duSh+Ta na~M b+hak+Sha b+hak+ShA ho pri phreM phreM phreM pheM phaT swAt+ma/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// dkar po dang ni gi wang bsgre // rtse mo cung zad bkug nas/
193b5(rgyud 'grel): kha yi grwa ru bzhag par bya// lhag ma'i gtor ma la dud pa'i sol ba mo zhes bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// pha mos nags kyi mchog dang ni// brag dang shing gcig chu chen 'gram// nye bar spyod pa lnga ldan pa'i// gtor sbyin se gol
193b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gtogs bya// lhag ma'i gtor ma'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas rdzas ni lnga po dag/ dri zhim bcas shing 'o mar bsre// dung gi snod ni yongs bkang ste// dam tshig chu
194a1(rgyud 'grel): yis gtor bar byA// oM swA/ b+h+yas swAhA/ lan bdun par du bzlas nas// dam tshig chu ru lhag par bya// do nas slong ma re ro nas// sdom pa dag ni byin nas gzhug/ mig nags kyis bkab nas su// thal
194a2(rgyud 'grel): myo sbyar nas gzhug par bya// slob dpon gyi no mdun gnas to// thal mo me tog gis bkang nas// de ring 'khor ba las bsgral nas// byang chub sems su smon par bya// de nas slob mas rang bzhin ni// dag pa la sogs bsgrim par bya/
194a3(rgyud 'grel): oM waM b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarbo ng+gar+m+ma swA b+hA ba shud d+hAH/ oM badz+rA shud d+hA/ san+nad+hArmA badz+ra shwad d+hAd+ha/ oM oM g+ha shudad+d+haHsar+b+ba d+ha~Mm ga shu d+hoH/ dgu pa rnam gsum byas nas ni// slob ma la ni 'di skad brjod// sangs rgyas chos dang
194a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dun to// dkon mchog gsum la sgrubasu song // gzhan gyi nor la reg bya min// 'jigs pa kun gyi 'jigs mi bya// sems can byams dang snying rje sogs// sdom pa dang ni tshul khrims bsrung // oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pu dze bas+tha nA ya At+ma na ni
194a5(rgyud 'grel): ta yA mi/ oM Atsar+ya pU dze bstan yA A~Mt+ma ni r+yAt+ta ya ni/ oMs ga la swA b+h+yoSh+Ta rIt+pan+tu ya/ at+ma nats+tshid+hA yA lA~M/ sa ma ya swA/ sa ma ya ho/ a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje byin gyis 'arlas// u nA~M 'did bu sgru byed pa/
194a6(rgyud 'grel): mi sbyid kyipa'i rjo gi na nas mi byis pa kyi/ drugs kyi rkye kyis sa sa sasu su da'adrus sa su durdzus shes na mi gas / na mdun te ldan
194b1(rgyud 'grel): d+hA/ bdud d+hA ya ni dung chas nas// sngags kyi kha ru byung bar bya// rnga bzhin bka' na bsgos nas kyang // dam tshig byas te dbab par bya// slob ma lha yi skur bskyed la// snying ga rlung gis bskur ba yi// rlung gi sa bon gzhag par bya// rkang par/
194b2(rgyud 'grel): rlung dang rlung gis ni// snying ga'i rlung gis sba bar bya// ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag byas te// hUM gi ye shes drug tu bzla// oM AHkha khi laM le hUM a// rdo rje dril bur sbyar bcas pas// rnal 'byor pa yis nga rgyal bskyed// rdo rje glu yis glu len cing //
194b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gar gyis drag tu bskyed// rang 'dod gar gyis gar byed cing // bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa twA sa ma ya pra ti ba la ka hU~M hrI ts+tsha tsa tsa ho swAhA/ gsheg su gsol ba'i sngags so// de nas me tog gtor nas ni// gnas lnga
194b4(rgyud 'grel): nr-i lha mo yi// rigs kyi bye brag shes byas la// sngags dang phyag rgyal sogs sbyin// oM dz+nyA na tsikrA d+d+ha aHswAhA/ de mig phye nas phyag byas te// l-I yi de nyid bstan par bya// sum cu ba yo 'byung ba'i gnas// lha rnams kun gyi bdag po ste/
194b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dngos kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin mas 'khyung // rnal 'byor na mkha' zhes bya ba// rnam dag ye shes kyis sprul ltos// me long ye shes las sprul pa// snang ba thams cad 'joms mdzad cing // glang po'i steng
194b6(rgyud 'grel): na yang dag bzhugs// shar gyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro ltos// monyam nyid ye shes las sbyong ba// sbrul dga'o yi ni spyan la bzhugs// bdud rnams thams cad bsreg byed pa// byang gi mkha' 'gro drag mo ltos// mi dge bcu yi las la sogs//
195a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dpyod las nges sprul bya// bya khyung gi ni stan la bzhugs// nub phyogs ro langs ma la ltos// bya ba kun byed las byung ba// seng ge 'phrog byed 'dul mdzad ma// nyon mongs thams cad sreg pa yi//
195a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs lha mo la yang ltos// stag se do 'ug pa ce spyang ste// snying po'i grwa bzhi dag na gnas// seng gau phag dang ma he dang // ce spyang gi ni stan la bzhugs// sems can don bya'i rgyu ru ni// thabs chen sna tshogs gzugs kyi bzhugs// mkha'
195a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro me 'bar 'jigs byed ma// 'phrog byed ma ste sgo rnams skyeng // lha rnams thams cad 'gugs pa dang // 'dzud cing 'ching dang mnyes byed yin// sbos mo 'ju byed gtum mo ste// bdud rtsi'i snod ni phyag ni bsnams// drag mo khrag gsog sha
195a4(rgyud 'grel): gsil ma// lcags kyu lnga yis bkang ba yis// pad+ma'i snod ni bsnams nas su// gcig pa'i steng nas 'gebs par mdzad// drag shul 'bar ma mi sdug pa// phyag na 'dam skyes gtor mas bkang // thod pa ma dang rdo rje ma// bum can bza'
195a5(rgyud 'grel): btung bsnams shing 'gebs// sgeg mo dri dang pi bang dang // me tog glu dang bdug par bcas// gar dang mar me bcas pa kun// phyogs mtshams mchod pa brtson pa yin// 'phrog byed dag ni gsol ka ste// tshangs pa rnga ma thogs shing g.yob//
195a6(rgyud 'grel): drag mo ming ni sgrog par byed// brgya byin gdugs ni thogs te gnas// rang gi chung ma sder bcas pa// phyi rol sgo bzhi dag na gnas// dbang po nor lha 'byung po'i bdag/ chu yi rgyal po mtshams bzhin// rang gi chung ma sder bcas pa//
195b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs mchod pa thogs te gnas// bar snang gnas pa'i grong khyer ni// lha yi de nyid mtshon par bya// lha'i de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
195b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas yan lag lnga btud de// am+b+ha na bas bkru mchod sogs te// rang 'dod chos ni gsol ba gdab// rnal 'byor ma mtshogs bcas pa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i go 'phang las// phyir mi ldog par bdag 'gyur ba'i// rig pa gang yin deng bdag
195b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol// de nas slob ma thal sbyar nas// sdom pa'i sngags ni brjod par bya// oM badz+ra maN+Da la ma hA maN+Da la pra b+he shra s+t+ra trAM/ oM yo ga maN+Da la ma hA maN+Da la darI s+t+waM hUM/ oM g+hu h+ya maN+Da la ma hA maN+Da la d+hik+Shi s+t+waM haM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ho/ yang slob
195b4(rgyud 'grel): mas brjod du gzhug par bya ste/ don dam smra ba'i seng ge rnal 'byor zhes bya ba// sdug bsngal gcod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa// srid pa'i nyes dmigs skyed rtse nyon mongs bcad nas ni// rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po de nyid grub par mdzod//
195b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i khu tshur btsongs na m+b+ha su// dung dang ye shes sbyor bar bya// lA yi bodag nyid tshul gyis ni// gan+d+has brgyud dag ni bsrung bar bya// k+She ni spyi bor bsam bya ste// hU~M ni mig gnyis dag tu dgod// yuM ni rna ba sna dag la// lce la sum yig 'bar
195b6(rgyud 'grel): ba bsam// mgrin par d+h+r-i ni brtsegs pa ste// na mo tshangs dag la b+h+rUM bsam// snying ga'i phyogs su m+b+hi/ lte bar hU~M dgod par bya// sa bai ni brgyad ni dgod par dang // phyag rgya rim bzhin yan lag dgod// oM sa ma yo ho haM/ mi ti ma
196a1(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ro haM/ ma ti a/ adz+nyA na haM/ mi ti ts+tsha bar d+hA no haM ho/ oM ud+b+ha ba A a AHoM hUM phaT/ de nyid so sor bzung ba yis// ye shes sku ni bdag ces brjod// gsang ba'i sdom pa byin nas su// de la
196a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang ni bskur bar bya// rnal 'byor ma brgyad kyi go cha dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas dbang ni bskur ba'i phyir// lho dang nub dang byang du ni/ shar phyogs kyi ni bumo pa rnams// slob
196a3(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyis ni bsnyen pa bya// seng ge'i gdan sogs lnga la ni// mgo bor gdugs dang bcas te bzhag/ bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas nas ni// me tog bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar// byang chub sems kyi sa bon gyis// sems can bla med smon
196a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// rdo rje dril bu'i sgrar ldan pas// bkra shis glu yi dgang bar bya// slob ma shar du bltas nas ni// slob dpon nub tu blta bar bya// rdo rje sems sogs sbyor ba yi// nyi zla'i lag pa bum gzung nas// rdo rje bcas pa'i shing lo yis//
196a5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'i ye shes chu blangs te// de ring 'khor ba sgrol byed pa'i// byang chub chen por dbang bskur bya/ a phu pheM phaT hUM swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngagaso// rdo rje lcogs sgrogs phyag rgya ni// dkar po gi wang sbrel bar bya// oM badz+ra kA ya hUM
196a6(rgyud 'grel): AHAhA/ gnas brgyad kyis ni gnas rnams su// bsrung ba dag ni bcing bar bya// nyi mar rdo rje byin nas su// zla bar dril bu sbyin par bya// mgo bor sangs rgyas rnam pa sngo// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// rdo rje/ khu tshur gnyis
196b1(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas// dkar po dang ni gi waM bsgreng // rtse mo cung zad dkug ste sprad// du ba dang ni dri gsum brkyang // oM aHhUM swA hA/ sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan gyis// dbang bskur sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bdag gis thams cad byin nas su//
196b2(rgyud 'grel): ming brtags rdo rje lag tu byin// brtul bzhugs gar la sogs pa rnams// ji ltar zlos pa'i rim bzhin sbyin// der ni sngags dang phyag rgya bcing // sangs rgyas kun gyi nges pa yin// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor na mkha' yi// dbang gi di ring
196b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas kun tu rab grub phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis zung // oM shrI yo ga AM ba ri traM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ pa ri sa ma yau s+t+waM/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun
196b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag/ rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso// rdo rje'i'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad// byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed// srid pa'i rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/
196b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yi// dngos po mchog tu byed par 'gyur// dril bu'o// rdo rje dril bu 'khyud nas ni// g.yon snyems pa dang sgras gnon 'chang // gnyis med gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis/
196b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs// sangs rgyas kun bdag rnal 'byor ldan// bdag po'i dbang ni bskur nas su// A li kA li'i sa bon gyis// sngags kyi dbang bskur sbyin par bya// he shrI yo ga aM ba ri tAM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi nA ma a b+hi She ka ta
197a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dpal gyi sgra dang bcas pas ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// gsang ba rdo rje'i phyag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcas// rnal 'byor na mkha'i brtul zhugs
197a2(rgyud 'grel): brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha ta d+hA ra ya mi hUM hUM ha ha ha haM/ rdo rje brtul zhugs so// de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// rnal 'byor ma dang dpa'i sogs la// shes rab thabs kyi snyemos chen gyis// gar mchod bde
197a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dga' ston gyis// gar ro// sgeg dang bcas pas phreng ba 'phang // sangs rgyas kun sogs rnal 'byor ma// des ni 'bral bar mi 'gyur te// phreng ba de yi rgyun yin no// phreng ba'o// lus can kun la dam tshig kyi// khyod kyi glu ni blang bar bya//
197a4(rgyud 'grel): des na rnal 'byor ma de dang // myur du bde ba myong bar 'gyur// glu'o// khyod kyi rgyal la dri phul la// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang // rnal 'byor ye shes mthong ba yi// byang chub lus can rnams la bsgos dri'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas la spos
197a5(rgyud 'grel): phul la// brtul zhugs bzang pos legs tshim gyis// lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su// ye shes kyi ni tshim par 'gyur// spros so// chos kyi me ni legs sbar ba// pad+ma gar dbang rang nyid de// sems can ma rig ljongs byas pa//
197a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sgron mas snang bar gyis// mar me'o// ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal// oM badz+ra nai tra A pa ha ra pa Ta laM hrI/ thur ma'o// chos rnam
197b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la brnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// ngo bo med cing gnas med pa// rgyu dang las las kun nas 'byung // de ltar chos 'di shes gyis la// sems can don 'di mnyam med kyis// 'on kyang rnal
197b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma sras skye// me long ngo // sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// bya ba spyod tshul gsang ba yi// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis// 'khor lo'o// khyod kyis the tshom dogs med par// yid gnyis med
197b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems kyis ni// chos kyi dung ni tha med pa// dri med kun tu gang bar gyis// dung ngo // g.yon pa'i chos gos phrog par gzar// g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya dang // ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag byas te// 'khor lo kun la rnam bzhugs te/
197b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor na mkha' lung ston bzhin// mgrin gcig bzhin du lung bstan bya// 'di ni khyed la ngas lus bstan// rnal 'byor na mkha' de bzhin gshegs// ngan 'gro srid las bton nas su// srid mchog gtan du dag par gyis// he shrI yo gI pa
197b5(rgyud 'grel): ri nA ma ta thA ga ta sid d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hAr b+hu ba swA hA/ lung bstan pa'o// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// kun tu 'khyud de me tog rol// sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos sa bon// me tog nang du rtog tu rol// sde tshan gsum gyis rnam rol pa// der ni rnam
197b6(rgyud 'grel): bar dgod par bya// dpa' bo sdig gi gnyen po ste// dpal dang ldan zhing lhun che ba// dpa' bos de nyid goms par bya// sangs rgyas kun bdag sbyor ba yis// mdun du yi ges dbang bskur la// sangs rgyas lnga ni bstan par bya// sngags kyi
198a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bstan par bya// yi ge brgyad po bsgom du gzhug/ slob dpon gyi dbang bskur nas// ye shes rnam shes bstan par bya// sbyor ba yi ni dbang bskur nas// gsang ba thams cad mngon par brjod// gsang chen de
198a2(rgyud 'grel): dag thams cad kyis// dbang bskur ba ni go 'phang mchog/ bzod pa'i chos ni ston 'gro bas// sems can rnams ni gzir mi bya// tshig rtsub khyal pos sgra min zhing // sems can rnams ni sun mi dbyung // tshul khrims sdom pa bsrung bya zhing // skye
198a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la gtse mi bya// bdag nyid shi bar gyur kyang bla// sems can srog gcod de lta min// rab tu 'bar mer mtshungs pas na// gzhan gyi nor la ra mi bya// rnal 'byor pa yi brdzun bsrung zhing // phan tshun dbye ba'i las mi bya// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnal
198a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa// de la brdzun ni yod ma yin// spyod pa bag yod bcas pa dang // bza' dang longs spyod bag yod bya// dga' bar rol pa bag yod cing // gtor sogs cho ga bag yod la// rnal 'byor pa ni grub 'dod pas// sems can brten na 'grub par
198a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// thams cad shes pa'i slob ma gang // sems can dga' ba'i las rnams bya// mnyam nyid ye shes las bskyed nas// thams cad mnyam nyid blta bar bya// rtag tu mnyam pa'i spyod pa can// rtag tu rnal 'byor bsam gtan gus// bslab pa blangs
