198a6(rgyud 'grel): pas sngon 'gro bas// dkyil 'khor gtor ma sogs pa// sems can don bya'i tshul khrims rnams// bu yi srog bzhin bskyang bar bya// gso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal// slob ma'i gtso bo la sogs pas// sems
198b1(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad rim bzhin du// gnyis med cho ga bzhin mchod nas// lha la phyag ni 'tshal du gzhug/ slob ma dag ni thams cad dang // sems can kun la de nyid bstan// dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / bslab pa'i cho ga ste/ nyi shu rtsa drug
198b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// / de nas slob ma blo ldan pas// bla ma'i yon ni dbul bar bya// bu dang chung ma sdug pa dang // gnyen dang bran po bran mor bcas// yul dang zhing dang khyim dang ni// mu tig gos dang gser dang ni// dngul dang zangs
198b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs nor rnams dang // 'bru ni rnam pa sna tshogs dngul// mal stan ngag ni thams cad dang // mnyes pa'i longs spyod kun phul nas// mthar ni bdag gis lus nyid kyang // slob dpon yon du brtag par bya// slob mar gus pa med pa yis// dngos grub ring
198b4(rgyud 'grel): bar the tshom med// yon dang dad pa sngon 'gro bas// dngos po kun gyi mnyes par bya// dri dang me tog bdug pa sogs// phyag rgya thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje dril bu'i sgra ldan pas// bkra shis glu yis dgang bar bya// hUM hUM mgon khyod yongs su thar
198b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'ang khyod// chos ston pa yang khyod yin te// snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba'i gzugs// kye gzugs bzang mthar phyin pa yang khyod// kye de nyid srid pa las grol khyod// rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// kye thar pa'i rdo rje khyod nyid do// lnga pa'i dbyangs
198b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcom pa yis// 'akra shis bstod sgra nye bA bsdu// i ra ma r-i ma ho hi ho hU~M ho AHoM ma ra ma ho hAn+na hU~M hi hi A/ oM ra mo ra ma bru~M phreM thA pra hU~M hU~M bosa.oM ma ro la ho g+hu g+hu g+ho e sAdz+dza/ rnal 'byor mo brgyad phreng sngags kyi/
199a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par byas nas nyi ma dang // zla ba dag ni kun tu sbyar// me tog gis ni snyim par dgang // sems can kun la sems chen pos// smon lam dag ni gdab par bya// ma brgal ba rnams bdag gis bsgral// rnal
199a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bstan bcos go 'phang gnas// bya ba dag ni 'bras bu brtag/ rgyal dbang shis pa brjod pa dag/ thams cad sngon du byin la brtag/ yon bdag tsho sogs sems can rnams// thal mo sbyar te gnas par bya// me tog bcas pas dung chos
199a3(rgyud 'grel): chus// shis pa brjod pa 'bar bar bya// di ring khyod ni 'khor ba yi// rgya mtsho las ni rang brgal zhing // rdo rje las byung rdo rje dngos// sangs rgyas go 'phang dbang bskur zhing // myur du sems can thams cad kyi// don byed nus pa'i sems dang ldan/
199a4(rgyud 'grel): shes pa dag ni brjod nasu// gshegasu gsol ba'i sbyor ba bya// bla ma'i yon dang slob ma'i bzod par gsol ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//
199a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje dam bcings nas// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// oM na ma te hUM/ na maHmi hUM/ na mo na maHhUM swA hA/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'o// sngags gsum rig pas phyag bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// zla ba snying
199a6(rgyud 'grel): gar btsir nas su// nyi ma sa la brkyang nas ni// brtan par sngags ni bzla bar bya// oM gats+tsha gats+tsha swa d+hU ba naM hUM swA hA/ 'jig rten las 'das pa gshegasu gsol ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM gats+tsha pu rA nA ga ma na ya hUM phaT swA hA/ sa
199b1(rgyud 'grel): gol gsum ni gtogs par bya// 'jig rten pa kun gshegs su gsol// oM g+hi li g+hi li na d+haM hUM swA hA/ tshon rtsi bsdu 'i sngag so// tshon rtsi dag ni bsdus na ni// chu 'o chen por bskyal bar bya// lhag ma'i cha yi gtor ma yang // lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am mu 'gram bskyal//
199b2(rgyud 'grel): oM hi li haM li phu lI ma hA phu li pa~M pheM phaM swA hA/ lhag ma'i gtor ma la bzlas pa'i sngags so// btung dang bza' ba la sogs lnga// de nas slar ni mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor gnas ni de nyid du// tshon rtsi ser po la sogs pas/
199b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab brgyad ge sar bcas// lte bar ldan pa bris nas su// gnyis med gtor ma byin gyi brlab// sngar gyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang // mchod pa rgya chen thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i 'khor lo mchod par bya// slob mar bcas pas sngags
199b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// bkra shis glu blang gar yang bya// rnal 'byor na mkha' gang yin pa// de nyid rnam par snang mdzad gtse// rdo rje mkha' 'gro gang yin pa// de nyid 'phags ma mA ma kI// mkha' 'gro drag ma gang yin pa// de nyid na bza' dkar mo yin//
199b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ro langs ma gang yin// de ni 'phags ma sgrol ma ste// mkha' 'gro gtum mo gang yin pa// de nyid sangs rgyas spyan ma yin// grub pa'i pho nya rnam pa bzhi// thams cad rig pa'i lus su byed// sangs rgyas zhing sogs zhing rnams
199b6(rgyud 'grel): la// khyad par du ni sbyin la spyad// dmangs rigs stong phrag gnyis dag ni// bram ze gtsang ma gcig dang 'dra// bram ze stong phrag gnyis dag ni// dge slong gcig la rab tu sbyar// dge slong stong phrag gnyis dag ni// rdul med pa ni
200a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig dang mnyam// rdul med stong phrag brgyad dag ni// ye shes ldan pa gcig dang sbyar// ye shes ldan pa stong phrag gnyis// slob dpon gcig dang mnyam par brtag/ de ltar sbyin pa'i zhing byas nas// blo dang ldan
200a2(rgyud 'grel): pas rtag tu sbyin// rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i chos las ni// zhing bzang po la sa bon gdab// mtshams med pa dang sdig can yang // tshon rtsi mthong bas grol bar 'gyur// sngags kyi de nyid phab pa yis// gcong ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur//
200a3(rgyud 'grel): na bdag po dag bzang po'i rnal 'byor pa// rim gyis myur du byang chub 'gyur// srid pa gsum por sku ni rjes chags dul bar ldan// 'od zer sngon po stong ldan nyi ma brgya stong ldan// rnam mang sku dang cha lugs rjes chags sems dpar ldan//
200a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor na mkha' mchog gi dbang gi dbang phyug gar byed rolo// hU~M zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni// rnal 'byor ma kun chags par bya// bkra shis sgra ni snyan pa yis// shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste blang // rdo rje gdun bzhi rgyas pa las/
200a5(rgyud 'grel): stong phrag bcu gnyis mdor bsdus pa// de la dngos po tsam bsdus pa// snying po mdor bsags zhes bya ste// sdeb sbyor dang ni tshad ma med// rnal 'byor sbas par gyur pa yi// brda yi skad kyis bshad pa las// don la rton pa'i de nyid bsdus/
200a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po gdan bzhi pa las/ rnal 'byor thams cad dang gar dang / glu'i rab tu byed pa dang / mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs te/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzog s+ho//
200b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po Ar+ya de bas mdzad pa'i rgyud kyi rgya l+le dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga snying po mdor bsags pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho//
200b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang bod kyi lo tsa ba dgos khug pa lhas bcos kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / dge'o//
201a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gdan mazhi'i rmib dor 'grel la zugs/
201b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gtso bo lha mo thams cad bde// de nyid thams cad rab rtsed mdzad// gru gsum pad+ma'i dbus gnas pa'i// zla ba nyi ma me'i brgyan// pad+ma chen po nyer gnas te// yi dgas
201b2(rgyud 'grel): chen pos gdan byas par// gdan skyes rnal 'byor ma bsgoms na// myur du dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni// lung gi don gyi rjes 'brengs te// shing gcig la sogs dka' 'grel ni// rnal 'byor grub phyir bshad par bya//
201b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ma dang sgrub pa pos// rnal 'byor pho mo'i dkyil 'khor la// gtor ma'i las ni khyad par du// nges pa nyid ni sbyar bar bya// zla ba mar de'i tshes brgyad dang // bco lnga dang ni bcu bzhi la// rang khyim rnal 'byor ma mchod nas// phyi nas gtor ma brtsam
201b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// rang bzhin de bzhin phyi rol dang // lus la gnas pa'i lha rnams mchod// shing gcig la sogs gnas rnams su// gtor dang btung bas yongs su mchod// de ltar gyur pa'i sngags kyis ni// rnal 'byor ma kun mchod par bya// de ltar
201b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kun ma shes par// sngags pas phyi rol spyod byed na// bskal pa bye brgya bsgrubs kyang // lha rnams mnyes par mi 'gyur ro// de phyir rgyud rnams thams cad du// bcom ldan 'das kyis rtag sbas pa// rnal 'byor rgyud 'di thams cad la// dngos grub
201b6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'i rgyu ru ni// 'di ni rgyas par byas pa la// nyon cig bzang po bdag gis bshad// oM zhes pas ni mchod pa'i ngag/ shing gcig la sogs bdun du ni// rgyang grags gcig gi nang rol nas// shing gzhan dag ni rnam spangs la// shing
202a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa ni thams cad kyis// bshad pas shes rab mi 'gyur phyir// lus ni shing zhes bya bar bshad// lag pa yal ga la sogs bya// rigs byed mtha' las gsungs pa dang // rgyud gzhan dag las de skad gsungs//
202a2(rgyud 'grel): steng gi rtsa ba yal ga'o// a shwad zhes gsungs mi zad pa// me tog 'bras bus yongs su brgyan// shing zhes bya bar bshad pa yin// lus kyi dbus na a gnas pa'i// gsang ba'i phyir ni mi shes phyir// lte ba nas ni sor bzhin// de la lus
202a3(rgyud 'grel): brten rab tu gnas// 'di las steng 'byung yal ga gsum// shing gi bu gur yongs su ldan// lte snying smin ma'i dbus gnas par// thig le gsum ni gsungs pa dag/ steng dang 'og tu 'gro ba las// yal ga bcu zhes bya bar bshad// me tog
202a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu rtag tu ldan// 'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// gang tshe sna las phyir byung srog/ shing gcig pa zhes bya bar bshad// gsang ba'i shing gi shing chen po// gsang ba yi ni gnas na gnas// mu stegs nyan sogs thams cad kyis//
202a5(rgyud 'grel): shing de rnam par shes mi 'gyur// chos 'byung ba yi tshal chen por// de yi dbus su yongs gnas par// su tra rak+ta rang 'byung ba'o// me tog 'bras bu yongs su brgyan// de la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thar pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
202a6(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis// mngon sum nyid du bdag gis bshad// pa zhes bya ba su krar brjod// ma ni raka tar yongs su shes// yi ge gnyis ni kun sbyor ba// dur khrod du ni rnam par grags// dur khrod shi ba'i tshal bu shes//
202b1(rgyud 'grel): yi dgas kyi ni gnas su bshad// gang yang pha yis bsdus pa yis// gzugs dang kha dog mdzes pa'o// ma las byung ba'i gsum gyi dngos// de bzhi pa las byung ba'ang gsum// 'gyur ba drug po bsdus pa ni// dur khrod du ni rnam par grags//
202b2(rgyud 'grel): de phyir shi ba'i tshal bu bshad// lus po yis ni brten byas pa// dbang po bcu po la sogs kun// 'dus pa dang ni khu bar 'gyur// sor ni dur khrod zhes byar brjod// rim gyis 'byung sogs ngo bo ni// tshogs bshad dang por gang gsungs pa//
202b3(rgyud 'grel): de lta bar ni gsang ba'i gzugs// shes rab pad+ma'i mkha' khams su// ri dwags 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis su// 'byung po thams cad ltung ba'i gnas// dur khrod du ni yongasu brtag/ ri zhes bya ba'i ri bor bshad// lha rnams gnas su sa 'dzin
202b4(rgyud 'grel): te// lus kyang ri zhes bya bar brjod// gsum 'dus par ni yang dag ldan// dbang po bya yis yongs su gang // ri dwags la sogs sna tshogs ldan// lung rig gnas pa'i lha rnams ni// gtor dang btung bas mchod par bya// srog kyang ri/
202b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bar bshad// rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas par 'dzin// 'bras bu shing gis kun tu gang // ba spu rtsi yang phreng bas gang // chu ni yongs su 'bab par ldan// grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bsnyen pa// sa zhes pa ni pad+mar bshad// rba zhes bya ba rdo rjes shes// /
202b6(rgyud 'grel): ta zhes pa ni bde ba che// de phyir ro la ri zhes brjod// gang yang re yi phyogs gcig gnas// de la gnas pa'i lha rnams ni// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// dbang po sgo dgu'i gnas rnams ni// sna tshogs cho ga yi ni gnas// de phyir cong
203a1(rgyud 'grel): rong zhes su bshad// srog gi co re cong rong ni// ka zhes pa ni lus kyi dngos// de ni srog gi rlung gis gzung // de phyir cong rong zhes su btags// ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu 'bab pas// b+ha ga cong rong zhes su gsungs//
203a2(rgyud 'grel): gang yang 'dod chags zhu ba yi// khu ba yi ni gzugs su gnas// ka zhes pa ni myos pa'i mdog/ da zhes pa ni zhu ba'i bdag/ ri zhes pa ni dga' ba'i bdag/ cong rong de ni de ltar bshad// phug ni phyi nas bshad tshul gyis// sgrub pa po yi
203a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas su gsungs// bye ba brgyad cu'i rnal 'byor pas// gang du gnas ni rab brtags pa// de ni phug zhes bya ba'i ming // lus kun de dang 'dra bar gsungs// rkang pa'i mthil nas spyi bo'i bar// gsang char khyab pa rlung gi gzugs// rtag
203a4(rgyud 'grel): tu rlung gi gzugs su gnas// phug zhes bya bar bshad pa yin// gsang ba'i gsang bar gnas pa'i lha// de ni lha dang mi la gsang // rgyud dang rgyud ni thams cad las// snga bar gsang ba yin par bshad// skye bo'i gnas las glong 'dab
203a5(rgyud 'grel): du// gtor dang btung bas mchod par bya// dbang po'i grong gi kun tu gang // 'dab ni lus la rnam par gnas// rang gi bdag po'i lha bsgoms la// nus pa yis ni mchod par bya// lus kyi grong khyer spyi bor gnas// 'dab ni mtha'i rnam par
203a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas// dbang du gnas pa'i nang gi gang // grong gi 'dab zhes bya bar bshad// grong khyer gang la gnas pa ni// skye ba'i byin gyis brlabs las 'byung // shes rab dbyings kyi dngos po ni// grong khyer bya ba'i ming du gsungs// rtse gcig pa
203b1(rgyud 'grel): dang rtse gnyis pa// gsum po dang ni bzhi mdo ru// lha yi mchod pa sngar bshams te// lam du gnas te mchod par bya// las bcu la ni gnas pa ni// lam zhes pa ni lus la gnas// gcig pa rtogs pa las byung ba// gnyis po gnyis kyi
203b2(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gyi// sum mdo theg pa'i khyad par du// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag shes bya// srog ni sum mdo zhes su gsungs// gsher dang dmar ser skam pa yi// bzhi mdo ru ni shes par bya// skyer ba la sogs rnam pa bzhi// steng dang 'og gi khyad
203b3(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis// sum mdo zhes ni yongs su grags// steng du tshangs pa'i lam zhes bya// de bzhin 'og tu khyab 'jug dran// drag po dbus su rnam par shes// lam ni gsum po dag tu bshad// gru bzhi yon tan kun ldan pa// gsang ba yi
203b4(rgyud 'grel): ni pad+mar gnas// gru gsum lam gsum du shes bya// gnyis kyi gzugs su gnyis su 'gro// gang tshe dngos po gcig gyur pa// 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas kyi dngos// de ltar lam gcig shes bya ste// thar pa yi ni gzugs su gnas/
203b5(rgyud 'grel): btab pa'i lam ni yongs thob pa'i// zhing brgyad du ni gnas par bya// shin tu dgod dang spyod pa'i gnas// de bzhin du ni rigs kyi ri// rgyal ba dang ni nye rgyal dang // de bzhin rab mchog chu yi gnas// char ba'i rtse dang de brgyad dang // de dag zhing
203b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bar grags// gnas de dag tu 'dug nas kyang // gtor ma a yis mchod par bya// zhing gi 'gram na gnas pa ni// nye ba yi ni zhing du bstan// zhing brgyad dag ni gnas rnams ni// lus la gnas pa'i bdag gi bshad//
204a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing brgyad dag ni gnas rnams ni// bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis// rim pa ci bzhin bdag gis bkrol// shin tu rgod pa kha la gnas// spyod ma'i gnas ni smin ma'i mtshams// rigs can rna ba dag tu brjod//
204a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba sum mdo yi ni bdun// nye rgyal de bzhin snying gar gsungs// rab mchog sna yi rtse mo la// chu yi gnas ni mig tu shes// char pa'i rtse mo spyi bor gnas// san da ha ni sdom par gsungs// gsang ba yi ni pad+mar gnas// ze 'bru dang ni
204a3(rgyud 'grel): ze bar ldan// 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// de lta bas na brgyad du shes// ye shes dbang phyug ma dang ldan// lus ni zhing zhes bya bar gsungs// zhing ma shes rab tu shes bya// rnam pa kun gyi stong pas na// khyim stong du ni rab tu bshad//
204a4(rgyud 'grel): de na gnas pa'i lha rnams ni// cho ga snga mas mchod par bya// dngos po thams cad rnam spangs pas// lus kyang stong pa nyid du brjod// khyim stong zhes pa lus la bzung // bsgoms pas lha rnams bsgoms nas ni// sna tshogs mchod pa/
204a5(rgyud 'grel): drug chogs// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis mchod// gzugs kyi stong pa de nyid ltar// na Ti bcu po'ang de bzhin no// de la gnas pa'i ye shes ni// yid kyi sbyor bas mchod par bya// stong pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis// gnas gang la ni rab
204a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas par// chos 'byung zhes bya ba yi khyim// ye shes rnam shes dag dang ldan// de la gnas pa'i lha mo rnams// me tog chu yis mchod par bya// sgrub pos dngos grub thob pa'i phyir// gsang ba las kyang gsang ba ste//
204b1(rgyud 'grel): gang dang gang du gang bsnyen pas// de phyir bsnyen pa zhes su gsungs// de dag las kyang gnas rgyu ru// gnas nas kyang ni mchog tu 'gro/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal ba'o// 'gram du phyin pas chu 'gram gnas// rab dga' la sogs sa brgyad
204b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // legs pa'i blo gros dang bcas dgu// zhing brgyad khyad par du brjod pa// zhing dgu'i bdag por shes par bya// 'dod pa srog zhes bya bar shes// sa bon zhes bya dbang phyug go/ 'dod pa las byung nga rgyal ni// de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa che//
204b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i spyi bor yongs gnas te// rkang pa nas ni spyi bor khyab// 'dod pa sum 'dor bab pas ni// der ni 'gro ba gsum po rmongs// sa la sogs pa de bzhin drug/ 'dod pa yi ni gzugs su gnas// gzhan du bdud rtsi lnga yang brjod//
204b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dang sogs dngos grub brgyad// mi rnams gang gis sgrub byed pa// chu ngu la sogs sgrub par bstan// 'dod pa lus kyi yan lar ste// de nas glang chen zhes su bshad// gnas de dag na gnas pa nyid// lha rnams su ni rab grags pa//
204b5(rgyud 'grel): lnga po lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi// sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya// dbang po phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// ji srid dbang ldan mtshams bar du// g.yas dang g.yon du bskor ba yi// rim pa brgyad pa shes par bya// dang po drag nag zhes bya ba//
204b6(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa yi ni mthe bong bar// dus med drag po zhes grags pa// lha mo yau ni 'khor gyis bskor// gsang ba'i gnas su drag chen dang // lus kyi yan lag kun la khyab// lte ba'i gnas la lha byin te// sgyu ma yi ni gzugs kyi tshul// snying
205a1(rgyud 'grel): gar gnas pa'i nag po che// sgyu ma chen mo mchog tu mchog/ gtsigs pa kha yi phyogs gnas te// rdo rje mtshon ni mtshon chen po// 'jigs byed mchu la brtag tu gnas// 'bar ba'i me dang mnyam pa'i 'od// mgo bor gnas pa
205a2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa che// tshangs pa bug las rnam par byung // sna yi bar du rtag gnas pa// bgegs kyi rgyal po gtso bo che// de dag mtshams su gnas pa ni// dbang ldan la sogs rim pa bzhin// tsa muN+Di ni mgo bo'i gnas// 'ba' ti li ni shing
205a3(rgyud 'grel): la brten// A g+ho tsor ni sum mdor gnas// de nyid gsum po la gsum bzhi// mgo zhes bya ba sgra chen po// bcu gnyis kyi ni mtshams su gnas// shin tu rgod pa rgod chen po// bgegs med kyis ni rnam par 'joms// pi bang tsha yis 'joms
205a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste// snying ga yi ni pad+mar gnas// lha mo sgyu ma zhes su grags// 'gro rnams smos pas rmongs par bshad// lha mo u ma glad par gnas// glad pas mi tshugs 'dod pa ma// rgyal mo lha tshogs lha mo che// na li yi ni gzugs su gnas// pus
205a5(rgyud 'grel): mo byin pa nag po sogs// bzhi po dag ni chen po yin// dbang mo la sogs lha mo'i tshogs// snying ga yi ni pad+mar gnas// gzugs la sogs pa'i bye brag drug/ reg bya yi ni gzugs su gnas// ze 'bru la ni a yi gzugs// rdo rje sems
205a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i rnam par bzhugs// ngag 'phrog la sogs lha mo che// nye ba'i ngan long bzhi por 'dod// ngag 'phrog ma ni gsang bar gnas// 'bar byed mau ni spyir gnas te// sreg ma dang ni 'chang mar byed// dbang phyug chen mo me'i gzugs//
205b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed ma ni rkan la gnas// rlung gi gzugs can dbang phyug dag/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi lha mo ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang 'dus pa'i tshul// lce yi rtsa bar gnas pa'i rtsa// de ni chu yi gzugs su gnas// 'jigs byed la sogs lha
205b2(rgyud 'grel): mo bzhi// lam bzhi ru ni gnas pa yin// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs// de ni dgra yi gzugs su gnas// thod pa'i phreng gis phreng bcings pa'i// lha mo bzhi ni chen mo yin// thig le gnas na rtag 'byung ba// shak+ti yi ni
205b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su gnas// ral gri la sogs 'dzin pas brgyan// lag pa dang ni rkang par bzhag/ 'dod pa la sogs nyon mongs bcod// rgol ba thams cad phyir mthar byed// bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// pad ma
205b4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi rjes su 'gro/ zhing sogs las kyi dngos grub dang // mkha' 'gro ma la bsgrub pa la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po// rdo rje sems dpa' khyab pa'i gtso// bdag nyid de ltar bsgoms nas ni// rtag tu sngags pa yi ni
205b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod// bza' dang btung ba gos dag kyang // phreng ba dri dang gos la sogs// lus kyi de nyid la gnas te// rnal 'byor rigs pas rtag tu mchod// ji ltar de nyid rjes 'brangs te// de yi gtor las cho ga bshad// khrag ni rab tu
205b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin che// chu yi gnas ni de bzhin nya// til gyi khur ba char pa'i rtse// shin tu rgod pa mkhur skya ba// kha dog lnga pa spyod pa'i gnas// sha ni rigs kyi ri ru gsungs// A li de bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas// nye bar rgyal ba'i
206a1(rgyud 'grel): don gsungs pa// zhi brgyad kyi ni mtshan pa'o// de nas zhing gi bdag po rnams bshad bya// shar phyogs su ni shin tu bkod pa las// zhi ba'i mig ma gser bsregs pa'i mdog lta bur// phyag na rdo rje bsnams
206a2(rgyud 'grel): shing gtam pa la gnas pa'o// me'i phyogs su ni spyod pa nag mo'i lha mo'i kha dog dmar mo// phyag na shak+ti bsnams shing ka rany+dza la gnas pa'o// lho phyogs su ni ki li gi ris mtshan ma pa'i lha chen po kha dog nag po dbyug pa
206a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// bden bral du ni rgyal ba can te/ shing nim+ba la gnas pa/ phyag na ral gri bsnams pa du ba'i mdog can zhal 'bar ba dang // nub phyogs su ni nye rgyal de// sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang / shing a shwat+tha la gnas pa'i
206a4(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa bsnams pa'o// rlung gi phyogs su ni mchod sbyin pa rlung gi shugs can te/ ba dan bsnams shing rlung gi mdog can shing u dum+ba ra la gnas pa'o// byang gi phyo rigs su ni shing ka ri dbyug pa bsnams pa la/ kha dog
206a5(rgyud 'grel): ser po shing ta la la gnas pa'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni char pa'i rtse la rna bo che/ mdog dmar po rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/ shing sba ta la gnas pa'o// de dag ni shing gi bdag po shes par bya zhing mkha' 'gro ma lnga'i rang
206a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid do// kaR+ka ta dang ro ha ha ni sna'i steng du'o// chu srin dang po ha ta ni sna'i 'og tu'o// bi bA dang rtsa ba na dang / k+Sha dang du ba dang me'o// seng ge dang mig gi r-i dang / hUM dang pad+ma dang sa'o// gzhon nu ma dang / bi tri dang
206b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo dang / suM ngang chu'o// 'dod pa dang gzhu dang / yuM dang rlung ste/ de dag sna bug g.yas pa la'o// glang ku ma dang k+She ro tsa na dang me'o// buM pa dang mo hi ta dang / hUM dang dri med gsum dang sa'o// nya dang ba tA dang s+m+R+YuM dang chu dang sa'i gdug so//
206b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrig pa dang chu srin dang smye dang dbye ba dang rlung ngo // de dag sna bug g.yon pa la'o// suM dang aM dang ye shes dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang na mkha'o// a dang ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang / lug dang rnam wu par shes pa dang
206b3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i rtsa'o// bla ma'i chu zhal gyi rim pa 'di ni dngos grub 'dod par phyir gsang bar bya'o// dang po la ni nor btang bya/ gnyis pa la ni nor bsdu'o// gsum pa las ni zhing las bya/ bzhi pa la ni sa bon gda'/ lnga pa la ni
206b4(rgyud 'grel): khyim du 'jug/ drug pa la ni khyim bzhi gnas// bdun pa la ni las bya ba// gos dang rgyan dang long spyod rdzogs// rgyan rnams sbyin par byas nas ni// song ba dag ni phyir mi ldog/ sangs rgyas dngos grub sgrub rnams kyis// bla ma mcho de phyir rang phyag rgya//
206b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi phyag rgya bstan pa yis// dngos grub thob pa rgyud las gsungs// gzhan las dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// phyi rol bskum pas dam tshig med// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// slob dpon byang chub rdo rje nyid// dngos rnams sgyu ma lta bu las//
206b6(rgyud 'grel): spo ba dang ni bsdu ba mdzad// rnal 'byor chen po skal ldan rnams// sdig pa rnams ni rnam byang zhing // bsod nams rnams ni 'phel ba rnams// bde ba can du 'gro bar shog/ shing gcig pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon 'phaT ba'i lha'i zhal snga ni mdzad pa rdzog so//
207a1(rgyud 'grel): rmi khams kyi mchod pa'i rnags kyi rnam pa btsun no/
207b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra g+har+b+ha pU dza kra ma sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ rdo rje drib thabs kyi mchod pa'i thabs kyi rim pa/ dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrib gnyis spong zhing tshogs gnyis bsgrub// mchod pa dag la rtag dga'
207b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// rdo rje dril bu'i bsgrub pa ni// bde mchog gsang la bdud de bshad// yid dang mthun mong dben gnas su// yang dag don ldan rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje dril bu byin gyis brlab// mdzes pa'i maN+Dal steng dag tu// me tog tshom bu gnyis bzhag
207b3(rgyud 'grel): ste// rdo rje dril bu steng du bzhag/ dang por dag pa'i khrus pa ste// mos pa tsam gyis ltar bskyed nas// 'od kyis rtags gnyis stang bya ste// stong pa'i ngang las AHhUM bskyed// de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis// de nas dpal ldan yab yum bskyed//
207b4(rgyud 'grel): de la ye shes 'khor lo gzhug/ gnyis med bstims nas dbang bskur zhing // byin gyis brlabs nas mchod cing bstod// de 'od zhu las rdor dril 'gyur// bzlas pa byas nas blang bar bya// g.yon gyis steng 'og tshul du thung // de nas g.yas
207b5(rgyud 'grel): su rdo rje byung // snying ga dag tu gzung nas ni// dril bu g.yon gyi dku/ ru bsten// de nas g.yon du gar bcas te// g.yas la thug pa dgu ru bskor// de nas gong bzhin gzung bar bya// dang po thun mong bshang bya ste// gar skor rdo rje dril bu gnyis//
207b6(rgyud 'grel): gong bzhin 'dzin pa bca' ba ste// de nas dril bu lan gsum dkrol// de nas gnyis kas lan gsum ste// thams cad steng du bskor nas ni// gang bskor gong bzhin 'dzin pa ni// kun gyi sngon du 'gro ba yin// ba dan phyar ba'i rnam pa la/
208a1(rgyud 'grel): dang por 'dzin dang dril bu 'khrol// rdor dril gsor gsil bcas pa la// gnyis pa 'dzin pa sbyor min te// dkrol ba ba dan g.yob pa la// dang po la sogs lugs bzhin no// ba dan mi g.yo ba gting
208a2(rgyud 'grel): ba la// mi dkrol mi gsor mo ru bzhag/ ba dan 'gugs pa'i dus dag tu// dran pa chu bur bzhin du dkrol// sems can don brtson gyur pa na// mdung thabs shes ni bya ba ste// nyon mongs tha ba 'bigs pa'i tshul/
208a3(rgyud 'grel): dang po dril bu gsum yin te// g.yas su 'phang ba'i 'bigs bzhin te// g.yon du gnyigs byed pa yin// sgrib pa gnyis ni 'joms pa ste// lan gsum bskor ba dngos grub len// steng du bskor ba bstan par byed/
208a4(rgyud 'grel): snying gar gzung bas bkrag mdangs bskyed// don 'grub sbyor ba bshad bya ste// g.yas kyis rgya gram sbyor ba dang // g.yon dang dbus kyi sbyor ba ni// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba ste// snying ga la ni bsten par byed//
208a5(rgyud 'grel): dril bu'i cha la rab brtags nas// spyi bo mgrin pa snying go yi// thad kar 'dzin cing bskor ba ni// so 'og sa bla sa steng gi/ srid gsum sprul pas 'grub pa'o// rdo rje sems 'gugs sbyor ba la// dang por phar la
208a6(rgyud 'grel): spros pa ni// rang gi mchod pa byed pa ste// snying khar 'gugs pa dngos grub len// rdo rje bsnol brtan zhes bya ba// gnyi ga'i dbang du byas pa ste// dkar 'dzin gnyis kyi thad ka ru// gzung ba steng 'og byed
208b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// g.yas bstan pa ni thabs yin te// g.yen bstan pa ni shes rab yin// gnyis bstan pa ni sbyor ba'o// gang du sbyor ba'i byang chub sems// gnyis bstan pas ni 'bul bar byed// de yis rgyal ba thams cad mnyes//
208b2(rgyud 'grel): rol pa'i cho ga byed pa ni// lag pa bsnol mar byed pa ste// shes rab ye shes gnas skabs dang // gsang ba yi ni spyod pa dang // gsang ba'i spyod pa'i skabs su shes// gzhan yang yon tan brjod las 'das// bla med
208b3(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i bla na med// gtso bo mchog gi las sbyor ba// khyad par gyi ni bshad bya ste// dang po'i las dang tha ma'i las// gong ma bzhin te thun mong ngo // 'khor lo 'dzin sogs lnga po dang // snying gar 'dzin pas shes par
208b4(rgyud 'grel): bya// mdun du spos phor 'dzin pa dang // gyen du me tog 'thor ba dang // sor mo mar me'i tshul du bsgreng // gdengs pas byug pa'i tshul du byug/ mnyes pa yi ni thabs su bshad// zhi ba yi ni sbyor ba ste// rdo rje dril bu'i thad gzung
208b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// gang la phog pas rdo byed bsam// rgyas pa stong du 'phyar ba ste// ye shes khams gsum bcu len byed// dbang ni gyen la phyogs nas su// lag pa'i 'og tu 'jug tshul lo// drag po gsang ba'i cho ga ni// gdul bya mdun
208b6(rgyud 'grel): du gnas pa la// steng du 'phyar zhing thung ngu 'bugs// rengs pa yi ni sbyor ba ste// gdul bya mdun du bsam bya ste// gyen thur thad kar phyar ba yis// spyi bor rkang pa'i bar dag tu// rdo rje'i ring po bsgreng bar byed// bstab pa'i cho ga'i
209a1(rgyud 'grel): las byed pa// rdo rje gdang po'i sbyor ba yis// thur bsags la ni len pa ste// gyen du phyar nas bteg byas nas// de nas mdun du bstab pa'o// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ gsang ba de nyid rjes 'brangs nas//
209a2(rgyud 'grel): blo dman don du bshad pa yin// 'di la nyes par gyur pa kun// 'phags dang mkhas la bzod par gsol// bdag gis 'di brtsams bsod nams kyis// khams gsum thams cad bu med shog/ rdo rje dril thabs kyi mchod
209a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//
210a1(rgyud 'grel): dmas gdan bzhi pa'i bsgrub pa'i thangs btsun go/
210b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsa tun+di thi sA d+ha ne no pi ka/ bod skad du/ dpal gdan bzhi pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos dang dngos med ngang las dpe
210b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ldan// de las 'gro ba'i don mdzad la btung de// bcu dang gsum po mngon du bya ba'i thabs// rgyud na mi gsal bsdus te bri bar bya// de la re zhig slob dpon bum pa dang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing / rigs nges pa des/ mchog dang
210b3(rgyud 'grel): thun mong gi dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'jug par bya'o// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs kyi// gnas dag tu ni rten nas su// bla re dag ni bri bar bya// sna tshogs gos ni dpyangs nas su// ba dan rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bya// g.yer kha'i dra
210b4(rgyud 'grel): bas mdzes par bya// gnas bcu dag ni kun tu yang // de bzhin dri yis dkyil 'khor bya// mnyam med sems kyi dri yis ni// gru bzhi par ni byug par bya// lus la ste'u 'jog can dan byug/ sems ni mnyam par gnas pa ste// bzod
210b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i me tog rnal 'byor pas// 'bad dang ldan pas dgram par bya// mnyam nyid bsgoms pa'i dug pa yis// rang bzhin dag pas 'dug par bya// shes rab mar me'i snang ba ste// khams gsum gyi ni mun pa rnams// mar mi 'di
210b6(rgyud 'grel): yis bcom nas su// ci ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya// mchod pa dgram par byas nas kyang // bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas su// oM badz+ra prA ka ra hUM phaT/ lag g.yon thal mo phar bstan te// g.yas pa khu tshur rgyab sbyar nas// dbang
211a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan phyogs tshegs bskor bar bya// ra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su// phan tshun rtse mo reg par bya// oM dzuM swA hA/ dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa khu tshur bcings nas su// mthe bong
211a2(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu brkyang bar bya// oM bruM swA hA/ phur pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rnam par dag pa dang phan yon ni rgyud las shes par bya'o// rang gi snying ga'i zla dbus su// sa bon hUM gi 'od zer gyis// bla ma sangs rgyas snang byas la// tshigs bcad
211a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni brjod par bya// bdag ming 'od zhes bgyi ba ni// bla mo'i zhabs lham la phyag 'tshal// mkha' 'gro ma rnams la yang 'dud// sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi// 'od zer de las byung ba yi// lha mo lag ni spos la sogs// thogs
211a4(rgyud 'grel): bas mchod pa byas par bsam// sdig pa bgyis dang bgyid du stsal// rjes yi rang ba so sor bshags// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal ma lus dang // 'jig rten dge ba'i rtsa ba la// kun nas bdag ni yi rang ngo //
211a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'tshal// mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol// dus 'di nas ni sangs ma rgyas// bar du las ni bsnyen par bgyi// bdag gi lus kyang dbul bar bgyi// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni// dus 'di nas gzung ji srid
211a6(rgyud 'grel): du// byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// yang dag byang chub nges mdzad pa// de bzhin bla med byang chub sems// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyid// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor skyes sdom pa//
211b1(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa thams cad ldan par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// de nas brtsams te mchog tu gsungs// bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang // sems can don ni tshul khrims
211b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum// bdag gis so sor brtan par gsungs// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // yang dag nyid du gzung bgyi zhing // slob dpon dag kyang bdag gis gzung // rin chen rigs mchog rnal 'byor gyis/
211b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi sprul bar bgyi// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos rab tu gzung bar bgyi//
211b4(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rigs mchog mthon po la// mchod pa ci nus bgyi ba dang // sdom pa thams cad ldan par bgyi// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// dam pa de ni bskyed bgyi zhing // sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// sdom pa ma lus bzung bar bgyi/
211b5(rgyud 'grel): ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang // ma grol ba rnams bdag gi dgrol// dbugs a phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // 'gro kun mya ngan 'das la dgod// byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms bzhi po bsam par bya// de nas hUM gi me
211b6(rgyud 'grel): lce yis// snod bcud thams cad stong par bsgom// oM swa b+hA ba shud d+haHsarba d+har+m+mAHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho haM/ mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su// de yi dbus su bltas nas kyang // der ni mtshan ma brtag par bya// mar me'i 'od
212a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi zhi ba ste// dmar po brdul gyi rgyas pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba// chags pa la sogs 'grub par 'gyur// mthar ni du ba nag mthong na// mngon spyod du na rab tu grags// rlung gi mdog ltar
212a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs pa yi// de yi mod las skrag par 'gyur// zla ba dkar po'i 'od zer ltar// thams cad du ni dkar mthong na// rnal 'byor 'grub par shes par bya// blo ldan 'gro ba'i yang dag gnas// de yi nang du bsam pa ni// yuM las
212a3(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed// k+ShaM les me yi dkyil 'khor bsam// de steng suM las chu rang bzhin// hUM las gser gyi sa gzhi dang // ri rab chen po bsam par bya// de ste nga hUM las gzhal yas ni// bang pa brtsegs pa bsam
212a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste// gser las byung ba'i grong khyer mchog/ rin chen bdun po rnams kyis spras// g.yer kha'i dra ba'i phreng ba dang // dra ba dra phyed sogs pas brgyan// dbus dang phyogs bzhir seng ge'i gdan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan
212a5(rgyud 'grel): par// 'byung po glang po me mtshams su// rin chen bum pa gang ba'o// bden bral du ni ma he'i gdan// sbrul gyi gdan ni rlung mtsham su// sgo bzhir yi dgas gdan dgod bya// dbus kyi nyi ma'i gdan stengs su// rang gi dbugs
212a6(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba yi// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i// oM badz+ra shud d+ha sarba d+harmA badz+ra shud d+ho haM/ de las ye shes mkha' 'gro bskyed// sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung can// skra grol bas ni g.yogs pa ste// sangs rgyas lnga yis mdzes
212b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// kha dog sngon po drag chen mo// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa yi// zhal gsum pa ni spyan gsum mo// ha har bzhad cing 'chag pa ste// na bca' dmar pas shin tu mdzes// khan+d+ha gyen du bsgreng
212b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid// gsum pa na ni rdo rje thogs// g.yon pa dril bu sgra sgrogs shing // gnyis pa nA ni snod nyid de// gsum pa de bzhin ral gri 'phyar// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru// dbus su mkha' 'gro ma
212b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bya// oM yo ga shud d+ha sarba d+harma yo gang shud d+ho ha~M/ ye shes kyi ni shar phyogs su// bdag gi chu las byung ba yi// sum las rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgom// khaM dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// skra grol bas ni rnam par klubs/
212b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyun pa ste// phyag na kha T+wAM rnal 'byor snod// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas klubs// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o// ye shes kyi ni byang gi char// bdag gi me
212b5(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba yi// k+ShiM las byung ba'i drag mor bskyed// kha dog ser mo shin tu mdzes// sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung bcas// skra grol bas ni brgyan pa ste// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sku la ni bza' mdzes pa mnabs/
212b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis kha T+wAM rnal 'byor snod// ye shes kyi ni nub phyogs char// bdag gi rlung las byung ba yi// yuM las mkha' 'gro ro langs ma// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can// kha dog dmar po kun tu 'od// kha T+wAM rnal 'byor
213a1(rgyud 'grel): snod bsnams shing // skra grol bas ni mdzes pa ste// lus kun sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar bar bsam// ye shes kyi ni lha yi char// sA yI ye
213a2(rgyud 'grel): shes las byung ba'i// hU~M las mkha' 'gro gtum mo bsgom// sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung can// kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes// kha T+wAM rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing // rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// skra grol bas ni shin tu
213a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes// ha har rgod pas 'jigs par mdzad// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o// dbang ldan gyi ni phyogs kyi char// seng ge'i gdong ni bsam bya ba// kha dog dmar zhing ser ba ste// glang po yi ni stan la bzhugs// rdo rje lcags kyu
213a4(rgyud 'grel): sdigs mdzub can// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya// me mtshams stag mo zhes bya ba// rin chen bdun gyi stan la bzhugs// phyag gnyis kha dog dkar
213a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing sngo// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// phyag na lcags kyu brgyan pa ste// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya// bden bral lha mo ce spyang mo//
213a6(rgyud 'grel): ha ha bzhad pas 'jigs par mdzad// ma he yi ni stan la bzhugs// mdog ni dmar zhing sngo ba ste// sku la na bza' mdzes pa gsol// phyag gnyis lcags kyu zhags pa dang // sdigs mdzub kyis ni shin tu mdzes// sbrul gyis
213b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun zhing rnam par klubs// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya// rlung mtshams lha mo 'ug pa mo// kha dog ser zhing dmar ba ste// klu yi stan la yang dag bzhugs// rgyan yang de nyid sbyar bar bya// phyag gnyis
213b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i skyil krung can// sdigs mdzub lcags kyu zhags pa bsnams// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya// dbus kyi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyi// phyi rol dag ni rnam bzhi lo// shar du mkha 'gro
213b3(rgyud 'grel): phu las bskyed// phyag gnyis kha dog dkar po ste// yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs// sbrul gyi rgyan gyi klubs pa ste// shin tu drag cing skra grol ba// 'od zer sna tshogs yang dag par// lag gnyis khwa ru bcug nas ni// ha har bzhad pas
213b4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu 'bor// byang du 'bar ma pheM las bskyed// kha dog ser po shin tu drag/ spyi bo'i steng du log pa gnyis// thal sbyar mar mo lta bur 'bar// drag po'i gzugs can 'tshig pa ste// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas brgyan// yi dgas
213b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi ni stan la bzhugs// 'od zer me ltar 'bar ba bsgom// nub tu 'jigs byed phreM las bskyed// kha dog dmar mo 'jigs su rung // yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' brgyan// lag gnyis snyim par sbyar
213b6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// khrag gi rgyun ni 'thur bar mdzad// me ltar 'bar zhib shin tu gsal// 'jigs byed drag mo bsgom par bya// lho ru 'phrog byed praM las byung // kha dog sngon po shin tu 'od// yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs// skra grol bas ni
214a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa ste// shin tu 'bar ba'i na bza' brgyan// sbrul gyi rgya na gyis klubs pa ste// sdigs mdzub dang ni btun shing thogs// sems can sems ni rmongs par byed// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing drag/ kun
214a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs pas ni thams cad bsgom// de nas ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas bsrung bar bya ste/ mgo bor ni klung ngo // mig tu ni hUM ngo // sna dang rna ba gnyis la yuM ngo // khar suM mo// mgrin par smai ngo // nam tshong du smai ngo // snying gar hUM ngo // lte b.rab+h+rUM
214a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo// de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon lngas 'od zer 'phros pas/ sangs rgyas la bskul bas lha mo mang po byung ste/ dbu rgyan dang bum pa la sogs pas dbang bskur bar bsam mo// bdag u gis dbugs yu kyi 'od zer mu~M gyis/
214a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma rnams spyan drangs te// de dag gi ni gzugs mdun no// dam tshig rnams ni bstan par bya// khu tshur gnyis ni bcings nas su// dbu ma gnyis ni brkyang zhes su// rtse mo phan tshun sprad nas ni// ye shes lha mo bstan par bya// lag
214a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis phan tshun sbyar nas ni// dbu ma dang ni mthe bong sprad// cung zad cig ni bskyod par bya// shar phyogs rdo rje ma la bstan// khu tshur mnyam par bcings nas su// mthe bo gnyis ni brkyang byas la// byang gi phyogs nas brtsams nas su/
214a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu 'di drag mo la bstan bya// phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas su// mtha'u chung gnyis na bcings nas su// mthe'u chung gnyis ni brkyang bar bya// nub du gnas pa'i ro langs ma'i// phyag rgya ru ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas su// gung
214b1(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis ni ltung bar bya// lho phyogs phyag rgyar bshad pa ste// de ni phyag rgyu ba ni pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// khro bo gnyis ni brkyang nas su// rtse mo spyad de gnas pa na// mtshams pa ni yi ni phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis thal ma
214b2(rgyud 'grel): khar bcug nas// phuM zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya// shar phyogs mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yin// lag g.yon thal mo kha sbyar nas// spyi bo ru ni bzhag par bya// byang du gnas pa'i 'bar ma la// phyag rgya 'di ni brtan par bya// phyag 'tshal thal
214b3(rgyud 'grel): mo sbyar nas su// kha ru btsug ste hU~M zhes bya// nub phyogs lha mo 'jigs byed mo// phyag rgya ru ni sbyar bar bya// log gnyis kun tu bskor nas su// sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo ru// gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag nas kyang // lho phyogs 'phrog
214b4(rgyud 'grel): byed ma la bstan// bskyed pa'i dus su brkyang ma ste// phyag rgya'i dus su oM dang ni// sno hA'i bar du spel ste bzlas// dam tshig lha mo rnams la ni// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// g.yon pa snying gar bzhag nas su// g.yas pa
214b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan khung gzhug bya 'o// dam tshig sems ma rnams la bstan// sngags ni oM hUM swAhA zhes so// de ltar ye shes sems ma dang // dam tshig sems ma rnams la ni// dam tshig so sor bstan nas kyang // gnyis su med par bsam
214b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// da ni mchod pa 'byung ste/ khro bo dang mthe bong sbyar la// lhag ma brkyang ste/ oM puSh+pe mA le hUM swA hA/ me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// me tog gi phyag rgya las dbu ma bsgreng ba dang / oM d+hU bai shwa ri hUM swA hA zhes
215a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni bdug pa'o// khu tshur las mthe bo brkyang ba dang / oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na dI pe hUM swA hA/ zhes pa mar me'i'o// lag pa g.yas brkyang ba dang / oM hUM swA hA zhes pa ni sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis
215a2(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ste/ gung mo'i rtsar mtheb mo bskyod pa dang / oM ku ru ku ru ma hA ba li hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyi nas mchod pa nyi shu yin// ye shes can gyis mchod par bya// hUM zhes bya ba'i glu
215a3(rgyud 'grel): blang zhing // rnal 'byor maM kun mnyes par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings lo// rked pa'i mtshams su bzhag nas ni// yan lag gsum du hUM gis bskyod// pi wang tshul du bsgreng ba dang // gling bu'i tshul du 'bud pa dang /
215a4(rgyud 'grel): zang dung tshul du 'bud pa dang // dkrol ba'i tshul du dkrol ba dang // pa Ta ha ltar brdung ba dang // gar gyi tshul du bskyod pa dang // bsil yab tshul du g.yob pa dang // rgyal mtshan tshul du bskyed pa dang // bla re'i tshul du bre ba
215a5(rgyud 'grel): dang // ba dan tshul du 'phyar ba dang // gdugs kyi tshul du dgab pa dang // rdza rnga'i tshul du brdung ba dang // rnga zlum tshul du brdung ba dang // 'dzum pa'i tshul du bzhad pa dang // khro bo'i tshul du khro bo dang // sgeg pa'i tshul du sgeg pa
215a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // 'gying ba'i tshul gyis rol pa dang // phyag 'tshal tshul du 'dud pa ste// mda' 'dren nu me 'khyud pa dang // nyi shu'o// rnal 'byor ma brgyad de nyid kyis// dngos po kun gyis mchod par bya// hUM zhes bya bar bdag sprul nas/
215b1(rgyud 'grel): spyugs blun thang bar bya// rgyu las byung ba bzhin dun// bdud rtsi ltung ba'i bar du bya// rdo rdza'i de nyid dang ldan pas// tshigs bcad 'di yis blang bar bya// rdo rdzagasar ba mdzes pa yas// sems can rnam thar bskul bar bya// rnam thar
215b2(rgyud 'grel): sa su d+h+yaH/ sh-in tu byung po mtsha// lan nyid podzin pa tho cwo di rlung gi/ hU~M/ oM badz+ra b+hA pa ti thA pa tA sa rba tasaH/ bud d+ha rmed+ha d+ha/ prad+hAd+hA mai tanA pa saM pas badrad+ha dzu sa
215b3(rgyud 'grel): a ba son+toHnI hUM hU~Mn+tu// a a a/ swAhUM/ gnas brgyad dril bu'i sgra skyugs shing // rdo rje gsor de rang las byung ba'i lha mos bstod pa ni/ sus can don phyir shes rab gisol btab pa// kun 'khyud la sogs
215b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis banyis spyod cing // rgyu ma stu bu sbyar bas shin tu bad+hAn// srid pa las sgri ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dga' da'i miT+wA~M dang sbyin gyis gzigs// mo ge'i dngos po rang bzhin stong par rol// dngas dang dngas med la
215b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrol dbu mas mkhyen// mi 'gyur kun bcom lhag ma sems pa'o// gnyis spro gun byung chu yi bya ba can// gnyis med chos brnyes thar pa mnyes pa'o// bde ba'i 'khor mnan thar pa btang ba'o// thams cad dngos kyi rnal 'byor ma sngags
215b6(rgyud 'grel): rim// rnal 'byor ma lnga sangs rgyas de nyid mkhyen// gzugs ma sgyu ma sems cani smon mdzad po// rdo rje kun rtog chos kyi rmongs pa gcod// rnal ma ma rmongs spyid chos tshogs la 'dung // sems can sgrol mdzad rnal 'byor bdag
216a1(rgyud 'grel): bstod phyag 'tshal// thams cad bdag skyes ngo bo ni gcig la bstod phyag 'tshal// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i rmongs pa gcod la bstod phyag 'tshal// de nyid gcig la rtag tu bdag 'dud bstod phyag 'tshal/
216a2(rgyud 'grel): rang dgar sems can dgrol ba yi// rgyu med dngos la 'dud par bgyi// te na hUM te na te te hUM/ ston ka'i zla ltar rab mdzes shing // dung ltar dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa// te na hUM te na te te hUM/ rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can// gnyis 'khyud
216a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba 'dzin pa'o// te na hUM te na te te hUM/ sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yi// 'gro ba 'dzin pa rgyu med dngos// te na hUM te na te te hUM/ srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan// 'od zer rnon pa snying ldan nyi ma stong 'drar ldan/
216a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam mang sku dang cha byad rjes tshogs sems dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug mchog rol gar mdzad pa zhes bya bas khyad par du bstod cing / glu dang bstod pas mchod pas mnyes par bya/ khar bar du hUM gi sgra dang dril bu
216a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrags la smon lom rnam pa gsum gdab par bya'o// rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas// snying ga'i phyogs su btsir bar bya// oM swa b+ha ba shud d+ha/ sarba d+harmA sa b+hA ba badz+ra shud d+ho ha/ oM badz+ro shud d+ha/ sarba d+harmA badz+ra shud d+ho haM
216a6(rgyud 'grel): oM yo ga shud d+ha/ sarba d+harmA yaM ga shud d+ho hau/ zhes brjod la lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin gyis skyo na sngags bzla ste/ 'phreng ba de nyid dang ldan pas sngags 'odas sbyar ro// oM ba te pa te ma hA dz+nyA na
216b1(rgyud 'grel): sa bud d+ha sar+dz+dza \u0f7f tsen+d+han+danA ts+tshan+ta \u0f7f a swAH/ oM d+hi rmAH/ rtsa ba'i sngags s+ho// a dz+dza s+thAH/ ye shes mkha' 'gro ma 'a'o// ma~M su s+thAt+ma/ yak+She swAH/ oM tsu s+thAt+ma/ a s+t+rai swAH/ oM m+b+ha s+thAT+Ta/ oMk+Sh+ma swAH/ oMr+dz+dza
216b2(rgyud 'grel): dzaHhU~M/ brA / ma br-i s+yAhA/ sgyu phrag gsus bzlas pas sbyin du bsnyen po smos par 'gyur ro// byinas las swAstAr// du nasapad+man
216b3(rgyud 'grel): smon lam gdab ste/ mi lus sems can kun gyis // smon lam dag ni gdab par bya// sems can thams cad nad med cing // sems can thams cad bde 'gyur cig/ gang gis lam la 'gro ba yi// sangs rgyas nyid
216b4(rgyud 'grel): dang phrad par shog/ ma brgal ba rnams bsgral bya zhing // ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dkrol// de ltar nyid du rjes brtse bas// rnal 'byor bstan chos la gnas shog/ gter ma gtang ba ni/ dmar ba yi ni rdzas rnams kyis/ maN+Dal

217a5(rgyud 'grel): khro bo dag ni sgrog tu sbrel// oM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha dzaHphaT swA hA/ tsaM bzhin la sogs sbyar byas nas// gtor ma la sogs sbyar bar bya// zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang // gsang sngags dbye dang bcing
217a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / phyi rol gtor ma'i de nyid kyis// gtor ma'i las la sogs pas bsgrub// mchog gi dngos grub 'dod rnams kyis// gsang po'i gsang bar bsgom bya ba// lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas te// lte ba snying ga mgrin
217b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // mgo bo dang ni rnam pa bzhi// 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang // brgyad dang bcu drug rim pa ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis bsgom par bya// bde chen dang ni chos 'khor lo// thabs kyi cha ru shes par bya// sprul pa dang ni longs spyod gnyis//
217b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab cha ru shes par bya// oM dang hUM dang A drung haM// lte ba bzhi la dgod par bya// 'dab ma'i yi ge thams cad la// gtum mo me'i sbar thabs dang // bde ba'i bskyed pa'i rim pa nI// bla ma'i kha los
217b3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par bya// ting 'dzin de las langs pa'i tshe// gzhan ni ci yang mi bsam par// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ni// mchog 'dod don la mos par bya// yang na lha'i tshul gnas te// sgyu ma'i

219b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhung gi don du 'dod par shes// 'dir ni blo dman don grub gcig/ bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ru// skad cig gis ni bskyed nas kyang // mchod pa la sogs bya ba'o// de nas stong pa'i ngang las kyang // cho ga gsum
219b6(rgyud 'grel): 'am skad cig mas// ye shes mkha' 'gro zhal gsum ni// bzhad dang khro ba sgeg dang bcas// phyag gnyis rdo rje dbyug pas mtshan// sems dpa'i skyil krung rgyan gyis klubs// kha dog dkar po'i na bza' gsol//

220a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor brgyan pa yi// pad+ma chu yi nang bkod la// gdugs dkar po yis g.yogs pa yi// sa bon dbus su bsgom par bya// rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi// sa bon las ni gzugs su bskyed// sku mdog la sogs gong dang mthun//

220a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyog rgya'o// me tog bdug spos dri la sogs// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// g.yon pa snying gar bzhag nas su// g.yas pa steng nas dbub par bya// rtsa ba'i phyag rgyar rab tu grags//
220a5(rgyud 'grel): oM dzuM hUM swA hU~M/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// kun da la sogs kyu mdog dkar// rtse lo dUr ba btsugs nas su// lha mo'i dbu steng rdo rje yi// cod pan la ni gtor bar bya// gsang sngags lan re bzlas nas su// lan re sbyor bas dbul
220a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// lan grangs khri yi las kyis ni// thams cad rig cing tshe 'phel 'gyur// ka ra bi ra'i me tog dmar// duR+Ya dang ni ldan pa yi// las ni khri phrag byas pas ni// khyim rnams zhi bar rab tu grags// na ga puSh+pa'i yom shing ni//
220b1(rgyud 'grel): 'o mas spangs te dbul bar bya// las 'di khri phrag byas pa yis// grong ni zhi bar byed par 'gyur// pad+ma yi ni yam shing rnams// khri phrag tu ni bzlas nas su// las rnams kun la sbyar byas nas// yul phyogs zhi bar byed par
220b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// pri yang ku dang bi lA dang // de bzhin ut+pal ku mu da// rgyal po las lo sogs sbyar nas// pha rol yul 'khor 'joms par 'gyur// sngags pas rtag tu skyer chu gtor// borgya rtsa brgyad du gtor byas pas// bye brag
220b3(rgyud 'grel): tu na rgyas par 'gyur// bcom ldan ste shes mkha' 'gram// sems dpa'i skyil krung phyug gnyis ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// phyag gnyis rdo rje byug te bsnams// kha dog dkar po'i shin tu mdzes//
220b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhad cing khro la sgeg dang bcas// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// ye shos mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phrin las bcol ba byas nas ni// yi ge brgya pas bshags pa bya// badz+ra muMHyis gshegs
220b5(rgyud 'grel): su gsel// snying gar sbyor ba'i man ngag nI// mchod rdzas la sogs phul bas su// lha rnams mnyos par gyur nas ni// lha yi sku gsung thugs kyi 'od zer gyis// bdag dang slob ma gnyis ka yi// lus ngag yid
220b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum sgrib pa sbyang // mau dang 'dra bar chu yis kyang // sdig pa 'dag pa kho nar gsungs// bdag gis 'di byas dge ba yis// sems can ma lus thams cad kyang // sdug bsngal ma lus byang nas kyang /

222b5(rgyud 'grel): shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA bA shud d+ho haM zhes pa'i yid kyis brjod nas don mngon du byas la chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gzhug par bya'o// de nas oM hUM swA hA zhes pa'i sngags kyis rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi dang / oM dzaM b+ha ni hUM phaT zhes
222b6(rgyud 'grel): bas rdo rje'i ra ba dang / oM dz+riM swA hA/ zhes pas rdo rje'i gur rnams bsgoms te/ oM hUM phaT ces pas bgegs la phur bus gdob par bya'o// de'i dbus su/ yuM k+ShaM suM hUM hUM rnams kyis rim pa bzhin du bskyed pa'i rlung dong me dang
223a1(rgyud 'grel): chu dang sa dang lhun po rnams kyi steng du/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar/ oM hUM phaT zhes yongs su gyur pas las rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa'i gser gyi rang bzhin gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i
223a2(rgyud 'grel): dbus dang phyogs bzhi rnams su seng ge lnga rnams la sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lnga rnams// dbus su seng ge las gdugs dkar po'o// de'i dbus kyi nyi ma la A li kA li las skyes pa'i zla ba dang nyi
223a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dbus su gnas pa'i hUM las skyes shing / des byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje rnam par bsgoms so// oM badz+ra shud d+haHsarba d+harmA badz+ra shud d+ho&haM/ zhes pas de las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo rnams kyis 'gro ba'i
223a4(rgyud 'grel): don byas te/ der 'dus pa'i zla ba la sogs pa rnams kyis bskyed pa'i ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang / de bskyed pa dang dus mnyam du dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyang rang rang gi sa bon rnams kyis bskyed par bsams nas/ oM yo ga/
223a5(rgyud 'grel): shud d+haHsarba d+harmAHyo ga shud d+ho ho zhes pas nga rgyal bya'o// de la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi rang rang gi gdan sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la rim pa bzhin du'o// hUM hU~M hU~M AM IM U r-I l-I ai au aHsa
223a6(rgyud 'grel): bon rnams so// de la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sngon du mo ste/ 'di'i cod pan gyi steng du rdo rjes mtshan pa/ sangs rgyas lnga 'phro ba rnams kyis brgyan pa'i dar dbyangs bcings pa rtsa ba'i zhal khros shing gad rgyangs dang bcas pa
223b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa dkar po bzhad pa/ g.yon pa dmar po skyeg pa dang bcas pa/ zhal so sor spyan gsuMg suM dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gsum na steng du byas pa'i kha T+wAM ga dang dgra sta dang rdo rje'o// g.yon pa gsum ni dril bu dang khrag gi
223b2(rgyud 'grel): gang ba'i thod pa dang ral gri bsnams pa'o// shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo sgeg pa'i nyams can no// byang du 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro ma gser mdog go// nub tu ro langs ma sngon mo'o// lhor gtum mo dmar mo steng bzhi po 'di
223b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams g.yas dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis steng du byas pa'i kha T+wAM ga dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pas mdzes pa'o// dbang ldan du seng ge mo seng ge'i dong ba can g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i lus phyed/ phyed dkar po dang ser po
223b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang po dkar po la'o// mer stog mo stag gi gdong pa can g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lus phyed phyed sngon po dang dkar po rin po che bdun po la'o// bden bral du ce spyang mo ce spyang gi gdong pa can g.yos g.yon gyi lus phyed phyed dmar
223b5(rgyud 'grel): po dang nag po ma he la'o// rlung du 'ug pa mo 'ug pa'i gdong ba can g.yon dang g.yas pa'i yan lag ser po dang dmar po gdengs can gyi dbang po brgyad kyi mjug mo rnams la ste/ bzhi po 'di rnams g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i
223b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pas brgyan pa'o// de nas shar sgor rgyal dbang mo dkar mo phyag gnyis snyim pa'i tshul du khar gzhug pa'o// byang du mar me can ser mo snyim pa kha sbyar ba mar
224a1(rgyud 'grel): me lta bu spyi bor 'dzin pa'o// nub tu mjib byed ma dmar mo khrag gis gang ba'i sgrim pa steng du byas pa kha dang nye bar bzhag nas/ khrag gi rgyun 'thung ba'o// lhor ka bo dzI nag po rdo rje thal mo'i mthe
224a2(rgyud 'grel): bo'i rtse mo gnyis phan tshun yang dag par sbyor te mdzub mo khab lta bu b+ha ga'i gnas su bzhag nas rang gi b+ha ga nye bar ston pa ste/ bzhi po 'di rnams yi dgas kyi snying gar gnas pa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bcu
224a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis spyan gsum la zhal gcig pa rnams so// lha mo bcu gsum po rnams kyang lha'i mchog gi gos dmar po gyon pa/ mgo la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba can/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ sems dpa'i skyil krung gse shags pa/
224a4(rgyud 'grel): lag 'gro'i rgyal po brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes pa/ bskal pa'i mtha'i me 'bar ba lta bu'i 'od zer gyi phung po 'bar ba rnams kyis 'jig par byed pa bsgom par bya'o// de'i rjes la bdag nyid mgo bor k+Sha maug la hUM rU ba dang sna 'i na
224a5(rgyud 'grel): nang du yuM/ lce la gsumaHmgrin par/ skye snying gar s+t+waM/ lte bar k+ShAM/ zhes pa go cha'i yi ge rnams bkod de/ oM AHhUM zhes pas sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs nas/ rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis
224a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi 'khor lo na mkhar spyan drangs la/ sngar bzhin ya chung dag par mchod la dam tshig bstan par bya'o// de la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ gung mo gnyis rab tu brkyang ba'i rtse mo dang rtse mo sbyar ba ni/ oM hUM swA hA/
224b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la bstan par bya'o// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas/ mthe bo rgan po dag gung mo gnyis la yang dag par reg cing bskyod pa'i phyag rgya/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni hUM phaT swAg/ zhes pas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma
224b2(rgyud 'grel): la'o// khu tshur gnyis mnyam por bcings te mthe bong rgan po gnyis rob tu brkyang ba ni/ oM gau rI hUM zhes pas 'jigs byed ma la'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid bcings nas mthe'u chung gnyis rab tu brkyang ba ni oM bed+d+ha lI hU~M zhes
224b3(rgyud 'grel): bas ro langs mU la'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid bcings te gung mo'i sbyor mo gnyis rab tu brkyang ba ni/ oM tsiN+Da lI hUM swA hA zhes pas gtum mo la'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings/ rab mo gnyis rab tu brkyang ba'i rtse mo sbyar
224b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// oM AM s+thAd+d+ha/ A~M swAts+tsha/ oM UM swA hU~M/ oM r-I swAt+ma/ zhes seng ge mo la sogs pa ba po rnams la'o// s+t+wa~M hU~M swA hA/ A~M oM s+yAhU~M/ oM oM swAhUM/ a AHswAhA/ zhes pa rgyal dbang mo
224b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi po rnams la dri dang de'i phyag rgya bstan par bya'o// de'i rjes su bde skor sngon du 'gro bas ye shes kyi 'khor lo// dam tshig gi 'khor lo la ji ltar rigs par bzhugs par bya'o// de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer
224b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin go shegs pa dang lha mo rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba'i bar ma chad par rgyas 'debs par bsam par bya'o// de la ye shes mkha' gro ma la sogs pa rnams rim bzhin mi bskyod pa dang
225a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams kyis so// seng ge ma la sogs pa rnams la mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang
225a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med rnams kyis so// rgyal dbang mo la sogs pa rnams le rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams kyis so// de'i rjes la spros pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis bdag la
225a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing bstod nas des nye bar bstabs pa'i bdud rtsi myangs te/ bde ba chen po'i pad+mar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa kha 'og tu phyogs pa smin ma'i dbus su 'phyar ba'i thig le dang hUM yig las bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag par
225a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya'o// zhes pa'i thig le'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pa'i mthar phra mo'i rnal 'byor yun ring du rnam par bsam par bya'o// skyon sngags bzlas par bya ste/ daM l-i ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags// oM.aM hrIHswA hAHzhes
225a5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sngags kyang / oM badz+ra DA ki ni hUM phaT swA hA/ oM gau rI hU~M swA hA/ oM bet+tA mAM hUM swA hA/ oM tsaN+Da lI hUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra si ha ni AM swA hA/ oM badz+ra byA g+he I swA hA/

227a1(rgyud 'grel): ma brgyad lce'i 'dab ma la yi ge hUM gI rdzarje/ de'i bum pa la yi ge hUM bskyed cing bsgoms te/ oM badz+ra dzi hA saM ban+d+ha ni hU~M phaT/ sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de dag ni lce rnam par
227a2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i cho ga'o// de nas nyi ma'i lag pa la dkar po dang ye shes sbyar nas yan lag brgyad la bkod pa'i bdag nyid du bya'o// spyi bo mig gnyis rna ba gnyis// sna lce mgrin pa dpung pa gnyis// snying ga lte ba oM
227a3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra kA ya hoHoM badz+ra wA ka AHoM badz+ra tsit+ta hUM yan lag byin gyis brlabs par bya ba'i cho ga'o// de'i 'og tu dung phor la sogs pa'i mchod yon gyi snod la/ oM pra tIts+tsha ar+g+haM hUM swA hA/ zhes bya

228b6(rgyud 'grel): tA ya me sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya hoHzhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya ste/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag pang bdag ni skyabs su mchi/
229a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad thog pa gsum la yang // sbyor ba gsang ba mkha' 'gro dang // dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo// byang chub sems dpa' dga' chen dang // khyad par du yang slob dpon la// rtag tu

229b1(rgyud 'grel): ba yi// pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag la// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi// sdom pa thams cad dang ldan pa// ci ltar nus pa mchod pa'i las// las kyi mchog chen po
