373a4(rgyud 'grel): bslangs po rtags pa'am/ brtags pa ma yin pa 'am/ gang yang rung ba'i zas la longs spyod cinga'i gnas pa ni zas kyis gnas pa'o// brtul zhing zhugs pa'i phyir brtul zhugs te/ lung las bshad pa'i sdom pa'o// de
373a5(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i brtul zhugs dang / zas la ma ltos par bsam gtan nyid zas dang 'dra bas na zas so// zas de la mchog tu gyur pas sus kyang rje su rtogs par mi 'gyur bar smon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis shig ces bya ba ste/
373a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du skye bo rnams dang nye bar 'dre bas kun du gces par 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor pa gos la sogs pa slong ba la sogs pas brtul zhugs can g.yengs par 'gyur na dge ba ji ltar byed ce na/ gcer bu'am yang na gcer bu min/
373b1(rgyud 'grel): gang du ji lta ji de lta bur// rang gis lhag pa'i lhar dmigs la// de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam/ zhes bya ba smos te/ gcer bu'am yang na gcer bu min// zhes bya ba ni go sla'o// bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa nas gnas kyi nges
373b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bshad pa 'dir yang de bzhin du bya 'am zhe na/ gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba smos te/ lam gyi bzhi mdo la sogs pa'i nges pa med do// 'o na skyil mo dkrung bcas nas thog thag bzlas brjod bya ba'i spyod pas ni lus la gnod par
373b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro zhe na/ ji lta de lta bur zhes bya ba smos te/ gnas skabs gang yang rung ba dag tu ste/ spyod lam rnam bzhir de kho na nyid rnam par bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o// ci rtogs pa mang po dag gis 'ongs ye shes 'grub par 'gyur
373b4(rgyud 'grel): ram zhe na/ zla drug tsam gyis nges po ni/ zhes bya ba smos te/ nges par zla ba drug gis 'di 'tshang rgya ba nyid kyang nges par 'grub pa ni/ ci skye bo rnams dang 'dres shing g.yengs pas sam zhe na/ lkugs pa'i dngos por
373b5(rgyud 'grel): thal 'gyur bas// zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni// rnal 'byor can gyis nges bsten na// rnal 'byor chen po 'di gsal 'gyur/ zhes bya ba smos te/ lkugs pa'i dngos por thal 'gyur bas// zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa'i dbang
373b6(rgyud 'grel): gis mi smra ba'i// brtul zhugs la gnas pa'i yang nyes pa mdo// de bas na rnal 'byor chen po 'di yang gsal zhing 'bar bar 'gyur to// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyis// nye bar brtse bar 'gyur ro// 'o na 'di nyid
374a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis bkur ba dang / bsnyen pa'i dus su 'gyur ram zhe na/ ye shes sgron ma mchog mthong na// rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams
374a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' la// ngang pa'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhin no zhes bya ba la/ ye shes ni rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid do// de'i sgron ma ni snang ba'o// des mchog tu gyur pa ni dam pa ste/ de lta bsdu na lha mo rnams
374a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par nye bar bsdud do// ji lta bu zhe na/ dper na pad+ma'i 'byung gnas kyi mtsho pad+mas khyab par gnas la ngang pa'i tshogs rnams 'bab par 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o// ji ltar 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir// rig
374a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten du// 'gro kun don ni byed pa'o// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni// mngon 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ces smos te/ 'di dag ni go sla'o// gzhung rtsom par byed pos bsnol bar bya ba'i
374a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ spyod pa 'dis ni nges par ni// ji skad bshad pa der 'gyur bas// sems ni dag par gyis shig ces// sems can rnams la bdagi gsol 'debs// zhes bya ba smos te/ 'di ni go sla'o// gang phyir shin
374a6(rgyud 'grel): tu gsang bas na// de nyid bdag gis gsal ma byas// des na bla ma yang dag par// mnyes byas yang dag 'dod pas blangs// zhes bya ba la de kho na nyid shin tu gsang zhing gcig tu sba bar bya ba nyid yin pos ngas
374b1(rgyud 'grel): gamal bar ma hA sha d+he/ de bas na kyi sems can rnams tham la yang dam par sa shang dku bar byas nas/ de zang zhing gzung bar phyag/ ma khon nyid kyi man ngag kyi 'grel ba// sgrub por rgyu byung snying po'i sa
374b2(rgyud 'grel): nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgyu gar TI mkhan bau kA ma lagup+tap+tA dAng /
374b3(rgyud 'grel): bu chen po che ba rim chen bzang pos bsgyur ci bcun gtan la phab pa'o// / ye d+harA heha tu pra b+ha bA he tus te dz+ra ta thA ga to ba ta te tA ny+tsa mo ni ra~M d+ha me ba~M hr-i dr-i man+d+ha
374b4(rgyud 'grel): shra ma NaH/
375a1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul chen po'i sgrub thabs bzhugs//
375b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ mahA mA lA sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sgyu ma chen myo rnam sgeg pas// sna tshogs sgyu myu gzhung
375b2(rgyud 'grel): gang ltar// thugs rje'i stobs can dga' ba can// skye mas rna mr-i rgya la phyag 'tshal lo// bsngal gsum gdungs bdag nyid khams gsum pa// gang los byung ba'i bde ba'i chen po snod// phyogs rje chen po'i rig thos rtogs chen
375b3(rgyud 'grel): dini de nyid rnam brgyan bla ma bzang la 'drud// sgyu ma chen mo'i rjes 'brongs nas// sI rtsi'i stobs can rdo rje yi// gang zhig sgrub par 'dod pa yis// bdag gis skyeb thabs 'di brgyabs so// snying kha'i ma du zla ba la// rlung
375b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes zin pas ma// yid ba kyis smras rig pa mo// khrus kyi dran pa nyer gzhag pa// de myur ba las sus rnams dang // 'jig rten skying bstung ba la// mdun na rtswa dang sangs rgyas rnams// gus pas ma lus michod par s+ho// kon+d+ha
375b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum la sogs pa yi// tshig bcad gsum ni klag par bya// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom byas la// stong pa nyid ni bsgom byas nas// gsang sngags kyang ni brjod pa bye// bsrung ba'i sngags kyang dran byas la// rdo rjer mo
375b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsam// chos kyi dbyings su chung ba la// de nang 'byung ba bsam par bya// steng du'i ba bsgoms byas te// 'byung ci'i ra 'gyur ba las// gzhal las khang pa cos byas te// byu bzhi pa di sngon pas gan sa//
376a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun nas 'byung ba bzhin// phyi yi phyogs dang mtshams rnams su// dur khrod kyis ni rnam par brgyan// de yaM ming dang mtshan nyid ni// ji bzhin lung gis ba shAd par bya// gtum drag
376a2(rgyud 'grel): cig ste dbyibs can ni// gnyis pa tshang tshing gsum pa yin// 'bor ba zhes bya bzhi pa yin// mi thod zhes bye lnga pa yin// mi bzang po dang ha ha ra rgod// brgyad pa g.yar ka can du 'dod// dang po'i tshig pa zhes bya ste//
376a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa yang na mi tshig pa// gsum pa dum bur gyur pa ste// bzhi pa dum bur ma gyur pa// lnga pa 'jig pa zhes bshud de// drug pa 'jigs par byed pa yin// bdun pa mdung rtse ba skyon pa ste// brgyad pa bsgeg pa
376a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o// khra dang lce spyang 'ug pa dang // gtum po'i khyi dang srin po phag/ ro langs khro ba dregs khro ma// brgyad kyi gtso bo yang dag bskor// gzhal yas khang pa'i dbusu ni// pad+ma domar po bsam bya ste// de'i dbus
376a5(rgyud 'grel): su zla ba yi// dkyil 'khor chen po nges 'byung ba'i// de yi dbusu sa bon ni// rnam pa lnga ni rims bsgoms pas// de las spyos dang bsdu ba dag/ byas nas snying rje'i stobs can sogs// sa bon lnga las bdag nyid lnga//
376a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga ldan khyab bdag nyid// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsuM sku mdog nag po ljang // skyil dkrung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// lha mo'i tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan// yin
376b1(rgyud 'grel): lag thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs// dum pa'i rgyan gyis ska rags can// thod rlon phreng bas brgyan pa ste// sngo dang ser dang dkar dang ljang // zhal bzhi po dang ldan pa la// thod pa kha T+wAM 'chang ba dang // de bzhin mnga' dang gzhu
376b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// zhal bzhi'i mdog can lha mo bzhi// 'dab ma bzhi lnga rnam par bsam// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum gtso bo'i zhal
376b3(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshungs// shar gyi zhal ni thams cad kyang // rigs kyi gtso bo dang mthun pa// g.yon pa dril bu kha T+wAM ga/ slar yang lha mo g.yas pa la// rdo rje dang ni thod pa bsnams// gnyis po lha yi 'dab ma la// ser mo zhal
376b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi kha dog ni// ser dang sngo dang dkar dang ljang // kha dog ldan pas rnam par bzhugs// phyag ni g.yon pa bairla steng na// thod dang lce sbyang bsnams pa ste// g.yas ni rin chen mdung dag dang // chu khams rin chen mkha'agro
376b5(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// gsum pa nub kyi 'dab ma la// me yi khams kyi rlung bzhin can// dkar dmar mdangs kyi 'od gsal ba// rnal 'byor pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma'i// dkar dang sngo dang shin tu ser// ljang khu'i mdog ste zhal bzhi pa// sna
376b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pad+ma mda' dang bcas// g.yon pa thod pa gzhu 'dzin ma'o// byang gi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la// rnal 'byor sna tshogs mkha 'gro ma// ljang sngon de bzhin ser po dang // dkar po'i zhal can phyag bzhi pa// ral gri dang
377a1(rgyud 'grel): ni cad te'u dag/ g.yas na rtag tu 'dzin pa dang // g.yon na thod pa zhags pa bsnams// rlung gi khams kying mkha' 'gro ma// de ltar rnam par bsgoms par bya// rang rang sa bon gang yin dgod//
377a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi skur ni bsgom byas la// ye shes dkyil 'khor chen po ni// dbang bskur chen po bsam par bya// gtso bo'i dbul mi bskyod pa// mchod cing bstod la bdud rtsi myang // byas nas bzlas dong brtul zhugs spyad// sgra med bzlas
377a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bya ba dang // hrIH'i yi gau bzlas pa'i gzugs// A sogs rnal 'byor ma sogs la// dbugs rngub pa yi rgyun tu ni// brgyad pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// drug pa dang ni thig ler bcas// dbus 'byung ba yang rnal 'byor pas// bsgom
377a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bsgom min rnam par spangs// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid// rnal 'byor 'gro ba'i gtso bor 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rje bzlas pa dang // bzlas dang rdo rje 'chang ba bsgom// bzlas pa gnyis pa byas nas ni// grangs med
377a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par gzhag pa yis// mthar yang yi ge gsum gyis ni// brgyad pa'i mtha' las rnam par gnas// u yi yi ge thung ngur bcas// yi ge mchog ni dam pa ste// a sogs yi ge rnal 'byor ma// hrIHyaM ger yang dag sbyor//
377a6(rgyud 'grel): a yi mtha' dang yang dag ldan// sa bon lnga yi dgos par bcas// pad+ma kha phye byas nas ni// yi ge rnams ni bsgom par bya// de ltar rnal 'byor rtogs byas nas// 'dod pa'i don grub rdo rje can// sngags kyi byin brlabs de nas ni/
377b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor chen po de mnyam gzhag/ rang bzhin shes rab yan lag gis// gsang ba'i ze 'bru'i spyod yul du// lte bar gnas pa'i ri mo la// de la gnas par sbyar bar bya// A li kA li mnyam byas nas// 'bar ba la sogs
377b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa yi// seng ge'i rnal 'byor phyag rgya ni// bcings te gtum mo gzhug par bya// gzugs meng lha yi rnal 'byor byas// rtog pas yang dag sbyar nas ni// brgyad pa'i mthar ni thig ler bcos// bde ba chen po 'dzag par
377b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// lan gnyis lan gsumo goms byas te// bde ba chen po 'dzag pa na// rnal 'byor la sogs gnas bya'o// gzhon yang rnal 'byor la bos nas// rnal 'byor ma yis slong bar byed// skye ma mnyen mchog rdo rje yi// 'od kyi
377b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma kha phye zhig/ a la la la la ho// bde ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i gar mdzod cig/ nyi ma'i 'od kyi pad+ma kha rab 'byed pa bzhin// bde bo chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i gor mdzod cig/ de ltar thugs ni dgyes gyur nas// sgeg pa chen po
377b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam paro bsgyings// lha mo'i tshogs kyi dbus na ni// dgyes pa'i dga' bas rnam par rol// bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di byas pa'i// bsod nams 'di yis 'gro ba kun// sgyu 'phrul chen mo khyab bdag gi/ gtso bo'i bdag nyid thob par
377b6(rgyud 'grel): shog/ slob dpon chen po dpal rin chen rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
378a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dz+nyA na shrI b+ha dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/
378a2(rgyud 'grel): shrI bud+d+ha DA kI sA d+hA naM/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs// 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha lo// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// du khrod la sogs par gnas la// sngar langs te phyi nang gyi khrus byas
378a3(rgyud 'grel): la mchod pa la sogs bshams la/ bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste rang gi snying khar nyi ma la// oM bsams la/ de 'od zer gyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul nas// bar snong la bsam so la/
378a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste/ bdag gis sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags pa dang bsod namos la rje su yi rang ba dang / bsod nams yongasu bsngo ba dang / dkon mchog gsum
378a5(rgyud 'grel): la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / lam bston pa dang / bdag gi dngos po dbul ba dang / bstod pa la sogs pa byas te gshegasu gsol bar bya'o// de nas oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ata ma ko haM/
378a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas stong pa nyid du bsgoms par bya'o// de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dur khrod dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o// der pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa bsam la// de'i lte ba ra oM dang bcas pa'i thig le bltas la/ de las phyogs bzhir
378b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i steng du thig le gzhi spros pa las// lha mo bzhi bskyed par bya ste/ shar phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ sku mdog sngon mo zhal bzhi pa ste sngon mo dang ser ba dang dkar ba dang ljang khu'o// phyag bzhi pa ste/ rdo rje dang kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu dang thod
378b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs kyi lha mo ni// sku mdog ser mo/ ser mo dang / sngo ba dang dkar ba dang / ljang khu'i zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa ste rin po che dang / tri shU la don dang bcas pa dang / thod pa dang lce sbrang bsnams pa'o//
378b3(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi lha mo ni// sku mdog dkar mo// dkar ba dang ser ba dang / sngo ba dang ljang khu'i zhal bzhi pa'o// phyag bzhi pa ste/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang mda' dang / thod pa dang / gzhu bsnams pa'o// byang gi lha mo ni/ sku mdog ljang khu dang /
378b4(rgyud 'grel): ljang khu dang / ser ba dang / dkar ba dang sngon po'i zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa ste/ ral gri dang / cang ti'u dang / thod pa dang / zhags pa bsnams pa'o// lha mo thams cad kying spyan gsum pa/ mchu ba gtsigs pa/ sku khams pa
378b5(rgyud 'grel): gyen du 'bar ba/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ migo mgo lnga bcus brgyan pa/ nyi ma la skyil dkrung phyed pas brgyan pa bsam par bya'o// de nas lha mo bzhi'i glus bskul bar bya ste/ sangs
378b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyurgyas mkha' 'gro ma skyo mdog dmar mo// dmar ba dang / ser ba dang / dkar ba dang / ljang khu'i zhal ba ni/ phyag bzhi pa ste/ mda' dang thod pa dang // gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa'o// de nas skye mched byin gyis brlabs pa dang ni sgra
379a1(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs la/ snying kha'i sa bon gyis 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la/ bgegs bkrang la mchod pa rnams phul ste/ dz+dzaHhUM bA hoHzhes pas dgug
379a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te dbyer med par bya'o// de nas sa bon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangaso la/ mchod de gsol ba btab pas dbang bskur te/ rang gi rigs kyi bdag po bsam par
379a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ sangs rgyas mkha 'gro ma la sogs pa la gau rims bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsam par bya'o// de nas mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o// de nas gnas bzhir
379a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa dang / de la yi ge rnams dgod pa dang / gtum mo sbar ba dang / rang gi 'khor lo bsreg pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi bzhu brtul bya ba dang / rang gi gnas bzhir bde ba 'pho ba la
379a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bya'o// de nas zlas pa bya ste/ oM bud d+ha DA kI nI AHhriHhUM zhes bya ba la sogs pa bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor bsdu ba byas la/ spyod lam gyi tInge 'dzin la sogs pa thams cad bya'o//
379a6(rgyud 'grel): bza' ba thams cad las sa bon lngas sbyang ba deng // khrus byed tsa mo na lha dbang bskur ltar bya'o// nyi ma phyed dang rgongs ka'i dus su dbang bskur ba la sogs pa cho ga thams cad bya'o// de nas langs nas spyod lam gyi ting 'dzin
379b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa thams cad bya'o// nam phyed kyi dus su yang dag par mchod pa dang / ye shes kyi lha gshegasu gsol ba dang / dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rang gi sa bon la bsdus te/ snang stong dbyer med byang chub kyi semasu
379b2(rgyud 'grel): mos par byas la nyal bar bya'o// de ltar nyin dang mtshan du dngos grub kyi mtshan ma nye bar ma thob pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o// sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub gzhung gi/ sangs rgyas mkha' gro'o sgrub thabs 'dri// bdag
379b3(rgyud 'grel): gis dad pos byas pa la// mkhas pa rnams kyi bzod par mdzod// sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs// byas las bsod nams gang skyes las// bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams// rdo rje 'dzin gyis
379b4(rgyud 'grel): thob shog/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs// slob po na chen po nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//
379b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzo rdzo btsun te// / rgya gar skad du/ mAhA mA yA maN Da la kra ma bo d+hA na nA ma bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ sgyu 'phrul
379b6(rgyud 'grel): chen mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa gsal ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshalo// ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi// rang bzhin he ru ka dpal gtso// mkha 'gro ma dang bcas pa dang // bla ma dam pa
380a1(rgyud 'grel): la btud de// ces pa bsdus pa'i rgyud dag las// rim pa gsal ba ma mthong bas// bla ma dam pa'i drin gyis ni// rim pa gsal bas bdag gis bshad// slob dpon man/
380a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid bzang ldan zhing // sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud dag tu// dbang bskur dam tshig bstan pa yis// gzhan dag gus pas gsol 'dengs sam// rang gi don du 'dod pa yis// slob ma mtshan nyid bzang ldan la// rnal 'byor nus pa dri byas
380a3(rgyud 'grel): la// nges par tshig tu smra gyur na// de la sbyang ba'i las bya'o// dur khrod la sogs gnang 'jigs gnas sum// bsam mtha' gnas sam nyams dga' bar// rtog bral sems can gdon pa yis// bsdam pas rgyud las 'byung
380a4(rgyud 'grel): bab bzhin// bskyed pa'i tshul gnas slob dpon gyis// de yi dag po 'bum bzlas shing // lhag ma rnams la khri khri'o// de nas de yi gnang ba 'am// mtshan ma bzang dang ldan gyur na// de ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir// dben pa'i gnas
380a5(rgyud 'grel): sam dur khrod dam// sngon byas pa 'am yid 'ong sar// de dbus maN Dal byas 'og tu// chu la sogs pa'i rnam lnga dang // dbugs dbyung sogs pa skyang nul bya// der ni sil mi'i mchog bkram la// lha gnas 'khor lo rdzogs bskyed la//
380a6(rgyud 'grel): de la khaM yig sogs pa lo// ye shes dgug la kyo sogs la// dgug sogs byas te dbang bskur la// mchod stong rdzogs byas bdag nyid kyis// de la sogs pa gdab par bya// bder gshegs thams cad bdag la dgongs//
380b1(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams mchod pa'i phyir dang ni// slob ma rnams la phan phyir du// sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya yi// dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar 'tshal// bdag la byin brlabs gnang bar mdzod// de skad lan gsum gsol btab la// de
380b2(rgyud 'grel): nas bdag nyid he ru ka'i// gzugasu bdag nyid gnas nasu// mchod gte ro mar ldan pa yis// lha mo mdzes ma bskul ba'i phyir// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i mdzod spyod ltar// lag ba sa la lan gsum brdab// rdo rje sa yi lha mo ni//
380b3(rgyud 'grel): gtso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra la// mdzes pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa la// gser gyi bum thogs ci bgyi smra// de la mchod yon ston 'gro bas// mchod pa kun gyi mchod byas la// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang
380b4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom lhar// de bzhin bdag gis bdud sngo las// rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri// de ltar lan gsum
380b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod rjes la// dga' ba'i mdongs kyis lha mo do// khyod ni slob dpon mchog yin gyis// dkyil 'khor gyis ni las gyis shig/ zer zhing sa la thim par blta// de rjes phyogs skyong rnams dag la// gter ma tshul bzhin byin/
380b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// sa phyogs 'dir gnas lha klu dang klu// gnod sbyin dri za lha ma yin// gang dag rdzu 'phrul cher ldan pa// rdo rje'i spyan dang snyan mnga' ba// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis// bode gshegs rnams la mchod pa dang // sems
381a1(rgyud 'grel): can kun la phan pa'i phyir// dge ba'i sa phyogs 'di nyid du// dkyil 'khor dam pa chen 'byung la// sgyu 'phrul chen mo rgyud kyi rgyal// dkyil 'khor chen mo las byed pas// khyed kyis bar chad ma byed
381a2(rgyud 'grel): par// dge ba'i grogs po nyid du mdzod// de ltar lan gsum gsol 'debs po// sa bslang ba yi cho ga'o// de nas sa phyogs de nyid du// me yi las las byung ba ltar// tshar bcad zhi ba'i las bya'o// de nas dus kyi bye brag gis// lho
381a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phye rnam par shes pa yis// g.yas bskor lto nas brko bar bya// de nas ro bsal mgal dum dang // gyo mo rus dang re ba bos la// sa de mi 'chi bcu phyed dang // dri zhim chu la hUM bzlas dgang // der ni tshad ldan dkyil 'khor la// shar dang
381a4(rgyud 'grel): byung du gzhol sogs bya// ba yi lci bas bko tsam// byugs te dri ma chu dang ni// ga bur tsan don dam pa dang // me tog sna tshogs dkrAm pa dang // hU~M bzhi yis ni sa sbyang ba'o// de nas thal gos la sogs po'o// rang gi rgyan ldan slob dpon
381a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis// rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pas// hUM dang khaM zhes bya ba yis// rnam dag na mkhar bsams nas ni// hUM laM sngags kyis gser gyi ni// sa gzhi rdo rje dang ldan pasamo// me de'i sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'o// de nas bdag nyid he ru kar
381a6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i cho ga'i tshul rdzogs nas// bsams po 'am dngos su mkha' 'gro ma// bzhi'i gnas la gnas pa yis// phyi nang mchod pas mnyes byas la// rang bzhin rnam dag ces bya ba// sogs pas bstod de gsol ba ni//
381b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gtso bo kun gyi dngos// sdig pa thams cad zad byed pa// sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni// mgon po chen po bshad du gsol// gsol ba'i tshig de mkhyen nasu// sdug bsngal can la gzigs nas ni// khro bo nga rgyal
381b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yis// mig tu ma dang Ta yig las// nyi ma zla ba bas lo bsam la// mig 'bras hUM las gyur pa yi// rdo rje nag po bsam par bya// rkang pa gnyis su a las ni// sna tshigs rdo rje 'ber ba bsams// rdo rje lte ba'i mig 'bras
381b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ khro tshogs spros pas bgegs bskrad la// rkang pas rdo rje rab 'bar sprul// rdo rje dril ldan 'gyeng brag gis// dbang ldan mtshams su song nas ni// hUM song shig bgegs tshogs ma lus kun// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// bag
381b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs chen ma lus kun// gnod par byed pa'i bgegs tshogs rnams// sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i bdag nyid gtso// bde chen yi shes las byung ba'i// nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje dngos// bka' yi 'khor lor rab sbyor byed// gal te bka'
381b5(rgyud 'grel): las 'das gyur na// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis// mgo bo tshal pa rgyar 'gas re shing // zhi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de bas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis// zhes pas bgegs rnams bskyang bya ba// rol pa'i goms stabs brgyad pas
381b6(rgyud 'grel): bskor// rkang pa bskyod dang lag pa bskyod// smin ma 'degs sogs gar gyi ni// gdug pa'i tshogs ni bskrad byas la// hUM las bskyed pa'i phur bu ni// oM badz+ra kI la ya zhes pa ni// de yo byin brlabs bzlas rdzogs nas// g+ho g+ha la
382a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs sngags kyis ga sh+ya// de nas rab dang bya// sa srung bab chagag// de nas byan ma chu da nga na// ma 'chabacu phyung byugs pa'i sar// thig le'i sbyin du me tog gzhag/ der ni chu skyes
382a2(rgyud 'grel): bsams steng du// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni// rang rang sa bon gyur pa las// lha yi 'khor lo bsam par bya// mgon po dgug la sogs byas nas// Tak+ki hUM dzaHTak+ki hUM/ DAk+ki hUM ho baM hoHrnam bzhis// dkyil 'khor rnam
382a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bsdus pa las// prok+Sha NA dang arga sogs// gzhan yang rdo rje mkha 'gro rnams// mchod nas bstod de gsol po ni// he ru ka dpal bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan// phyogs bzhi'i mkha 'gro ma rnams
382a4(rgyud 'grel): dang // rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can// byang chub sems dpa' la sogs kun// thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol// slob ma rnams la phan bdags dang // khyed la yang ni mchong ba'i phyir// bdag gis sdig pa 'jig byed
382a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'id nang par dkyil 'khor bri lags na// rjesu brtse bar dgongs nas ni// byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol// der ni phyi nang mchod pas mchod// dkyil 'khor gyis ni lha rnams kun// lhag par gnas pa'i gnas cho ga'o//
382a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas gser la sogs pa yi// rin chen rgyu las byung ba yi// lto che mgrin po ring ba dang // mchu 'phyang nag po ra ri med// dri zhim sa dkar gyis byugs nas// rang dang rang gi mtshan ma gdab// rnam rgyal las ni thams cad
382b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje las kyi lha// kha dog mthun pa'i ras gzung ste// bum pa'i mgul bucing bar bya// tsu ta la sogs shing dag ni// lo ma me tog dang ldan pas// 'dis ni bum pa'i khwa rgya no// chu dang ldan pa'i bum bA ru// byang chub
382b2(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi rtag su ni// she ta pri ta sti sta ni// a ba ra tsin da dan da dang // uta pa la kaN+Da ka ri dang // ha sa de ba dag bzhug go/ so ba 'bras dang ma sha sran// nas dang tIl dang gro rnams kyis// thugs kyi rang bzhin 'di dag go//
382b3(rgyud 'grel): shel dang dngul dang mu tig dang // b+hu ru du dang rnam lnga ni// lha rnams sku mdog rtags su'o// nyi ma zla ba chung ngu sman// dri dang rnam pa lnga gzhugo/ de nas dkar ba'i ras steng du// me tog bkram la bum pa der// gzhag ste byin gyis
382b4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa ni// bum pa'i rang bzhin dag bsams ste// bruM lngas mtshani nyid bzang ldan bskyad// de yi nang du chu skyes ni// nyi ma dang ldan sa bon las// rnam rgyal dag tu thams cad bskyed// gzhan yang rang rang sa bon las// sku
382b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed cho ga thams cad kyang // sngon ltar byas te bzlas pa yis// stobs kyis byang chub sems kyis chus// gong bar lhag par gnas pa'o// slob ma bsrung dang ldan pa yis// me tog phreng 'dzin slob ma ni// yid gzhungs spros
382b6(rgyud 'grel): chen byas pa bzo// rigs btsun de rgyal mod la dang // gzugs dang lang tshe kho dog ldan// gsang ba'i don la mngon brtson na// gzugs ngan yon tan med pa dang // de las gzhan pa'ang gzhug par bya// lus bkrus gtsang
383a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i go dgos la// snyim pa me tog gis bkang nas// dga' chen khyod bdag bston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag
383a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdug lnga gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po chen po bdag
383a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug mdzod// de ltar gsol ba gsum btab ste// 'od kyi bu ru byas nas su// 'di skad ces ni brjod par bya// bu tshur theg pa chen po la// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te// gsang sngags spyod yul cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bstan
383a4(rgyud 'grel): par+ya b+ha// sangs rgyus dus gsum las 'das // sku gsu mi thugs kyi rdo rje can// mnyam nyid yi shrIs thob byi ni// rdo rje sngags rab bsgom pa'o// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyim med de// he ru ka dpal skyob b+ha yi// bdud skye
383a5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mi bzang po'i// dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ de nas slong mas chog 'di// sdig pa bshags sogs bya ba ste// bdog gis sdig pa 'i

384a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum zlos slob dpon gyis// rdo rje khu tshur dri yi chus// snying mgrin spyi bor thig le la// hUM la sogs pa'i yig gsum las// rdo rje la sogs rnams gsum ni// rang rang yi ges mtshan pa ni// go rims bzhin du bsam par bya// yig gsum
384a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis bkug bstim nas// mchod pa'i las byas pa la// me tog spyi bor mdun du smos// dri la dang mar me snying khar ro// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro reg pa yis// btab ste rang rang sngags kyiso// de nas a shwata tha sogs las// sor bcu gnyis kyi

384b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul 'di ni// de bas kyang rnyed dka' ba ste// gang gi mnyam med sems can don// bla na med pa byed nus pa// gnyis med zab mo'i spyod tshul 'dis// sems can sangs rgyas thob byed pa'o// dang po bskal pa grangs med nas// bsags

384b4(rgyud 'grel): khyer dam pa mthong zhes brjod// de nas nang bar dus ni// rmi lam mtshan ma dri bar bya// des kyang mtshan ma mthong ba rnams// slob dpon mdun du brjod par bya// mtshan ma bzang dang ldan spro ba// de yi dngos grub bstan par bya// ngan pa mthong

385a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thig dgug go/ dkyil 'khor chen po thig gdab phyir// rdo rje thig ni bdag la gsol// mchod pa rnams ni byas nas su// oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma/ ba ra s+phar a nu ga ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma/ a d+ya na ta a nu pra biSh+Ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma/ zhes

385a4(rgyud 'grel): po ste// oM badz+ra sa ma la sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM// lho dang byang nas de bzhin te// nam mkha' yi ni thig gdab bo// 'og gi thig kyang de bzhin te// de tshe 'jig rten khams kun gyi// sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro don du// khyed kyis don ni bya
385a5(rgyud 'grel): dus yin// slob dpon me dang rlung gnas te// slob mo dbang ldan bden bral du// 'dug la shar dang nub gdab bo// de nyid gnas dang byang gi thig/ byin za srin por gnas pas lho// de nyid gnas dang bden bral dang // slob ma rlung dang

385b1(rgyud 'grel): phyed nyi zla dang // dril bu g.yar ka'i sgra sgrogs pa'i// khyams kyi nang dang sgo khyud du// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan pa'i// nang du chu skyes brgyad pa la// rdo rje phreng ba dang ldan pa'o// 'khor lo'i brgyad cha sgo yin te// sgo khyud sgo dang 'drar shes bya
385b2(rgyud 'grel): de yi khyams kyi tshad yin te// mtshon sna lnga yang de bzhin phyed// rta babs de la mdzes pa dang // rin chen pha gu mtshon gyi tsheng // nyid 'gyur dra ba dra phyed tshad// rta babs gdugs sogs mdzes pa la// dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'o//

385b4(rgyud 'grel): nas rin tshon sna lnga 'am// 'bras kyi phye ma zhib mo 'am// yang na rus phye so phag dang // 'dab ma ljang khu la sogs pa la// byas pa pad+mo'i snod gzhig ste// ye shes thig bzhin dag pa'o// chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag/ sems can
385b5(rgyud 'grel): khams ni rab grol byed// sgyu 'phrul zhes bya rgyal po che// tshen gyi las ni yang dag brtsams// brtan pa'i sems kyis mnyam gzhag ste// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bya// dang po rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dbang ldan mtshams nas bri bar bya//

386a1(rgyud 'grel): de bas 'bad par ri mo blo// nan tan du ni bri bar bya// chu skyes shar gyi 'dab ma sngo// lho dang nub ni ser dang dmar// byang ljang mtshams bzhi dkar ba la// ka pA la bzhi mdzes par bri// phyogs kyi
386a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma bzhi po la// rigs kyi mtshan ma nyi ma bri// de rgyab rdo rje phreng bas mnan// de bzhin shar sogs rigs kyis ni// sgo yi rim pa shes par bya// de ni tshon gyi cho ga'o// de ltar rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// slob dpon mchog
386a3(rgyud 'grel): gis lus bkrus te// dri zhim pa yis lus byugs te// rgyan cha mchog dang ldan pa yis// bum pa rnams la sogs pa yi// rdzas rnams thogs te lan gsum bskor// de nas slob dpon he ru ka'i// nga rgyal mchog gi hUM sgrogs shing //
386a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis rdo rje dril ljon pas// slob dpon nang du bzhugs nas ni// dbusu gnas la mnyam gzhag pas// yid kyi sgro bzhi dbye bar bya// oM badz+ra uta g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra ba sha ya hUM/ de nas rnam rgyal la sogs pa// gnas dang
386a5(rgyud 'grel): gau rim bzhin du dgod// bla re dam pa bre ba dang // sna tshogs gos dang rgyan rnams bre// spos dang me tog mar me ni// mchog gi dkyil 'khor mdzes par brgyan// de nas rgyan ldan bla ma yis// cho ga'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor gyi// 'khor
386a6(rgyud 'grel): lo rdzogs par bskyed byas la// se gol sgra yis sbyor ba yi// bde gshegs thams cad bsdu bar bya// mdun du zhal gsil mchod yon sogs// phul te dgug gzhug byas nas su// de la me tog spos sogs dang // mchod pa'i
386b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis mchod pa dang // bkra shis glu yis mchod pa dang // tshogs kyi dga' ston bskor ba yi nas ni// slob dpon rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas// dkyil 'khor dam pa de dag la// bskor ba byas la phyag 'tshal te// des ni sbyin sregs las
386b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba// dkyil 'khor de yi shar phyogasu// dkar la zlum pa'i thab dag du// 'o ma can gyi shing dag las// pA pa ka de rab bskyed de// me yi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // dkyil 'khor chen po tshul bzhin mchod// mthar ni dgang blugs dbul byas
386b3(rgyud 'grel): to// mchod bstod rang gnas gsheg su gsol// slob dpon des ni rdzus lhag mas// byin za mchod de gshegasu gsol// zan dron sha dang bzar bcas dang // mi 'chi bcu phyed ldan pa yi// gtor ma bzang po mtshan phyed sbyin// de nas
386b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa rtogs pa dang // slob ma 'jug pa'i tshul du ni// dang po slob dpon 'jug par bya// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o// mdzes pa'i rgyan dang gos bgos te// gdong ba ros kyis bka' nas su// 'di skad ces ni brjod par bya// sangs
386b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// slob dpon mgron la sgrub su mchi// gtso bo mkha' 'gro mar bcas bI'i// lha rnams kun lo phyag 'tshal lo// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog du// mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol// de nas slob dpon gyi 'di
386b6(rgyud 'grel): skad brjod do// de bzhin gshegs kun gyi gnas// he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor lha rnams la// sgo gsum dang pas phyag 'tshal te//
387a1(rgyud 'grel): oM nAm+b+ha t+ye hUM/ na maHmI hUM/ na mo nA mAHhUM s+yAd// de nas kyang nI shur skor ru// thal sgyur sngags 'dis phyag 'tshul te/ oM bad+d+hA DA kin+ma b+h+ya dzo bas+thA nA yA/ Ata ma nan+ti ya twA yam+bi/ oM sar+b+ba taHdA t+yA
387a2(rgyud 'grel): a.A b+h+yAHa b+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ de yi snying / mi bskyod pa/ de yi steng kar bcug pase b+he// rat+na DA ki ni bu dzaM pi s+t+rai na ya At+ma nAM nIr+ya tA ya mr-i sarba tA tha ga ti rata na saM b+h+rUM bo a d+hI tISh+Tha swa maM/ dpral bar thil sbyar lho phyogasu// phyug+sa 'chil rin chen 'byung ldan/
387a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar nub dang byang dang nra// mgrin pa spyi bor phyag byas pa// snang ba mtha' yas don grub la'o// oM pad+ma DA kI ni pU dzo pa s+tha Ata ma naM ni ra ya tA ya mi sar+b+ba ta tha ga ta pad+ma d+ha ra oM d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ oM bI shwA DA kI nI pU dzo ba s+thA nI ya
387a4(rgyud 'grel): Ata ma na nir yau tA ya mi/ sar+b+ba ta tha ga to a mau g+ha sid+d+hi a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de lta phyag bzhi byas 'og tu// slob dpon ma de la thams cad pa'i// las kyi bum pa'i chu yi bkru// de nas shar phyogs sgor phyogs li// lag ne me
387a5(rgyud 'grel): tog dang bcas pas// slob dpon la ni phyag byas te// dam tshig sdom sogs 'dod pa'i phyir de la gsol ba gdab par bya// dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol// bdag la sdom pa rnams kyang gasngal// byang chub mchog tu sems
387a6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed la// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// slob ma de lo dam tshig dbab// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyebasu gsol// 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs yid 'ong // sdom
387b1(rgyud 'grel): pa brtan par 'gyur ba'o// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams// blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyi// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes brjod do// bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam pas// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis// 'di ni rdo
387b2(rgyud 'grel): rje rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa smon par brjod// rin chen rigs la rtag tu ni// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam
387b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung // 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshigs dang ni sdom pa mchog/ las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// khyod kyis yang dag gzung bar bya// mchod pa'i las kyang
387b4(rgyud 'grel): nus bya// de lta'i yon tan slob ma la// dam tshig sdom pa byin pa la// slob mas phyag byas sdom pa gzung // sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// he ru ka dpal mkha 'gro bcos// kun nas bdag la dgongasu gsol// che ge zhes bya
387b5(rgyud 'grel): dedi ring nas// gzung ste ji srid byang chub kyi// snying po la ni mchis kyis bAr// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// zhes bya ba lto sogs pa nas// sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod // ces pas sdom pa gzung nas ni// oM sar+b+ba yi
387b6(rgyud 'grel): ga tsit+ta uta pa dA ya mi// de ltar rnal 'byor sems bskyed la// me tog phreng dang bcas pa yi// rdo rje snying khar gzhag nas su// oM sur ti sa ma ya s+t+waM ho sid d+hi badz+ra ya thA su khaM// de ltar rnal 'byor sems bskyed nas// lag na phyeng
388a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan slob ma de// oM a khaM bi ra hUM zhes pas// slob ma dkyil 'khor gzhug byas nas// slob dpon gyis ni tshig 'dis brjod// deng khyod he ru ka dang mkha'agro ma rnams kyi rigasu zhugs kyis//
388a2(rgyud 'grel): ngas khyod la he ru ka'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste// ye shes des khyod de bzhin gshegs pa// thams cad dang / he ru ka dang mkha' 'gro ma'i// dngos grub dag kyang thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// khyod kyis
388a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i// mngon du brjod par mi bya ste// dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re// de la 'khor lo gzhug byas nas// lag gi rdo rje spyir gzhag la// khyod kyis su yang rung ba A// gal te khyod kyis smras gyur na// khyod
388a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi dam tshig rdo rje yis// rang gi mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur// de nas bdud rtsi lnga ldan pa'i// pad+ma'i snod kyi dri yi chus// snying po bzlas te 'thung du gzhug/ he ru ka dpal de khyod kyis// byed kyi snying la di ring gzhug/ gal te tshul 'di smos
388a5(rgyud 'grel): na ni// de yi mod la dra la te gshegs// badz+ra u da ka oM AHhUM/ de nas 'di yang brjod par bya// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshigs 'das nas bsreg par byed// dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub na// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis
388a6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// de nas brtsams te khyod kyi ni// he ru ka dpal nga yin gyis// nga yis bsgo ba khyod kyi gyis// khyod kyis de la brnyas byas nas// mi bde ma spangs dus byas nas// dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re// de nas slob ma'i gtso bo
388b1(rgyud 'grel): yis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// bdag la byin gyis rlobs mdzod la// rdo rje'i ye shes dbab du gsol// slob dpon rgyan cha bgos byas te// 'gyings dang bcas pas slob ma la// bltas te rdzas kyis gdug pa dang
388b2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra a bI shA a/ zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas// dril bu'i sgra bsgrags rang snying la// 'od kyis bder gshegs bkug te gzhug/ des kyang babs par ma gyur na// slob ma'i snying kha'i zla ba la// he ru ka dpal yum bcas
388b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de yi rdo rje pang bskyod pas// 'od zer dmar pos yan lag kun// gal te gcig gyur sngags bzlas nas// gdon mi za bar 'bad par 'gyur// babs nas lci la yi gI a// kha dog dmar pos bsams nas ni// smos shig
388b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags chos chen po// dpag tu med pa bde ba che// dge dang mi dge 'di 'dra bas// babs nas dge dang mi dge ston// 'das dang ma 'ongs ston gyur na// brgya pa'i sngags kyis brtan byas nas// de nas slob dpon 'di skad brjod//
388b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni bsod nams ji lta bar// rigs kyi rim bzhin 'di yi lha// 'dis ni dngos grub gang yin dang // rigs ni gang gis snod du 'gyur// 'di yis bsod nams gang yin las// dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin 'gyur// slob mas
388b6(rgyud 'grel): me tog phreng ba de// pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hoHzhes pas// dkyil 'khor du ni me tog dor// lha de rang la 'grub pa'i phyir// me tog de yis mgo la bcings// de nas slob ma'i lag pa la// gzung nas de yi mig dbye bya// he ru ka dpal
389a1(rgyud 'grel): deng khyod kyi// mig dbye bar ni brtson par mdzad// mig ni thams cad dbye mdzad de// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// oM badz+ra ne t+yA lo ho ha ra ba Ta la hrIHzhes pas gdong g.yog bkrol nas ni/
389a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed// khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// 'gro ba'i phun sum tshogs pa kun// dngos grub kun khyod mngon du 'gyur// dam
389a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang // gsang sngags la yang brtson por gyis// zhes brjod de me tog lhung ba'i lha// gtso bo de lta bstan par bya// khyod dkyil 'khor de yi lha nyid kyang // nan tan du ni de la bstan// de nas slob ma
389a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas// bla mo'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// mchod yon dam pa phul nasu// dbang bskur don du gsol gdab bya// hA ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba// 'gro ba skyob phyir rdo rje can// de ltar yon tan 'byung gnas sogs// de
389a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ni bdag la de gsol cig/ dpa' bo chen pos mi ldog pa'i// dbang bskur ba de bdag la gsol// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyi// de skad gtso la gsol btab nas// de nas 'jug
389a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgo ru ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bris la// steng du seng ge'i khri bshams te// sna tshogs mdzes pa'i gdan bting nas// gnyis maud blo ldan der gzhag te// he ru ka dpal der sbrul la// gdugs dkor slob ma'i steng gzung nas/
389b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bad de mchod pa ci nus mchod// de nas me tog chu sogs pa'i// dbang gi ni dam pa blang ba'i phyir// dbang bskur bar chod zhi ba'i phyir// yungs kar bsngags te bgegs bzlog la// slob mas khrus byas rgyan bzang bgro// khri gzhug
389b2(rgyud 'grel): snyim pa'i me tog ni// dkyil 'khor la ni gtor bar bya// oM pra tIts+tsha hoHzhes brjod la// me tog blangs te slob ma yi// mgo lo bcings te sngags 'di brjod// oM d+harmA kuN Da a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes brjod do// de nas dang por slob dpon
389b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis// rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs nas// chu rnams thod par bsdus nas ni// glu blang dril bu sogs sgra bsgrags// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes// bzlas te rang nyid 'od kyis ni// rig pa'i lha mo dam pa rnams// bdud rtsi'i chu yis bag
389b4(rgyud 'grel): chags bkru// chu yis dbang bskur dam pa'o// lugs blugs thing ka 'bur bris pa// gser sogs byas pa'i dbu rgyan la// rin chen 'byung ldan der bcug nas// dbu rgyan dam pa de dkon te// dar dpyangs bcings la 'di brjod do// thor
389b5(rgyud 'grel): gtsug cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ bder gshegs kun gyis bsngags pa yi// rin chen dbu rgyun dam po dang // dar dbyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya// oM badz+ra pa da ka badz+ra a ra li hoHdbu rgyan dbang mchog dam pa'o// rin chen rgyu yi rdo
389b6(rgyud 'grel): rje la// snang ba mtha' yos der bcug la// lag tu gtod tshe 'di skad brjod// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas// de ring khyed la dbang bskur bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// shin tu sgrub phyir rdo rje gzung // oM badz+ra a
390a1(rgyud 'grel): d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ lag tu rdo rje dbang bskur ro// dril bu don yod dpal bcug ste// lag g.yon gtong tshe 'di skad brjod// 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro/
390a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed// de tshe dril bu'i sgra sgrogaso// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni// mchog gi srid pa byed
390a3(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// oM shrI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM// a b+hi Shiny+tsa tiSh+Tha bi ri sa ma ya// zhes brjod g.yon du dril bu'o// phyag rgya che dang ldan pa la// sngags kyi dbang bskur ming gdags te// oM shrI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a d+hi Shiny+tsa mau/ shrI he/
390a4(rgyud 'grel): ru ka nA ma a b+hiSh+Te ka t+te/ kyai dpalnga ldan ming dbang po// dr-i nasaM rdo rje brtul zhugs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// he ru ka dpal phyag ni bsnams// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // he ru ka dpal brtul zhugs brtan/ oM
390a5(rgyud 'grel): sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha ai ShastaM d+ha ra ya mi/ hi hi hi hI hUM/ zhes brjod pa ni dril bu dang 'brel pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o// de ltar rtogs pas gsang ba yis// dbang mchog snod du gyur slob ma la// slob dpon
390a6(rgyud 'grel): mdun du slob ma de// pad+ma zla ba bzhugs bsams la// gsang ba'i dbang phyir gsol ba gdab// gsang ba'i dbang bskur chen po la// gtso bo gsang ba bdag la gsol// de ltar brjod rjes slob dpon gyis// lha yi rnal
390b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dang ldan pas// sngon zhing chu la sogs pa yi// dbang rnams rdzogs nas slob dpon gyis// gsang ba'i go 'phang 'di brjod do// dam tshim phyag rgya rab gsungs pa// yid kyi lus ni brtan phyiraro// gang gi lus kun brtan byed
390b2(rgyud 'grel): sa yi phyag rgyar rab tu grags// de skad slob ma la smras nas// rang dang rig ma lhan cig tu// yid dang rjes mthun bza' dang bca'// btung ba la sogs TI su bya// kha dog la sogs bA ga bur gyis// dri zhim mchog tu bsgos pa dang // yid
390b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog po yi dga' ba dang // sgeg dang rol sogs sngar byas te// kye ma gnyen mchog sogs pa yis// lha mos bdag la bskul ba dang // dang po gnyis ni stsolas 'jug bya// dga' ba'i bde ba 'byung ba dang // nam mkha' gnas pa'i bder gshe
390b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams// bkra shis glu la sogs pa yis// yid la yang dag bskul bsams te// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// gsang sngags gnas las byung ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin pa yin// de skad
390b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas nor bu dbyung // mthe bong srin lag gnyis kyi khar// 'dir gshegs zhu ba'i rang bzhin gyi// byang chub sems de slob dpon gyis// dri dang bcas pa'i slob ma sbyin// des kyang a ho su kha zhes// brjod de dga'o bas de btung ngo // kham
390b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum thabs dang shes rab gcig/ bde chen gnyis med ye shes gsal// gsal byas slob ma nus ldan 'gyur// gsang ba'i slob dpon dbang bskur ro// de nas cho ga'i rim pa 'dis// rjes gnang dbang bskur sbyin bya ste// rtsa ba'i dkyil
391a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor pha rol tu// sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas te// de dbus slob dpon rang nyid ni// sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i ting 'dzin gnas// slob ma bzang pos slob dpon la// gus pas yon phul
391a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod byas la// phyag rgyas dbang po gnyis sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor gyis ni 'khor lo kun// spro dang bsdu ba'i tshul bstan la// dbang bskur 'dod phyir gsol ba gdab// rang bzhin slob dpon go 'phang che// bder gshegs rnams
391a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang bskur ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa// de ni sems can dpag med don// brtul zhugs mchog ni khyod drin gyis// ji ltar 'dul bzhin bdag bgyidado// de ltar gsol ba btAb rjes la// rdo rje slob dpon dam pa la
391a4(rgyud 'grel): snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin bting nas ni// slob ma 'dod pa'i lha'i ngo bor bskyed// rang lus 'khor lo rnams spros nas// rdo rje mkha'agro la sogs pa// lag pa'i lo mas bum pa ni// bdud rtsi'i chu dang bkra shis glus// dbang ni
391a5(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bsams par bya// rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs pas// sngon bzhin chu la sogs pa nas/ gsang ba'i dbang gis bar dag gis// cho ga rdzogs rjes shes rab la// brten pa'i ye shes sbyin bya ste// sngon
391a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin slob ma rang la bstan// gzhag ste gus bcas 'di brjod do// mdzes pa 'di ni gzung ba dang // brten par bder gshegs kun gyis brtags// 'di ni gzungs ma yid dga' ma// khyod kyis rtag tu brjod par bya// de skad smrag
391b1(rgyud 'grel): la slob dpon gyis// phyag rgya dam pa byin brlabs te// slob ma de la gtad par bya// de ni dngos po thams cad kyi// slob dpon nyid du de 'gyur ro// de nas slob ma stan de la// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa'i// bsam gtan gnas dang
391b2(rgyud 'grel): phyi dang nang // gsang la sogs pos mchod bya ste// mchod pa gzugs dang sgra sogs kun// dmigs med sbyor ba rang bzhin no// mnyam pa nyid du mos par bya'o// de nas gser gyi thur ma yis// mge sman byugs pa'i tshul du ni//
391b3(rgyud 'grel): mig ni dbye bar bya ba'o// oM badz+ra ne tA pa ha ra pa Ti la hrIHji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten rab ri'i bsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'o// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal// de nas ma long bstan rjes la// cho
391b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya'o// chos rnams gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs// dag cings gsal la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgya dang 'bras las thams cad 'byung // de skad brjod lnga chos rnams kun// rnam
391b5(rgyud 'grel): dag sbyor ba gsal ba las// ho yis slob mi'i lag pa ru// mda' dang gzhu byin des kyang ni// bskyod de phyogs bzhir 'phan tshul bya// steng 'ag dbus de nyid kyis// bdud bzhi la sA ni rnam rgyal bya// de nas yi ge hUM gis ni// 'khor lo
391b6(rgyud 'grel): byin lo 'di skad brjod// dang nas gzung ste 'jig rten la// skyong pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor// chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pas// kun tu sdig ming dri med pa'o// de tshe leg tu dung byin te// khyod kyis the tshom dogs med pa// sems
392a1(rgyud 'grel): ni yid gnyis med pa yis// chos dung bla na med pa ni// dri ma med pas kun dga' yis// chos kyi de nyid bstan pa dang // zhi rgyas dab dgug pa dang // sdod byed gsod byed bskrad pa dang // gang dang
392a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa de de rnams// yang na dang po'i dbang du kun// bsrung dang bza' sogs sdom par bcas// tshe ga der yang rdzogs par 'dod // de nas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du// zhugs nas sngon bzhin 'chi med dang // bza' btung la sogs
392a3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu spyad la// lung bstan 'di ni sbyin bya ste// lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas// lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis// chos gos tha ma snying khar gzung // g.yas pa mi 'jigs tshul gyi gnas// de nas tshig 'di brjod par bya// 'di ni
392a4(rgyud 'grel): ngas khyod lung bstan yin// he ru ka dpal de bzhin gshegs// srid pa kun tu sgrub pa yis// srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams la bton// ha shwA a mu ka badz+ra ta thA ga ta sid d+hA ye/ ho shrI a mu ka badz+rA ta thA ga ta sAd d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M// datsha
392a5(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dpal dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang slob dpon bcas// mgrin cig lung bstan bsams par bya// de nas dbugs dbyung sbyin bya ba// gseng chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// mthong ba dang ni bcug pa yi// sdig pa kun las
392a6(rgyud 'grel): grol 'gyur bar// khyod ni shin tu de ring nas// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya zhing // gus pa yis ni mchod par bya// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya'ang // yongs su btang bar mi bya'o// dam tshig sdom pa bsrung bya ste// rnam par rtog pas
392b1(rgyud 'grel): gos med pas// rang lha'i rnal 'byor gnas pa yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan bsten par bya// khyod rang sangs rgyas kun rigs skyes// 'di ni slob ma dbugs dbyung ba'o// de nas slob ma dang ldan pas// rta dang glang po shing rta dang // srog
392b2(rgyud 'grel): nor rin chen sna tshogs dang // nor bu me tog brgyan sogs pa// phyag byas bla ma dam pa lo// ma zhen pa yi sems kyis dbul// slob dpon mnyes byas de rjes la// slob mas rdo rje dril gzung la// slob dpon dam pas slob
392b3(rgyud 'grel): mi mgor// gdugs gzung bkra shis spyod ldan pas// slob mas dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor// de yis rjes la shar phyogs nas// phyag byas langs la der gnas la// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs rnams kyis// bza'
392b4(rgyud 'grel): btung la sogs dga' ba yi// rol mo phu lo la smon lam gdab// de nas ci bder gshegasu gsol// de nas tho rangs dusu ni// tshon rtsi la sogs thams cad kun// bsdus te gser gyi bum bcug ste// chu bo chen por dor
392b5(rgyud 'grel): bAr bya// bum pa gzhan rnams ma lus kun// chu bo chen por bkru bar bya// de nas mi 'chi bcu phyed dang // pa yi rnam lnga can dan dang // gur kum sbyar ba'i tshon gyis ni// thig mi mngon par dbyi bar bya'o// de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sregs ni
392b6(rgyud 'grel): mi yaM las las 'byung ba las// bdag dang slob mar bcas pa rnams// sdig pa zhi phyir sbyin srog bya// bum pa migs pam nA me gos skabs med mod kyang // rgyud chung dam par slob ma'i migo la mo gsal med nas// dkyil 'kho
393a1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga ma mthong de don gsal ba dang // cung zad bla ma'i gdams ngag la brten rims pa gsal// de la ma gsal bla ma dam pas bzod par gsol// ces bsdus pa'i rgyud dag tu// rim pa
393a2(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba mthong nas// rim pa gsal zhes bya ba yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga sbyar ba las// de yi bsod nams gang thob pa// bdag dang sems can thams cad kun// sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rim pa gsal ba zhes
393a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nag po spyod pa pas mdzad pa rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po rkar+m+ma badz+ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong gzhon tshul
393a4(rgyud 'grel): khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rjes btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag la 'tshalo// las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ byang chub tu sems brtan par gyur pas
393a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub bsgrub pa'i lam ma nor ba'i sgo 'jug bya'i thabs// lus ngag yid gsum mi dge ba las bzlog nas// dge ba'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i rim pa ni dang por gnas yid du 'ong bar/ srog chags bsal ba'i sa la 'dzem pa byas
393a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ maN Di la gzhung bzhin du byas te/ oM badz+ra re kha hri zhes brjod cing / bi'i rdzas lngas 'og ma yang bya'o// de ltar maN Da l-i byed pa'i dus su phan yon yang brjod par bya ste/ chur bcas lci ba sbyin yin te/ bskyang nul bya ba tshul
393b1(rgyud 'grel): khrims yin// grog mo sogs bsal bzod pa yin// bya ba brtson pa brtson 'grus yin// de rtse gcig pa bsam gtan te// ri mo snyoms par shes rab yin// thub pa'i maN Da la byas pas pha rol phyin drug 'di dag rnyed par 'gyur//
393b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mi khyad par can skye zla ba ltar gzi 'phags shing // nas kun las grol gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rgyal rigs 'bru dang gser sogs 'byor pas gang bar skyo// de nas ni lha mo mchog gi khyim du lus bya zhes
393b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing maN Da la bya'o// des na me tog dgram/ mchod pa dang gtor ma bsham// lus kyi sgo dag par byas la// stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ bdag nyid lhag pa'i lha gang yin du bsgoms la// hUM gis lce dang lag pa byin gyis brlab
393b4(rgyud 'grel): la// pad+ma'i bskor po dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bu blangs te/ brla stengs gnyis gzhag nas/ hUM dang aHsa rdo rje dril bu byin gyis brlabs la/ de kho na nyid 'di brjod do/ hUM/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa
393b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po gtso// zhes brjod la rdo rje gsor zhing / oM ma hA badz+ra hUM/ zhes brjod do// dril bu'i de kho na nyid 'di brjod do// a srid pa rang bzhin dag pa'i
393b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir// ngo bo nyid kyis dod nas dag/ rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis// srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed// ces brjod la/ dril bu gsil zhing / oM badz+ra g+haN Ta aHzhes brjod do// de nas oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru hUM phaT// ces
394a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas bsrung bar bya'o// de nas mchod pa rnams kyi steng du hUM dkar po re re bsams la// oM AHhUM/ zhes brjod pas hUM 'od du zhu nas// bdud rtsi ru byin gyis brlabs la// de nas bdag nyid
394a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha gang yin pa'i snying kha'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas// lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas nas// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bla ma dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ mchod pa dngos 'byor na dbul te//
394a3(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra arbaM pra tits+tsha AHhUM/ zhes pas yon cha ba dbul/ oM bI t+yaM tIts+tsha AHhUM/ zhes pas zhabs bsil dbu'o// i an+d+ra mA naM pra tIts+tsha AHhUM/ zhes pas zhabs bsil dbul/ oM pad+ma kra ma la pra tIts+tsha AHhU~M/ gdan gyi'o//
394a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra maN Da li pA tits+tsha AHhUM/ maN Dal gyi'o// oM badz+ra d+hU ba br-i tIts+tsha AHhU~M/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe pra tIts+tsha AHhUM/ oM badz+ra a laM ki pr-iN+Dits+tsha IHhUM/ oM badz+ra gan d+hi pra tIts+tsha AHhUM/ oM badz+ra ni bi t+yai pra tIts+tsha AHhU~M/ oM badz+ra gI tra pra tIts+tsha A
394a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes pas mchod pa rnams phul la/ de nas yan lag bdun pa rnams bya ste/ na mo sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' bla mi dam pa dang bcas pa bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag gi 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe/ skye ba
394a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di dang / skye ba gzhan dag tu// sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / so so'i skye bo khyad par can gyi dge ba thams cad la yid
394b1(rgyud 'grel): rang zhing sto bar bgyid do// bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po lnga mchis kyi bar du/ thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can gyi sangs rgyas dang theg pa chen po'i chos ma lus pa dang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
394b2(rgyud 'grel): la skyabasu mchi'o// bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ ji srid du seMn tham ca la phan pa dang / bde ba bsgrub pa'i slad ji sridu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu ma thob pa de srid du sems bskyed par bgyi'o//
394b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags bla na med pa'i lam bston par bgyi'o// bdag gi rnam par smin pa'i lus kyi dngos po 'di yang zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul nas mchod par bgyi'o// na mo bdag gi dge bo'i rtsa ba thams cad
394b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por bsngo bar bgyi'o// de nas bstod pa bya ste/ sangs rgyas gtso lnga yon tan mchog mnga' ba// mche dgus mchod cing ljon sprin chags 'dus// go 'phangs mchog brnyes ston pa chos char 'bebs//
394b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dkon mo sa phyag 'tshal 'dud// skyo b+ha'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs 'dus pa'i// shin tu phan dang bde ba nges mdzad gsungs// 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan mi 'da' ba'i// dam chos dkon mchog de la phyag 'tshal//
394b6(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun che la mthu rtsal rmod mnga' ba'i// bslab gzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bdag gzhan don phyir bsgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa'i// dge 'dun dkon mchog de la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas gsang sngags dang
395a1(rgyud 'grel): gzung sngags bzlas// de nas mdo gdon// bskor byabya// gtor ma gtang smon lam gdab bo// de nas spyan dras pa'i lha rnams gshegasu gsol te// m-i dmigs par bsgom mo// mad rgyud
395a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dgongs pa'i 'grel mdzad cing // nyon mongs mi mthun phyogs spong thabs bstan nas// yon tan mchog rnams rgyud las sbyor mdzad pa// dus gsum bla ma rnams la skyabasu mchi'o// skye zhing skye ba dag ni thams cad du// blo ldan
395a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs bzang nga rgyal med pa dang // snying rje che zhing bla ma la dad cing // rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig la gnas nas// mchog dang mthun mongs dngos grub myur thob nas// 'gro ba sems can rnams kyi don byed shog/ spyi'i chos spyod slob dpon
395a4(rgyud 'grel): nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / oM rje btsun he ru ka la phyag 'o tshalo// thabs dang shes rab bdag
395a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid can// thugs rjes sku sbrul 'gro don mdzad// sku gsungs thugs kyi dbang phyug gtso// he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum mdzes// zhabs gnyis phyod dkrung gar tshul gyis// pad+ma nyi ma'i
395a6(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bzhugs// mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// bud+d+ho mkha 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag/ rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che//
395b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje na mkha' dri ma med// dngos gnyis dag pas gos pa med// rat+na mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stod// rdo rje mi 'ching 'dod chags
395b2(rgyud 'grel): che// rnam rtog na mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// pad+ma mkha 'gro phyag 'tshal stong // rdo rje dag pa gdon mi za// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung // sna tshogs mkha'
395b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// rigs lnga mkha' 'gro'i bstod pa rdzogs so// / rgyal ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo//
395b4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba'i// 'jig rten mche ba gtsigs pa po// g.yas ser g.yon ljang rgyab zhal dkar// mnyam med sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdag/ rigs btsun rigs po 'gul nas
395b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud// dbu la rigs kyi bdag po bzhugs// bde chen sku la phyag 'tshalo// sgeg dang dpa' byad 'jig su rung // drag dang rgod dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje rdum dang zhi ba la// nyams dgu yon tan khyod la 'dud// na mkha'i
395b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis khebs mdzad cing // 'jigs pa po yang 'jigs par mdzod// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// bder gshegs sku la phyag 'tshalo// g.yas g.yon dang po mda' dang gzhu// lhag mthong ba khaM T+wAM 'dzin// mgo
396a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng brgya phyed do shal byas// mgon po khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dbu skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng // ka pA la lngas dbul brgyan// nar stod g.yogs stegs lkugs bsnams// 'jigs rung khyod
396a2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos po'i rang bzhin kun gyi mchog/ sku la mtshan dong dpe byad rdzogs// 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po// sku gsum bdag nyid khyod la 'dud// khyod kyi ye shes spyan nur gyis// mi mthun phyogs rnams sgrog
396a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad cing // rgyal mtshan dril bus slar gso mdzad// thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku gsum ye shes lnga bdag nyid// bde bar gshegs po kun gyi gtso// 'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa po// stong nyid snying po khyod la 'dud//
396a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang // de nyid brtan par g.yo bcas pa// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad kyi// bdag nyid chen po khyod la 'dud// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel byed cing // phun sum tshogs pa kun ster ba// byung
396a5(rgyud 'grel): chub lam ni ston pa po// ye shes sku khyod phyag 'tshal bstod// bsam med dpe dang bral bas brjod du med// bde chen sku ste mi 'gyur 'dus ma byas// dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs dmigs dA med// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyog
396a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod// shar phyogs lha mo rdo rje'i rigs// byams pa'i bdag nyid sku dog sde// sa khams me long ye shes bdag/ rdo rje mkhe 'gro phyog 'tshal bstod// lho phyogs lha mo rin chen rigs// snying rje'i bdag nyid sku mngag
396b1(rgyud 'grel): ser// chu khams mnyam nyid ye shes bdag/ rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stod// nub phyogs lha mo pad+ma'i rigs// dga' ba'i bdag nyid sku mdog dkar// me khams so sor rtog rang bzhin// pad+ma mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod//
396b2(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs lha mo las kyi rigs// btang snyoms rang bzhin sku mdog ldong // rlung khams bya ba grub rang bzhin// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod// thams cad zhal bzhi phyag bzhi ma// phyag na rang rang mtshan mo 'dzin// mtshan dang
396b3(rgyud 'grel): dpe byed sku la rdzogs// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal stong // sku la 'od kyi phreng ba 'phro// mi mgo khrag 'dzag do shal byas// zhabs gnyis nyi la phyed dkrung bzhugs// 'khor gyi lha mo phyag 'tshal stod// phyag rgya rnam pa lnga dang ldan// kA
396b4(rgyud 'grel): pA la lngas dbu la brgyan// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// lha mo'i 'khor la phyag 'tshal bstod// rje btsun 'khor dang bcas pa la// bdag gis bstong pa'i bsod nams kyis// sems can kun gyis rjes btsun gyis// go 'phangs
396b5(rgyud 'grel): bla med thob par shog/ rje btsun dpal he ru ka dpe 'khor dang bcas pa'i bstod pa rdzogs so//
396b6(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig che 'phos te bdun tshogs kyi dus su dge rna byed na/ ming byang ngam gos la sogs pa'i mtshan ma cig la brten bcas la/ de nas maN+Dal bya ba dang / mchod pa dang gtor ma gzhung bzhin du bshams te/ de nas bdag lhag
397a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lhar bsgoms la// ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsgoms la// mchod pa'i khyad par rnams kyis mchod// mkha'agro ma rnams la gtor ma bsngos la// de nas
397a2(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa dang 'dod pa'i don gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas bdag nyid kyi snying kha'i sa bon gyi 'od zer spros te/ tshe 'das kyi sems yi ge a thudu'i gzugs 'od zer gyi lcags kyus bkug la/ rten gang yin bde la bstim te/ rnam smin gyi
397a3(rgyud 'grel): lus de nyid du bsams te/ bdag gi snying kha'i so bon gyis 'od zer spros te/ bsgrub bya'i snying khar thim pas/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa sbyangs nas/ lus shil dag pa dang 'dra ba bas mo// de nas na mkha' lI bsgom
397a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rigs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag na bsnams po'i bum pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun rnams kyis dbang bskur te bkrus pas/ sgrib pa thams cad byeng par bsam/ de nas bzlas pa bya ste/ bdag gi snying
397a5(rgyud 'grel): kha'i sa bon gyi yi ge las/ bzlas pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba la sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du bskor bar bsams la// de nas phreng sngags gang yin pa'i bzlas pa byas pas/ sngags kyi phreng ba la 'od zer phros pas/ bsgrub bya'i snying khar
397a6(rgyud 'grel): thim nas lus ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad sbyangs par bsam zhing bzlas pa'o// de nas smon lam gdab cing dge ba'i rtse bar bsngo// de nas bsgrub bya'i shes pa e thu du de yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor
397b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis bteg nas/ nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i gtso bo'i thugs dkar thim par bsam ste/ gnas bstab pa'o// gal te brten med par gyur na/ gang yin pa'i rnam smin gyi lus de nyid mngon sum dang 'dra bar bsams la/ bsam rgyud gong ma
397b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bya'o// de ltar bdun pa thams cad la bya'o// slob dpon chen po nag pos mdzad pa rdzogaso// // tshwa gdab pa'i man ngag la// dang po 'jim pa byas nas mdun du gzhag ste/ rang nyid lhag pa'i lha
397b3(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o// de nas chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i sngags kyis 'jim pa mi dmigs par bsgoms la/ cho ga gsum gyi he ru ka yab yum gyi bskur bskyed do// de nas snying kha'i hrIH'am/ hUM gi 'od zer
397b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis spangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bklag la// he ru ka yab yum la bstim par bya// de nas yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa las 'od du zhu ste/ byang chub kyi sems gnas pa las hU~M ru ka'i snying po nyi shu rtsa gcig
397b5(rgyud 'grel): gis byin gyis brlabs te/ yang de nyid kyis gdab par bya'o// sa tsha re re yang he ru ka rI rer bsam la// de re re las he ru ka mang po spro ba dang / sdu ba byas pa laso// bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par bsdu mo// de nas rten 'brel gyi snga
397b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'jug bsdu ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ma dA mA yA i ti kra ma/ bod skad du/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i ljags pi'i rim pa/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshalo// oM shUn+ya tI dz+nyA na badz+redz+ra swa b+hA A traH
398a1(rgyud 'grel): ko haM/ zhes brjod pas dngos po thams cad rnam par dag nas/ so sor rang rig pa'i ngo bo nyid thig le yungs kar tsam zhig tu gsal bar bsgom// de nas thig le de las 'od zer 'phros pas
398a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rnam rtog thams cad bsregs nas/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i bskur gsal bar byas te/ de nas sar 'dus te thig le la thim nas thig la de yang 'od du zhu bas rdo rje gur dang dur
398a3(rgyud 'grel): khrod brgyad dang / gzhal yas khang dang / lha mo bzhi dang ldan pa sgyu 'phrul chen mo bskyed do// de nas de dag kyang sgyu 'phrul chen mo la bsdu ste/ rdo rje gur ni dur khrod la thim dur khrod brgyad gzhal yasi khang la thi me// gzhal yis
398a4(rgyud 'grel): khang lha mo bzhi la thim/ lha mo bzhi rigA mi'i zhal hrIr thim/ rig ma thabs la thim pa dang / de nus sgyu 'phru chen mo'i snying khwa'i bad+hi'i nang na gnas pa'i yAM gI A'i gzugs de pad+ma myur po'i 'du ba ma pa par bsams ra
398a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de yi lte ba gsang ba na gnas pa'i rlung dang / snying kha na gnas pa'i chu'i rlung rnam par dag bzla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsams te/ de ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang rin chen mkha' gro ma gnyis kyi rang bzhin no// de'i steng du rang gi rig
398a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ngo bo nyid sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i 'od kyi thog le yungs 'bru tsam 'od zer lde dang ldan pa cig bas mo// de'i steng du mgrin pa na gnas pa'i me'i rlung dang / spyi bor gnas pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis rnam par dag pa'i
398b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsams la/ de ni pad+ma mkha' 'gro dang / sna tshogs mkha' gra'i rang bzhin// de ltar bskyed nas nyi zla gnyis kyi bar na/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo rang rig par du bo nyid thig le du 'od zer lnga dang ldan par dmyigs paR+Sha
398b2(rgyud 'grel): bsams mo// de ltar yang dang yang du 'dres par bsams bskye lhun du rgyu ba dang thur du rgyu ba'i rlung rim po ji ltar 'gog pa de bzhin du mtshon mya rims kyis skye bar 'gyu ro// gasbyong ba'i snying kha na gnas pa'i chu lnga thim pas ni/
398b3(rgyud 'grel): kun mnyam pa'i dris zag pa med pa'i lam gyi ye shes dang po skye'o// hU~M mI la thim pa saM ni semyis dang la dab blo ste/ du'i dang 'dra bar mtho // khe rlung gA thim pas ni ting 'dzin 'ba' TIg dang ldan te glog gi rnam pa lta
398b4(rgyud 'grel): mthong ngo // rlung rnam par rig pa lce thim pas 'dod pa thams cad drang brA br-i t+te m+bAr mye lta bur mthong ngo // m+b+ha par rig pa na mkha'u dang banyal pa'i bde pa 'i thim pas thams cad snang ba rajig pa nam/ khe lta bur mthong // rad+hA rIs
398b5(rgyud 'grel): basprin med bI'i na mkha' lta bus smon lam dang snying rje chen po'i dbang gis 'gro ba'i don du gzug sku rnam pa gnyis snang bar gyur te/ ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du'o// slob dpon chos kyi zhabs kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i
398b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i man ngag rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po zhi ba bzang po dang / 'od kyi kho ts+tsha ba 'gos lhas bcas kyis sbyar cing zhus te btan la phab pa'o//
399a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs bzhugs//
399b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mA yA sA d+hA naM/ bod skad du/ sgyu 'phrul ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs/ rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha lo// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// de bzhin lha mo rnams kyi sku// phyogs
399b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po ni gzhan rnams la// sgyu 'phrul che la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid// snying rjes 'jigs pa'i rnam pa can// sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya yi// sgrub thabs legs par bshad par bya// 'dir bsgom pa'i dbang du
399b3(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ lha mo bzhi'i glu bzhis bskul nas rnam par sad pa'i sngags pas/ nang par sngar langs te/ rang gi snying kha'i nyi mi lnga gnas pa/ hU~M yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis bdag sbyang ba dang / kha dag pa la sogs pa
399b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// hUM phaT zhes bya bas gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba bya ste/ bsdam gtan gyi khang par zhugs la/ hUM yig gis yon chab la bzlas zhing stan bde ba la 'dug nas/ mdun gyi na mkha' la bcom ldan
399b5(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bltas la// snying kha'i sngags kyi 'od zer los byung ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad lnga yos yang dag par mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad
399b6(rgyud 'grel): so sor bshags pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa dang / so so'i skye bo rnams kyi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bdag gi dge ba thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang
400a1(rgyud 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bu dang / byang chub kyi bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ba ni/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge
400a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dun dkon mchog la'o// e ma'o sems can thams cad kyi don phan pa dang bde ba'i ched du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas shin tu mthar phyin pa'i mya ngan las
400a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa dang / bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod par bya'o// de'i rjes 'di dag ni sems nyid de/ med pa nyid rnam pa dang des snang ba'o// 'di lta ste/ rmi lam lta bur mos pa byas la/ rnam pa
400a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad yongs su spangs pa dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' lta bya snang ba med pa mtha' yos pa gsal ba tsam du blta ste/ oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ata ma ko haM zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de'i rjes la mdun gyi nam
400a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhar hUM yig gis sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsams la/ de'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'phrod pa rnams kyis 'og tu rdo rje'i sa gzhi drung / phyogs rdo rjebI rA ba dang / steng du rdo rje'i gor dang / nang du mI'i rus pa'i dur khrod bsgrim par
400a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de'i dbus su gzhal yas khang khyams gcig pa rin po che thams cad kyi bdag nyid can blta'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa'o// dri ba laM sogs lha mo bzhis// stegs bu bzhir ni brgyan
400b1(rgyud 'grel): bA'o// de'i dbus su pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams te/ de'i lte b.rarla thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i thig le mu tig 'bras bu ltar bsal bar bya'o// de ltar na 'di ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin no// dbus
400b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi thig le de nyid las phyogs rnams su thig le rnams smos te/ sa bon gyi rnam pa yongs su gyur par blta ba ni/ go rims bzhin du hUM dang swa dang a dang / ha/ zhes bya'o// de dag las go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang nor bu
400b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs can dang / de'i rigs rnams yang dag par spro ba dang / ying de nyid la bsdus nas/ de yongs gyur pa las rnal 'byor ma bzhi po lta ste/ shar gyi 'dab ma la rdo rje mkha'i 'gro ma sku
400b4(rgyud 'grel): mdog sngon mo zhal sngo ba dang ser ba dang dkar po dang ljang khu/ rdo rje dang thod pa dang dril bu dang dbyug to 'dzin ma'o// lho'i 'dab me la rin chen mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog ser mo// zhal ser ba dang sngo ba dang dkar po dang ldeng
400b5(rgyud 'grel): khu/ rin chen sna tshogs dang rtse gsum dang mgrin pa bsdams pa'i lce spyang dang ba dan 'dzin ma'o// nub kyi 'dab ma lA pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog dkar mo// zhal dkar ba dang ser ba dang sngo ba dang ljang khu sna tshogs pad+ma dang mangs
400b6(rgyud 'grel): dang thod pa dang gzhu 'dzin ma'o// byang gi 'dab ma la sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog ljang khu/ zhal ljang khu ser ba dang dkar ba dang sde ba'o// ral gri dang cang ti'u dang zhags pa dang thod pa 'dzin ma'o// thams cad
401a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i gdan dang 'od // lhag ma 'di yi gtso bo bzhin// rdo rje 'di yis ni glu 'di yis// de rnams mgon po bzhengs byed yin// ha rna laM sa ho b+hA oM oM a ka ma lu ba b+h+r-i hr-i u brad+d+ho/ a la la la la/
401a2(rgyud 'grel): ho ma hA su he Na/ A rA hi uNe d+he/ ra bi ki ra NaM Na bI phu l+li u ka ma lu ma hA su he Na/ a la la la la ho// ma hI sa hUM NA/ A rA hi u Ne d+haM/ de nas glu blangs pa'i nus pas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi thig le'i gzugs de bor
401a3(rgyud 'grel): nas sa bon gnyis kyis rnam par 'gyur te/ oM dang hUM ngo // de nas oM yog las rnam par snang mdzad dang / de'i rigs spro ba dang bsdu ba'o// hUM yig las rgyal po lnga dang / de'i rigs rnams kyang ngo // de nas oM yig las byung
401a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dang / lhan cig pa bcom ldan 'das he ru ka hUM yig lngas bskyed par bya'o// thal bas byugs shing sku mdog gi nag/ nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od kyis mdzes// dbus sku khams pa gyen du brjes//
401a5(rgyud 'grel): thod pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa// sngo dang ser dang dkar ba tshwa// ljang khu'i zhal deng bzhi pa'o// thod pa mnga' dang kha T+wAM ga dang gzhu 'dzin pa te bzhi'o// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan can//
401a6(rgyud 'grel): lag gdub dang ni ske rags so// mi yi lpags pa'i na bza' 'dzin// bcu gnyis spyan te dmar ba'o// 'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrugs pas khro// mchog tu dga' bas mdzes pa yin// skyil dkrungs phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs//
401b1(rgyud 'grel): gar dgu yi ni nyams dang ldan// 'od zer mtha' yas lngas byung ba'i// rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis 'gro don byas// bdag po dang mtshungs mtshon cha dmar// dpal ldan sangs rgyas mkha'agro dmar// ser dang dkar dang ljang khu'i
401b2(rgyud 'grel): zhal// sangs rgyas dbang bskur ri khrod ma// ji ltar bgyis pa'i rdo rjer gsungs// de bzhin sangs rgyas mkha'agro ma// he ru ka dang yang dag ldan// 'dir dmar sangs rgyas sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sku yis mchod
401b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir// chos dag pa yi rang bzhin gyis// gsung gi bdag po dkar po nyid// 'dir lha thams cad kyang ro'i snying kha mnan pa'o// de'i rjes lnga bcom ldan 'das kyi mig gi dbang po la oM yig dmar po// rna ba'i dbang po la
401b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM yig sngon po// sna'i dbang po la tsaM yig ser po// lce'i dbang po la a yig dkar po// gtsug tor gyi gnasu re pha ljang khu// yid la khe yig dkar po bsam par bya'o// zhes bya ste/ dbang po drug tu yAM ge drug bkod
401b5(rgyud 'grel): bI ni go cha'o// oM AHhUM zhes bya ba ni/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ go rims bzhin du mgo bo dang mgrin pa dang snying kha ro// nub ma'i bar du nyi ma la gnas pa'i rang gi lha'i sa bon ye shes kyi rang bzhin blta
401b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la hUM yig gis bgegs bskrad cing yon chab dbul lo// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya bas dgug pa dang bzhugs pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba'o// de dang
402a1(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig tu 'dres par gyur pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor blta'o// de nas ye shes kyi sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams bskul bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis btang ba'i rnal 'byor
402a2(rgyud 'grel): ma lnga 'ongs te/ ye shes lnga'i chu yis bkang ba'i rin po che'i bum pas bcom ldan 'das dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dbang bskur bar bya'o// dbang bskur bas spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag po bskyed par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das
402a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi mi bskyod pa'o// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin du rtag pa dang mi bskyod po dang rin chen bdag po dang gsung gi bdag po dang don yod grub pa'o// de nas ye shes kyi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi sgo nas yo byad lnga
402a4(rgyud 'grel): da 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i mchod pa rnams kyis bcom ldan dang bcom ldan 'das ma mchod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo'i zhal nas bstod pa/ mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs chen po// sgyu ma'i phreng bas brgyan
402a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ sha chen po ni gsol par mdzad/ he ru ka dpal bdag phyag 'tshal// de nas lha mo rnams spros pa'i sbyor bar sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro mar nub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'di'i mgo bo dang / snying kha dang / lte ba dang /
402a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba dang / brla dag tu go rims bzhin du/ oM hUM swa AHhA zhes pa rnams rnam par bsgom mo// de rnams gcig la gcig spros pas/ 'di'i lus mngon par khyab par byas pa des/ hriHyig las pad+ma dmar po// AH
402b1(rgyud 'grel): yig las skyes pa mu tig lta bu'i ze 'bru dang / de bzhin du hUM yig las skyes pa'i nor bu dang / a nu rA ga yA mi zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dga' ba rab tu bsam mo// de nas nor bu gnyis kyis 'od zer bskul bas/ de bzhin
402b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rnams byon nas khar rab tu zhugs te/ zhu zhing pad+ma'i nang du lhung ba de ni ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi ste/ lce tsor zil bas len par byed par bsam zhes bya'o// dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba ting 'dzin gnyis
402b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bskal ba'i sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro mo la sogs pa lnga dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi sku'i sprin spros pa rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ni go rims bzhin du me long lta bu'i
402b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i go 'phangs thob pa bskyed cing /
402b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sku'i sprin rnams rtsa ba'i sku ru bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni ting 'dzin gsum pa'o// gang gi tshe yang rnal 'byor pa/ sems can brtan par byed par 'dod pas// ting nge 'dzin thams cad myur du rdzogs par byed pa de'i tshe/
402b6(rgyud 'grel): mdor bsdus nas ting 'dzin gsum po bsgom par bya'o// lte ba'i pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru la zla ba dang nyi ma'i kha sbyor mtha' skor mtshams med par bsam te/ de'i dbusu yungs kar phra mo tsam la dkar zhing gsal ba yang ye shes
403a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi thig le'i gzugs bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid dpa' bo chen po bsam par bya'o// de'i 'od zer gyi ri mo pad+ma'i skud pa lta bu zla ba'i dbus nas byung ba'i kha sbyor gyi ngos gnyis lan
403a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dkris shing bcings te gnas par blta'o// zla ba'i steng du gnas pa dkris pa gsum gyi phyed la so sor yi ge bcu drug gis brgyus pa blta'o// dpal sdom pa bla ma las gsungs pa/ ka yog la sogs da yi mthar/
403a3(rgyud 'grel): nga nya spangs te dgod par bya// d+ha yi la sogs kA'i mthar phreng ba gnyis po mnyam par bri// dbus a yi phreng ba ste// dag bya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhes bya'o// 'dir yang gsungs pa/ bzang po yi ge'i phreng ba yid zhes
403a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'o// de ltar lta ba'i pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru la// nyi ma dang zla ba khe sbyar gyi nang du dpa' bo bsgom par bya'o// bsgrims pa yongasu smin par mos par bya ba de'i phyir/ gnyis pa nyid de 'od zer phra mo'i ri mo 'bar zhing gcig gyen
403a5(rgyud 'grel): du 'bar ba'i gnas skabs blta'o// de'i 'od kyis 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsis gang ba thob pa'i dpa' bo dang 'od zer de yang 'dra ba'o// de nas dpa' bo nges par byas pas ji srid sems brtan pa thob pa'i mtshan ma nye bar mtshon
403a6(rgyud 'grel): pa de srid du blta'o// nye bar mtshon pa brtan pa bde ba'i tshe/ 'od zer gyi ri mo gsal bar snang bas sna tshogs pa snang bar bsam ste/ thams cad lag mthil gyi skyu rur bzhin du blta'o// tingange 'dzin thams cad myur du rjo
403b1(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa zhes pa ste/ thig la'i rnal 'byor ro// rig pa bzlas pa'i dngos grub ces pas bzlas pa brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin du lha drug gi 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ lte bar pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru la gnas bu nyi ma dang
403b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba kha sbyar gyi nang du dpa' bo bsam par bya'o// de nyid kyi 'od zer gyi ri mo la yi ge'i phreng ba gsum gyis rgyud pa de la kha sbyor dkris shing bcings par sngags kyis bzlas por bya'o// rgyud 'dir sdigs kyi yi ge gsum ste/ de la btso
403b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi sngags kyi ni/ oM hUM hUM ngo // sangs rgyas mkha'a'agro ma la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin du oM ai hUMngo // oM hUM hUM ngo // oM swA hUM oM AHhUM ngo // oM hUM hUM ngo // ji ltar bzlas pa bya zhe na/ kha sbyar gyi nang du bzlas par bya ste
403b4(rgyud 'grel): sa bon gyi yi ge bkod la// de'i mgo bor dpa' bo blang bar bya'o// oM yig brjod pa ni// dpa' bo las 'od zer gyi ri mo dbugs 'byung ba'i rlung dang lhan cig steng du song ba des snang bar byas nas/ 'gro ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid bya'o/
